4687      * Miltiplies this point by a value and returns a new one
4688      * @method multiply
4689      * @param {Number} scalar
4690      * @return {fabric.Point}
4691      */
4692     multiply: function (scalar) {
4693       return new Point(this.x * scalar, this.y * scalar);
4694     },
4695 
4696     /**
4697      * Miltiplies this point by a value
4698      * @method multiplyEquals
4699      * @param {Number} scalar
4700      * @return {fabric.Point} thisArg
4701      */
4702     multiplyEquals: function (scalar) {
4703       this.x *= scalar;
4704       this.y *= scalar;
4705       return this;
4706     },
4707 
4708     /**
4709      * Divides this point by a value and returns a new one
4710      * @method divide
4711      * @param {Number} scalar
4712      * @return {fabric.Point}
4713      */
4714     divide: function (scalar) {
4715       return new Point(this.x / scalar, this.y / scalar);
4716     },
4717 
4718     /**
4719      * Divides this point by a value
4720      * @method divideEquals
4721      * @param {Number} scalar
4722      * @return {fabric.Point} thisArg
4723      */
4724     divideEquals: function (scalar) {
4725       this.x /= scalar;
4726       this.y /= scalar;
4727       return this;
4728     },
4729 
4730     /**
4731      * Returns true if this point is equal to another one
4732      * @method eq
4733      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4734      * @return {Boolean}
4735      */
4736     eq: function (that) {
4737       return (this.x === that.x && this.y === that.y);
4738     },
4739 
4740     /**
4741      * Returns true if this point is less than another one
4742      * @method lt
4743      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4744      * @return {Boolean}
4745      */
4746     lt: function (that) {
4747       return (this.x < that.x && this.y < that.y);
4748     },
4749 
4750     /**
4751      * Returns true if this point is less than or equal to another one
4752      * @method lte
4753      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4754      * @return {Boolean}
4755      */
4756     lte: function (that) {
4757       return (this.x <= that.x && this.y <= that.y);
4758     },
4759 
4760     /**
4761 
4762      * Returns true if this point is greater another one
4763      * @method gt
4764      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4765      * @return {Boolean}
4766      */
4767     gt: function (that) {
4768       return (this.x > that.x && this.y > that.y);
4769     },
4770 
4771     /**
4772      * Returns true if this point is greater than or equal to another one
4773      * @method gte
4774      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4775      * @return {Boolean}
4776      */
4777     gte: function (that) {
4778       return (this.x >= that.x && this.y >= that.y);
4779     },
4780 
4781     /**
4782      * Returns new point which is the result of linear interpolation with this one and another one
4783      * @method lerp
4784      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4785      * @param {Number} t
4786      * @return {fabric.Point}
4787      */
4788     lerp: function (that, t) {
4789       return new Point(this.x + (that.x - this.x) * t, this.y + (that.y - this.y) * t);
4790     },
4791 
4792     /**
4793      * Returns distance from this point and another one
4794      * @method distanceFrom
4795      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4796      * @return {Number}
4797      */
4798     distanceFrom: function (that) {
4799       var dx = this.x - that.x,
4800           dy = this.y - that.y;
4801       return Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
4802     },
4803 
4804     /**
4805      * Returns the point between this point and another one
4806      * @method midPointFrom
4807      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4808      * @return {fabric.Point}
4809      */
4810     midPointFrom: function (that) {
4811       return new Point(this.x + (that.x - this.x)/2, this.y + (that.y - this.y)/2);
4812     },
4813 
4814     /**
4815      * Returns a new point which is the min of this and another one
4816      * @method min
4817      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4818      * @return {fabric.Point}
4819      */
4820     min: function (that) {
4821       return new Point(Math.min(this.x, that.x), Math.min(this.y, that.y));
4822     },
4823 
4824     /**
4825      * Returns a new point which is the max of this and another one
4826      * @method max
4827      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4828      * @return {fabric.Point}
4829      */
4830     max: function (that) {
4831       return new Point(Math.max(this.x, that.x), Math.max(this.y, that.y));
4832     },
4833 
4834     /**
4835      * Returns string representation of this point
4836      * @method toString
4837      * @return {String}
4838      */
4839     toString: function () {
4840       return this.x + "," + this.y;
4841     },
4842 
4843     /**
4844      * Sets x/y of this point
4845      * @method setXY
4846      * @param {Number} x
4847      * @return {Number} y
4848      */
4849     setXY: function (x, y) {
4850       this.x = x;
4851       this.y = y;
4852     },
4853 
4854     /**
4855      * Sets x/y of this point from another point
4856      * @method setFromPoint
4857      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4858      */
4859     setFromPoint: function (that) {
4860       this.x = that.x;
4861       this.y = that.y;
4862     },
4863 
4864     /**
4865      * Swaps x/y of this point and another point
4866      * @method setFromPoint
4867      * @param {fabric.Point} that
4868      */
4869     swap: function (that) {
4870       var x = this.x,
4871           y = this.y;
4872       this.x = that.x;
4873       this.y = that.y;
4874       that.x = x;
4875       that.y = y;
4876     }
4877   };
4878 
4879 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
4880 
4881 (function(global) {
4882 
4883   "use strict";
4884 
4885   /* Adaptation of work of Kevin Lindsey (kevin@kevlindev.com) */
4886 
4887   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { });
4888 
4889   if (fabric.Intersection) {
4890     fabric.warn('fabric.Intersection is already defined');
4891     return;
4892   }
4893 
4894   /**
4895    * Intersection class
4896    * @class Intersection
4897    * @memberOf fabric
4898    */
4899   function Intersection(status) {
4900     if (arguments.length > 0) {
4901       this.init(status);
4902     }
4903   }
4904 
4905   fabric.Intersection = Intersection;
4906 
4907   fabric.Intersection.prototype = /** @scope fabric.Intersection.prototype */ {
4908 
4909     /**
4910      * Constructor
4911      * @method init
4912      * @param {String} status
4913      */
4914     init: function (status) {
4915       this.status = status;
4916       this.points = [];
4917     },
4918 
4919     /**
4920      * Appends a point to intersection
4921      * @method appendPoint
4922      * @param {fabric.Point} point
4923      */
4924     appendPoint: function (point) {
4925       this.points.push(point);
4926     },
4927 
4928     /**
4929      * Appends points to intersection
4930      * @method appendPoints
4931      * @param {Array} points
4932      */
4933     appendPoints: function (points) {
4934       this.points = this.points.concat(points);
4935     }
4936   };
4937 
4938   /**
4939    * Checks if one line intersects another
4940    * @static
4941    * @method intersectLineLine
4942    * @param {fabric.Point} a1
4943    * @param {fabric.Point} a2
4944    * @param {fabric.Point} b1
4945    * @param {fabric.Point} b2
4946    * @return {fabric.Intersection}
4947    */
4948   fabric.Intersection.intersectLineLine = function (a1, a2, b1, b2) {
4949     var result,
4950         ua_t = (b2.x - b1.x) * (a1.y - b1.y) - (b2.y - b1.y) * (a1.x - b1.x),
4951         ub_t = (a2.x - a1.x) * (a1.y - b1.y) - (a2.y - a1.y) * (a1.x - b1.x),
4952         u_b = (b2.y - b1.y) * (a2.x - a1.x) - (b2.x - b1.x) * (a2.y - a1.y);
4953     if (u_b !== 0) {
4954       var ua = ua_t / u_b,
4955           ub = ub_t / u_b;
4956       if (0 <= ua && ua <= 1 && 0 <= ub && ub <= 1) {
4957         result = new Intersection("Intersection");
4958         result.points.push(new fabric.Point(a1.x + ua * (a2.x - a1.x), a1.y + ua * (a2.y - a1.y)));
4959       }
4960       else {
4961         result = new Intersection("No Intersection");
4962       }
4963     }
4964     else {
4965       if (ua_t === 0 || ub_t === 0) {
4966         result = new Intersection("Coincident");
4967       }
4968       else {
4969         result = new Intersection("Parallel");
4970       }
4971     }
4972     return result;
4973   };
4974 
4975   /**
4976    * Checks if line intersects polygon
4977    * @method intersectLinePolygon
4978    * @static
4979    * @param {fabric.Point} a1
4980    * @param {fabric.Point} a2
4981    * @param {Array} points
4982    * @return {fabric.Intersection}
4983    */
4984   fabric.Intersection.intersectLinePolygon = function(a1,a2,points){
4985     var result = new Intersection("No Intersection"),
4986         length = points.length;
4987 
4988     for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
4989       var b1 = points[i],
4990           b2 = points[(i+1) % length],
4991           inter = Intersection.intersectLineLine(a1, a2, b1, b2);
4992 
4993       result.appendPoints(inter.points);
4994     }
4995     if (result.points.length > 0) {
4996       result.status = "Intersection";
4997     }
4998     return result;
4999   };
5000 
5001   /**
5002    * Checks if polygon intersects another polygon
5003    * @method intersectPolygonPolygon
5004    * @static
5005    * @param {Array} points1
5006    * @param {Array} points2
5007    * @return {fabric.Intersection}
5008    */
5009   fabric.Intersection.intersectPolygonPolygon = function (points1, points2) {
5010     var result = new Intersection("No Intersection"),
5011         length = points1.length;
5012 
5013     for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
5014       var a1 = points1[i],
5015           a2 = points1[(i+1) % length],
5016           inter = Intersection.intersectLinePolygon(a1, a2, points2);
5017 
5018       result.appendPoints(inter.points);
5019     }
5020     if (result.points.length > 0) {
5021       result.status = "Intersection";
5022     }
5023     return result;
5024   };
5025 
5026   /**
5027    * Checks if polygon intersects rectangle
5028    * @method intersectPolygonRectangle
5029 
5030    * @static
5031    * @param {Array} points
5032    * @param {Number} r1
5033    * @param {Number} r2
5034    * @return {fabric.Intersection}
5035    */
5036   fabric.Intersection.intersectPolygonRectangle = function (points, r1, r2) {
5037     var min = r1.min(r2),
5038         max = r1.max(r2),
5039         topRight = new fabric.Point(max.x, min.y),
5040         bottomLeft = new fabric.Point(min.x, max.y),
5041         inter1 = Intersection.intersectLinePolygon(min, topRight, points),
5042         inter2 = Intersection.intersectLinePolygon(topRight, max, points),
5043         inter3 = Intersection.intersectLinePolygon(max, bottomLeft, points),
5044         inter4 = Intersection.intersectLinePolygon(bottomLeft, min, points),
5045         result = new Intersection("No Intersection");
5046 
5047     result.appendPoints(inter1.points);
5048     result.appendPoints(inter2.points);
5049     result.appendPoints(inter3.points);
5050     result.appendPoints(inter4.points);
5051 
5052     if (result.points.length > 0) {
5053       result.status = "Intersection";
5054     }
5055     return result;
5056   };
5057 
5058 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
5059 (function(global) {
5060 
5061   "use strict";
5062 
5063   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { });
5064 
5065   if (fabric.Color) {
5066     fabric.warn('fabric.Color is already defined.');
5067     return;
5068   }
5069 
5070   /**
5071    * Color class
5072    * The purpose of {@link fabric.Color} is to abstract and encapsulate common color operations;
5073    * {@link fabric.Color} is a constructor and creates instances of {@link fabric.Color} objects.
5074    *
5075    * @class Color
5076    * @memberOf fabric
5077    * @param {String} color optional in hex or rgb(a) format
5078    * @return {fabric.Color} thisArg
5079    */
5080   function Color(color) {
5081     if (!color) {
5082       this.setSource([0, 0, 0, 1]);
5083     }
5084     else {
5085       this._tryParsingColor(color);
5086     }
5087   }
5088 
5089   fabric.Color = Color;
5090 
5091   fabric.Color.prototype = /** @scope fabric.Color.prototype */ {
5092 
5093     /**
5094      * @private
5095      * @method _tryParsingColor
5096      */
5097     _tryParsingColor: function(color) {
5098       var source = Color.sourceFromHex(color);
5099       if (!source) {
5100         source = Color.sourceFromRgb(color);
5101       }
5102       if (source) {
5103         this.setSource(source);
5104       }
5105     },
5106 
5107     /**
5108      * Returns source of this color (where source is an array representation; ex: [200, 200, 100, 1])
5109      * @method getSource
5110      * @return {Array}
5111      */
5112     getSource: function() {
5113       return this._source;
5114     },
5115 
5116     /**
5117      * Sets source of this color (where source is an array representation; ex: [200, 200, 100, 1])
5118      * @method setSource
5119      * @param {Array} source
5120      */
5121     setSource: function(source) {
5122       this._source = source;
5123     },
5124 
5125     /**
5126      * Returns color represenation in RGB format
5127      * @method toRgb
5128      * @return {String} ex: rgb(0-255,0-255,0-255)
5129      */
5130     toRgb: function() {
5131       var source = this.getSource();
5132       return 'rgb(' + source[0] + ',' + source[1] + ',' + source[2] + ')';
5133     },
5134 
5135     /**
5136      * Returns color represenation in RGBA format
5137      * @method toRgba
5138      * @return {String} ex: rgba(0-255,0-255,0-255,0-1)
5139      */
5140     toRgba: function() {
5141       var source = this.getSource();
5142       return 'rgba(' + source[0] + ',' + source[1] + ',' + source[2] + ',' + source[3] + ')';
5143     },
5144 
5145     /**
5146      * Returns color represenation in HEX format
5147      * @method toHex
5148      * @return {String} ex: FF5555
5149      */
5150     toHex: function() {
5151       var source = this.getSource();
5152 
5153       var r = source[0].toString(16);
5154       r = (r.length === 1) ? ('0' + r) : r;
5155 
5156       var g = source[1].toString(16);
5157       g = (g.length === 1) ? ('0' + g) : g;
5158 
5159       var b = source[2].toString(16);
5160       b = (b.length === 1) ? ('0' + b) : b;
5161 
5162       return r.toUpperCase() + g.toUpperCase() + b.toUpperCase();
5163     },
5164 
5165     /**
5166      * Gets value of alpha channel for this color
5167      * @method getAlpha
5168      * @return {Number} 0-1
5169      */
5170     getAlpha: function() {
5171       return this.getSource()[3];
5172     },
5173 
5174     /**
5175      * Sets value of alpha channel for this color
5176      * @method setAlpha
5177      * @param {Number} 0-1
5178      * @return {fabric.Color} thisArg
5179      */
5180     setAlpha: function(alpha) {
5181       var source = this.getSource();
5182       source[3] = alpha;
5183       this.setSource(source);
5184       return this;
5185     },
5186 
5187     /**
5188      * Transforms color to its grayscale representation
5189      * @method toGrayscale
5190      * @return {fabric.Color} thisArg
5191      */
5192     toGrayscale: function() {
5193       var source = this.getSource(),
5194           average = parseInt((source[0] * 0.3 + source[1] * 0.59 + source[2] * 0.11).toFixed(0), 10),
5195           currentAlpha = source[3];
5196       this.setSource([average, average, average, currentAlpha]);
5197       return this;
5198     },
5199 
5200     /**
5201      * Transforms color to its black and white representation
5202      * @method toGrayscale
5203      * @return {fabric.Color} thisArg
5204      */
5205     toBlackWhite: function(threshold) {
5206       var source = this.getSource(),
5207           average = (source[0] * 0.3 + source[1] * 0.59 + source[2] * 0.11).toFixed(0),
5208           currentAlpha = source[3];
5209 
5210       threshold = threshold || 127;
5211 
5212       average = (Number(average) < Number(threshold)) ? 0 : 255;
5213       this.setSource([average, average, average, currentAlpha]);
5214       return this;
5215     },
5216 
5217     /**
5218      * Overlays color with another color
5219      * @method overlayWith
5220      * @param {String|fabric.Color} otherColor
5221      * @return {fabric.Color} thisArg
5222      */
5223     overlayWith: function(otherColor) {
5224       if (!(otherColor instanceof Color)) {
5225         otherColor = new Color(otherColor);
5226       }
5227 
5228       var result = [],
5229           alpha = this.getAlpha(),
5230           otherAlpha = 0.5,
5231           source = this.getSource(),
5232           otherSource = otherColor.getSource();
5233 
5234       for (var i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
5235         result.push(Math.round((source[i] * (1 - otherAlpha)) + (otherSource[i] * otherAlpha)));
5236       }
5237 
5238       result[3] = alpha;
5239       this.setSource(result);
5240       return this;
5241     }
5242   };
5243 
5244   /**
5245    * Regex matching color in RGB or RGBA formats (ex: rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 100, 10, 0.5), rgb(1,1,1))
5246    * @static
5247    * @field
5248    */
5249   fabric.Color.reRGBa = /^rgba?\((\d{1,3})\s*,\s*(\d{1,3})\s*,\s*(\d{1,3})(?:\s*,\s*(\d+(?:\.\d+)?))?\)$/;
5250 
5251   /**
5252    * Regex matching color in HEX format (ex: #FF5555, 010155, aff)
5253    * @static
5254    * @field
5255    */
5256   fabric.Color.reHex = /^#?([0-9a-f]{6}|[0-9a-f]{3})$/i;
5257 
5258   /**
5259    * Returns new color object, when given a color in RGB format
5260    * @method fromRgb
5261    * @param {String} color ex: rgb(0-255,0-255,0-255)
5262    * @return {fabric.Color}
5263    */
5264   fabric.Color.fromRgb = function(color) {
5265     return Color.fromSource(Color.sourceFromRgb(color));
5266   };
5267 
5268   /**
5269    * Returns array represenatation (ex: [100, 100, 200, 1]) of a color that's in RGB or RGBA format
5270    * @method sourceFromRgb
5271    * @param {String} color ex: rgb(0-255,0-255,0-255)
5272    * @return {Array} source
5273    */
5274   fabric.Color.sourceFromRgb = function(color) {
5275     var match = color.match(Color.reRGBa);
5276     if (match) {
5277       return [
5278         parseInt(match[1], 10),
5279         parseInt(match[2], 10),
5280         parseInt(match[3], 10),
5281         match[4] ? parseFloat(match[4]) : 1
5282       ];
5283     }
5284   };
5285 
5286   /**
5287    * Returns new color object, when given a color in RGBA format
5288    * @static
5289    * @function
5290    * @method fromRgba
5291    * @param {String} color
5292    * @return {fabric.Color}
5293    */
5294   fabric.Color.fromRgba = Color.fromRgb;
5295 
5296   /**
5297    * Returns new color object, when given a color in HEX format
5298    * @static
5299    * @method fromHex
5300    * @return {fabric.Color}
5301    */
5302   fabric.Color.fromHex = function(color) {
5303     return Color.fromSource(Color.sourceFromHex(color));
5304   };
5305 
5306   /**
5307    * Returns array represenatation (ex: [100, 100, 200, 1]) of a color that's in HEX format
5308    * @static
5309    * @method sourceFromHex
5310    * @param {String} color ex: FF5555
5311    * @return {Array} source
5312    */
5313   fabric.Color.sourceFromHex = function(color) {
5314     if (color.match(Color.reHex)) {
5315       var value = color.slice(color.indexOf('#') + 1),
5316           isShortNotation = (value.length === 3),
5317           r = isShortNotation ? (value.charAt(0) + value.charAt(0)) : value.substring(0, 2),
5318           g = isShortNotation ? (value.charAt(1) + value.charAt(1)) : value.substring(2, 4),
5319           b = isShortNotation ? (value.charAt(2) + value.charAt(2)) : value.substring(4, 6);
5320 
5321       return [
5322         parseInt(r, 16),
5323         parseInt(g, 16),
5324         parseInt(b, 16),
5325         1
5326       ];
5327     }
5328   };
5329 
5330   /**
5331    * Returns new color object, when given color in array representation (ex: [200, 100, 100, 0.5])
5332    * @static
5333    * @method fromSource
5334    * @return {fabric.Color}
5335    */
5336   fabric.Color.fromSource = function(source) {
5337     var oColor = new Color();
5338     oColor.setSource(source);
5339     return oColor;
5340   };
5341 
5342 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
5343 (function () {
5344 
5345   "use strict";
5346 
5347   if (fabric.StaticCanvas) {
5348     fabric.warn('fabric.StaticCanvas is already defined.');
5349     return;
5350   }
5351 
5352   // aliases for faster resolution
5353   var extend = fabric.util.object.extend,
5354       getElementOffset = fabric.util.getElementOffset,
5355       removeFromArray = fabric.util.removeFromArray,
5356       removeListener = fabric.util.removeListener,
5357 
5358       CANVAS_INIT_ERROR = new Error('Could not initialize `canvas` element');
5359 
5360   /**
5361    * Static canvas class
5362    * @class fabric.StaticCanvas
5363    * @constructor
5364    * @param {HTMLElement | String} el <canvas> element to initialize instance on
5365    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
5366    */
5367   fabric.StaticCanvas = function (el, options) {
5368     options || (options = { });
5369 
5370     this._initStatic(el, options);
5371     fabric.StaticCanvas.activeInstance = this;
5372   };
5373 
5374   extend(fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype, fabric.Observable);
5375 
5376   extend(fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype, /** @scope fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype */ {
5377 
5378     /**
5379      * Background color of canvas instance
5380      * @property
5381      * @type String
5382      */
5383     backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)',
5384 
5385     /**
5386      * Background image of canvas instance
5387      * Should be set via `setBackgroundImage`
5388      * @property
5389      * @type String
5390      */
5391     backgroundImage: '',
5392 
5393     /**
5394      * Opacity of the background image of the canvas instance
5395      * @property
5396      * @type Float
5397      */
5398     backgroundImageOpacity: 1.0,
5399 
5400     /**
5401      * Indicates whether the background image should be stretched to fit the
5402      * dimensions of the canvas instance.
5403      * @property
5404      * @type Boolean
5405      */
5406     backgroundImageStretch: true,
5407 
5408     /**
5409      * Overlay image of canvas instance
5410      * Should be set via `setOverlayImage`
5411      * @property
5412      * @type String
5413      */
5414     overlayImage: '',
5415 
5416     /**
5417      * Left offset of overlay image (if present)
5418      * @property
5419      * @type Number
5420      */
5421     overlayImageLeft: 0,
5422 
5423     /**
5424      * Top offset of overlay image (if present)
5425      * @property
5426      * @type Number
5427      */
5428     overlayImageTop: 0,
5429 
5430     /**
5431      * Indicates whether toObject/toDatalessObject should include default values
5432      * @property
5433      * @type Boolean
5434      */
5435     includeDefaultValues: true,
5436 
5437     /**
5438      * Indicates whether objects' state should be saved
5439      * @property
5440      * @type Boolean
5441      */
5442     stateful: true,
5443 
5444     /**
5445      * Indicates whether {@link fabric.Canvas.prototype.add} should also re-render canvas.
5446      * Disabling this option could give a great performance boost when adding a lot of objects to canvas at once
5447      * (followed by a manual rendering after addition)
5448      * @property
5449      * @type Boolean
5450      */
5451     renderOnAddition: true,
5452 
5453     /**
5454      * Function that determines clipping of entire canvas area
5455      * Being passed context as first argument. See clipping canvas area in https://github.com/kangax/fabric.js/wiki/FAQ
5456      * @property
5457      * @type Function
5458      */
5459     clipTo: null,
5460 
5461     /**
5462      * Indicates whether object controls (borders/corners) are rendered above overlay image
5463      * @property
5464      * @type Boolean
5465      */
5466     controlsAboveOverlay: false,
5467 
5468     /**
5469      * Callback; invoked right before object is about to be scaled/rotated
5470      * @method onBeforeScaleRotate
5471      * @param {fabric.Object} target Object that's about to be scaled/rotated
5472      */
5473     onBeforeScaleRotate: function () {
5474       /* NOOP */
5475     },
5476 
5477      /**
5478       * @method _initStatic
5479       * @private
5480       */
5481     _initStatic: function(el, options) {
5482       this._objects = [];
5483 
5484       this._createLowerCanvas(el);
5485       this._initOptions(options);
5486 
5487       if (options.overlayImage) {
5488         this.setOverlayImage(options.overlayImage, this.renderAll.bind(this));
5489       }
5490       if (options.backgroundImage) {
5491         this.setBackgroundImage(options.backgroundImage, this.renderAll.bind(this));
5492       }
5493       this.calcOffset();
5494     },
5495 
5496     /**
5497      * Calculates canvas element offset relative to the document
5498      * This method is also attached as "resize" event handler of window
5499      * @method calcOffset
5500      * @return {fabric.Canvas} instance
5501      * @chainable
5502      */
5503     calcOffset: function () {
5504       this._offset = getElementOffset(this.lowerCanvasEl);
5505       return this;
5506     },
5507 
5508     /**
5509      * Sets overlay image for this canvas
5510      * @method setOverlayImage
5511      * @param {String} url url of an image to set overlay to
5512      * @param {Function} callback callback to invoke when image is loaded and set as an overlay
5513      * @param {Object} [options] optional options to set for the overlay image
5514      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
5515      * @chainable
5516      */
5517     setOverlayImage: function (url, callback, options) { // TODO (kangax): test callback
5518       fabric.util.loadImage(url, function(img) {
5519         this.overlayImage = img;
5520         if (options && ('overlayImageLeft' in options)) {
5521           this.overlayImageLeft = options.overlayImageLeft;
5522         }
5523         if (options && ('overlayImageTop' in options)) {
5524           this.overlayImageTop = options.overlayImageTop;
5525         }
5526         callback && callback();
5527       }, this);
5528 
5529       return this;
5530     },
5531 
5532     /**
5533      * Sets background image for this canvas
5534      * @method setBackgroundImage
5535      * @param {String} url url of an image to set background to
5536      * @param {Function} callback callback to invoke when image is loaded and set as background
5537      * @param {Object} [options] optional options to set for the background image
5538      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
5539      * @chainable
5540      */
5541     setBackgroundImage: function (url, callback, options) {
5542       fabric.util.loadImage(url, function(img) {
5543         this.backgroundImage = img;
5544         if (options && ('backgroundImageOpacity' in options)) {
5545           this.backgroundImageOpacity = options.backgroundImageOpacity;
5546         }
5547         if (options && ('backgroundImageStretch' in options)) {
5548           this.backgroundImageStretch = options.backgroundImageStretch;
5549         }
5550         callback && callback();
5551       }, this);
5552 
5553       return this;
5554     },
5555 
5556     /**
5557      * @private
5558      * @method _createCanvasElement
5559      */
5560     _createCanvasElement: function() {
5561       var element = fabric.document.createElement('canvas');
5562       if (!element.style) {
5563         element.style = { };
5564       }
5565       if (!element) {
5566         throw CANVAS_INIT_ERROR;
5567       }
5568       this._initCanvasElement(element);
5569       return element;
5570     },
5571 
5572     /**
5573      * @method _initCanvasElement
5574      * @param {HTMLElement} element
5575      */
5576     _initCanvasElement: function(element) {
5577       if (typeof element.getContext === 'undefined' &&
5578           typeof G_vmlCanvasManager !== 'undefined' &&
5579           G_vmlCanvasManager.initElement) {
5580 
5581         G_vmlCanvasManager.initElement(element);
5582       }
5583       if (typeof element.getContext === 'undefined') {
5584         throw CANVAS_INIT_ERROR;
5585       }
5586     },
5587 
5588     /**
5589      * @method _initOptions
5590      * @param {Object} [options]
5591      */
5592     _initOptions: function (options) {
5593       for (var prop in options) {
5594         this[prop] = options[prop];
5595       }
5596 
5597       this.width = parseInt(this.lowerCanvasEl.width, 10) || 0;
5598       this.height = parseInt(this.lowerCanvasEl.height, 10) || 0;
5599 
5600       if (!this.lowerCanvasEl.style) return;
5601 
5602       this.lowerCanvasEl.style.width = this.width + 'px';
5603       this.lowerCanvasEl.style.height = this.height + 'px';
5604     },
5605 
5606     /**
5607      * Creates a bottom canvas
5608      * @method _createLowerCanvas
5609      */
5610     _createLowerCanvas: function (canvasEl) {
5611       this.lowerCanvasEl = fabric.util.getById(canvasEl) || this._createCanvasElement();
5612       this._initCanvasElement(this.lowerCanvasEl);
5613 
5614       fabric.util.addClass(this.lowerCanvasEl, 'lower-canvas');
5615 
5616       if (this.interactive) {
5617         this._applyCanvasStyle(this.lowerCanvasEl);
5618       }
5619 
5620       this.contextContainer = this.lowerCanvasEl.getContext('2d');
5621     },
5622 
5623     /**
5624      * Returns canvas width (in px)
5625      * @method getWidth
5626      * @return {Number}
5627      */
5628     getWidth: function () {
5629       return this.width;
5630     },
5631 
5632     /**
5633      * Returns canvas height (in px)
5634      * @method getHeight
5635      * @return {Number}
5636      */
5637     getHeight: function () {
5638       return this.height;
5639     },
5640 
5641     /**
5642      * Sets width of this canvas instance
5643      * @method setWidth
5644      * @param {Number} width value to set width to
5645      * @return {fabric.Canvas} instance
5646      * @chainable true
5647      */
5648     setWidth: function (value) {
5649       return this._setDimension('width', value);
5650     },
5651 
5652     /**
5653      * Sets height of this canvas instance
5654      * @method setHeight
5655      * @param {Number} height value to set height to
5656      * @return {fabric.Canvas} instance
5657      * @chainable true
5658      */
5659     setHeight: function (value) {
5660       return this._setDimension('height', value);
5661     },
5662 
5663     /**
5664      * Sets dimensions (width, height) of this canvas instance
5665      * @method setDimensions
5666      * @param {Object} dimensions
5667      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
5668      * @chainable
5669      */
5670     setDimensions: function(dimensions) {
5671       for (var prop in dimensions) {
5672         this._setDimension(prop, dimensions[prop]);
5673       }
5674       return this;
5675     },
5676 
5677     /**
5678      * Helper for setting width/height
5679      * @private
5680      * @method _setDimensions
5681      * @param {String} prop property (width|height)
5682      * @param {Number} value value to set property to
5683      * @return {fabric.Canvas} instance
5684      * @chainable true
5685      */
5686     _setDimension: function (prop, value) {
5687       this.lowerCanvasEl[prop] = value;
5688       this.lowerCanvasEl.style[prop] = value + 'px';
5689 
5690       if (this.upperCanvasEl) {
5691         this.upperCanvasEl[prop] = value;
5692         this.upperCanvasEl.style[prop] = value + 'px';
5693       }
5694 
5695       if (this.cacheCanvasEl) {
5696         this.cacheCanvasEl[prop] = value;
5697       }
5698 
5699       if (this.wrapperEl) {
5700         this.wrapperEl.style[prop] = value + 'px';
5701       }
5702 
5703       this[prop] = value;
5704 
5705       this.calcOffset();
5706       this.renderAll();
5707 
5708       return this;
5709     },
5710 
5711     /**
5712      * Returns <canvas> element corresponding to this instance
5713      * @method getElement
5714      * @return {HTMLCanvasElement}
5715      */
5716     getElement: function () {
5717       return this.lowerCanvasEl;
5718     },
5719 
5720     /**
5721      * Returns currently selected object, if any
5722      * @method getActiveObject
5723      * @return {fabric.Object}
5724      */
5725     getActiveObject: function() {
5726       return null;
5727     },
5728 
5729     /**
5730      * Returns currently selected group of object, if any
5731      * @method getActiveGroup
5732      * @return {fabric.Group}
5733      */
5734     getActiveGroup: function() {
5735       return null;
5736     },
5737 
5738     /**
5739      * Given a context, renders an object on that context
5740      * @param ctx {Object} context to render object on
5741      * @param object {Object} object to render
5742      * @private
5743      */
5744     _draw: function (ctx, object) {
5745       if (!object) return;
5746 
5747       if (this.controlsAboveOverlay) {
5748         var hasBorders = object.hasBorders, hasCorners = object.hasCorners;
5749         object.hasBorders = object.hasCorners = false;
5750         object.render(ctx);
5751         object.hasBorders = hasBorders;
5752         object.hasCorners = hasCorners;
5753       }
5754       else {
5755         object.render(ctx);
5756       }
5757     },
5758 
5759     /**
5760      * Adds objects to canvas, then renders canvas (if `renderOnAddition` is not `false`).
5761      * Objects should be instances of (or inherit from) fabric.Object
5762      * @method add
5763      * @param [...] Zero or more fabric instances
5764      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
5765      * @chainable
5766      */
5767     add: function () {
5768       this._objects.push.apply(this._objects, arguments);
5769       for (var i = arguments.length; i--; ) {
5770         this._initObject(arguments[i]);
5771       }
5772       this.renderOnAddition && this.renderAll();
5773       return this;
5774     },
5775 
5776     /**
5777      * @private
5778      * @method _initObject
5779      */
5780     _initObject: function(obj) {
5781       this.stateful && obj.setupState();
5782       obj.setCoords();
5783       obj.canvas = this;
5784       this.fire('object:added', { target: obj });
5785       obj.fire('added');
5786     },
5787 
5788     /**
5789      * Inserts an object to canvas at specified index and renders canvas.
5790      * An object should be an instance of (or inherit from) fabric.Object
5791      * @method insertAt
5792      * @param object {Object} Object to insert
5793      * @param index {Number} index to insert object at
5794      * @param nonSplicing {Boolean} when `true`, no splicing (shifting) of objects occurs
5795      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
5796      * @chainable
5797      */
5798     insertAt: function (object, index, nonSplicing) {
5799       if (nonSplicing) {
5800         this._objects[index] = object;
5801       }
5802       else {
5803         this._objects.splice(index, 0, object);
5804       }
5805       this._initObject(object);
5806       this.renderOnAddition && this.renderAll();
5807       return this;
5808     },
5809 
5810     /**
5811      * Returns an array of objects this instance has
5812      * @method getObjects
5813      * @return {Array}
5814      */
5815     getObjects: function () {
5816       return this._objects;
5817     },
5818 
5819     /**
5820      * Clears specified context of canvas element
5821      * @method clearContext
5822      * @param context {Object} ctx context to clear
5823      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
5824      * @chainable
5825      */
5826     clearContext: function(ctx) {
5827       ctx.clearRect(0, 0, this.width, this.height);
5828       return this;
5829     },
5830 
5831     /**
5832      * Returns context of canvas where objects are drawn
5833      * @method getContext
5834      * @return {CanvasRenderingContext2D}
5835      */
5836     getContext: function () {
5837       return this.contextContainer;
5838     },
5839 
5840     /**
5841      * Clears all contexts (background, main, top) of an instance
5842      * @method clear
5843      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
5844      * @chainable
5845      */
5846     clear: function () {
5847       this._objects.length = 0;
5848       this.clearContext(this.contextContainer);
5849       if (this.contextTop) {
5850         this.clearContext(this.contextTop);
5851       }
5852       this.renderAll();
5853       return this;
5854     },
5855 
5856     /**
5857      * Renders both the top canvas and the secondary container canvas.
5858      * @method renderAll
5859      * @param allOnTop {Boolean} optional Whether we want to force all images to be rendered on the top canvas
5860      * @return {fabric.Canvas} instance
5861      * @chainable
5862      */
5863     renderAll: function (allOnTop) {
5864 
5865       var canvasToDrawOn = this[(allOnTop === true && this.interactive) ? 'contextTop' : 'contextContainer'];
5866 
5867       if (this.contextTop) {
5868         this.clearContext(this.contextTop);
5869       }
5870 
5871       if (!allOnTop) {
5872         this.clearContext(canvasToDrawOn);
5873       }
5874 
5875       var activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup();
5876 
5877       if (this.clipTo) {
5878         this._clipCanvas(canvasToDrawOn);
5879       }
5880 
5881       canvasToDrawOn.fillStyle = this.backgroundColor;
5882       canvasToDrawOn.fillRect(0, 0, this.width, this.height);
5883 
5884       if (typeof this.backgroundImage === 'object') {
5885         this._drawBackroundImage(canvasToDrawOn);
5886       }
5887 
5888       this.fire('before:render');
5889 
5890       for (var i = 0, length = this._objects.length; i < length; ++i) {
5891         if (!activeGroup ||
5892             (activeGroup && this._objects[i] && !activeGroup.contains(this._objects[i]))) {
5893           this._draw(canvasToDrawOn, this._objects[i]);
5894         }
5895       }
5896 
5897       // delegate rendering to group selection (if one exists)
5898       if (activeGroup) {
5899         //Store objects in group preserving order, then replace
5900         var sortedObjects = [];
5901         this.forEachObject(function (object) {
5902             if (activeGroup.contains(object)) {
5903                 sortedObjects.push(object);
5904             }
5905         });
5906         activeGroup._set('objects', sortedObjects);
5907         this._draw(canvasToDrawOn, activeGroup);
5908       }
5909 
5910       if (this.clipTo) {
5911         canvasToDrawOn.restore();
5912       }
5913 
5914       if (this.overlayImage) {
5915         canvasToDrawOn.drawImage(this.overlayImage, this.overlayImageLeft, this.overlayImageTop);
5916       }
5917 
5918       if (this.controlsAboveOverlay) {
5919         this.drawControls(canvasToDrawOn);
5920       }
5921 
5922       this.fire('after:render');
5923 
5924       return this;
5925     },
5926 
5927     /**
5928      * @private
5929      * @method _clipCanvas
5930      */
5931     _clipCanvas: function(canvasToDrawOn) {
5932       canvasToDrawOn.save();
5933       canvasToDrawOn.beginPath();
5934       this.clipTo(canvasToDrawOn);
5935       canvasToDrawOn.clip();
5936     },
5937 
5938     /**
5939      * @private
5940      * @method _drawBackroundImage
5941      */
5942     _drawBackroundImage: function(canvasToDrawOn) {
5943       canvasToDrawOn.save();
5944       canvasToDrawOn.globalAlpha = this.backgroundImageOpacity;
5945 
5946       if (this.backgroundImageStretch) {
5947         canvasToDrawOn.drawImage(this.backgroundImage, 0, 0, this.width, this.height);
5948       }
5949       else {
5950         canvasToDrawOn.drawImage(this.backgroundImage, 0, 0);
5951       }
5952       canvasToDrawOn.restore();
5953     },
5954 
5955     /**
5956      * Method to render only the top canvas.
5957      * Also used to render the group selection box.
5958      * @method renderTop
5959      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
5960      * @chainable
5961      */
5962     renderTop: function () {
5963       var ctx = this.contextTop || this.contextContainer;
5964       this.clearContext(ctx);
5965 
5966       // we render the top context - last object
5967       if (this.selection && this._groupSelector) {
5968         this._drawSelection();
5969       }
5970 
5971       // delegate rendering to group selection if one exists
5972       // used for drawing selection borders/corners
5973       var activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup();
5974       if (activeGroup) {
5975         activeGroup.render(ctx);
5976       }
5977 
5978       if (this.overlayImage) {
5979         ctx.drawImage(this.overlayImage, this.overlayImageLeft, this.overlayImageTop);
5980       }
5981 
5982       this.fire('after:render');
5983 
5984       return this;
5985     },
5986 
5987     /**
5988      * Draws objects' controls (borders/corners)
5989      * @method drawControls
5990      * @param {Object} ctx context to render controls on
5991      */
5992     drawControls: function(ctx) {
5993       var activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup();
5994       if (activeGroup) {
5995         ctx.save();
5996         fabric.Group.prototype.transform.call(activeGroup, ctx);
5997         activeGroup.drawBorders(ctx).drawCorners(ctx);
5998         ctx.restore();
5999       }
6000       else {
6001         for (var i = 0, len = this._objects.length; i < len; ++i) {
6002           if (!this._objects[i] || !this._objects[i].active) continue;
6003 
6004           ctx.save();
6005           fabric.Object.prototype.transform.call(this._objects[i], ctx);
6006           this._objects[i].drawBorders(ctx).drawCorners(ctx);
6007           ctx.restore();
6008 
6009           this.lastRenderedObjectWithControlsAboveOverlay = this._objects[i];
6010         }
6011       }
6012     },
6013 
6014     /**
6015      * Exports canvas element to a dataurl image.
6016      * @method toDataURL
6017      * @param {String} format the format of the output image. Either "jpeg" or "png".
6018      * @param {Number} quality quality level (0..1)
6019      * @return {String}
6020      */
6021     toDataURL: function (format, quality) {
6022       var canvasEl = this.upperCanvasEl || this.lowerCanvasEl;
6023 
6024       this.renderAll(true);
6025       var data = (fabric.StaticCanvas.supports('toDataURLWithQuality'))
6026                    ? canvasEl.toDataURL('image/' + format, quality)
6027                    : canvasEl.toDataURL('image/' + format);
6028       this.renderAll();
6029       return data;
6030     },
6031 
6032     /**
6033      * Exports canvas element to a dataurl image (allowing to change image size via multiplier).
6034      * @method toDataURLWithMultiplier
6035      * @param {String} format (png|jpeg)
6036      * @param {Number} multiplier
6037      * @param {Number} quality (0..1)
6038      * @return {String}
6039      */
6040     toDataURLWithMultiplier: function (format, multiplier, quality) {
6041 
6042       var origWidth = this.getWidth(),
6043           origHeight = this.getHeight(),
6044           scaledWidth = origWidth * multiplier,
6045           scaledHeight = origHeight * multiplier,
6046           activeObject = this.getActiveObject(),
6047           activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup(),
6048 
6049           ctx = this.contextTop || this.contextContainer;
6050 
6051       this.setWidth(scaledWidth).setHeight(scaledHeight);
6052       ctx.scale(multiplier, multiplier);
6053 
6054       if (activeGroup) {
6055         // not removing group due to complications with restoring it with correct state afterwords
6056         this._tempRemoveBordersCornersFromGroup(activeGroup);
6057       }
6058       else if (activeObject && this.deactivateAll) {
6059         this.deactivateAll();
6060       }
6061 
6062       // restoring width, height for `renderAll` to draw
6063       // background properly (while context is scaled)
6064       this.width = origWidth;
6065       this.height = origHeight;
6066 
6067       this.renderAll(true);
6068 
6069       var dataURL = this.toDataURL(format, quality);
6070 
6071       ctx.scale(1 / multiplier,  1 / multiplier);
6072       this.setWidth(origWidth).setHeight(origHeight);
6073 
6074       if (activeGroup) {
6075         this._restoreBordersCornersOnGroup(activeGroup);
6076       }
6077       else if (activeObject && this.setActiveObject) {
6078         this.setActiveObject(activeObject);
6079       }
6080 
6081       this.renderAll();
6082 
6083       return dataURL;
6084     },
6085 
6086     /**
6087      * @private
6088      * @method _tempRemoveBordersCornersFromGroup
6089      */
6090     _tempRemoveBordersCornersFromGroup: function(group) {
6091       group.origHideCorners = group.hideCorners;
6092       group.origBorderColor = group.borderColor;
6093 
6094       group.hideCorners = true;
6095       group.borderColor = 'rgba(0,0,0,0)';
6096 
6097       group.forEachObject(function(o) {
6098         o.origBorderColor = o.borderColor;
6099         o.borderColor = 'rgba(0,0,0,0)';
6100       });
6101     },
6102 
6103     /**
6104      * @private
6105      * @method _restoreBordersCornersOnGroup
6106      */
6107     _restoreBordersCornersOnGroup: function(group) {
6108       group.hideCorners = group.origHideCorners;
6109       group.borderColor = group.origBorderColor;
6110 
6111       group.forEachObject(function(o) {
6112         o.borderColor = o.origBorderColor;
6113         delete o.origBorderColor;
6114       });
6115     },
6116 
6117     /**
6118      * Returns coordinates of a center of canvas.
6119      * Returned value is an object with top and left properties
6120      * @method getCenter
6121      * @return {Object} object with "top" and "left" number values
6122      */
6123     getCenter: function () {
6124       return {
6125         top: this.getHeight() / 2,
6126         left: this.getWidth() / 2
6127       };
6128     },
6129 
6130     /**
6131      * Centers object horizontally.
6132      * @method centerObjectH
6133      * @param {fabric.Object} object Object to center
6134      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
6135      */
6136     centerObjectH: function (object) {
6137       object.set('left', this.getCenter().left);
6138       this.renderAll();
6139       return this;
6140     },
6141 
6142     /**
6143      * Centers object vertically.
6144      * @method centerObjectH
6145      * @param {fabric.Object} object Object to center
6146      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
6147      * @chainable
6148      */
6149     centerObjectV: function (object) {
6150       object.set('top', this.getCenter().top);
6151       this.renderAll();
6152       return this;
6153     },
6154 
6155     /**
6156      * Centers object vertically and horizontally.
6157      * @method centerObject
6158      * @param {fabric.Object} object Object to center
6159      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
6160      * @chainable
6161      */
6162     centerObject: function (object) {
6163       return this.centerObjectH(object).centerObjectV(object);
6164     },
6165 
6166     /**
6167      * Returs dataless JSON representation of canvas
6168      * @method toDatalessJSON
6169      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
6170      * @return {String} json string
6171      */
6172     toDatalessJSON: function (propertiesToInclude) {
6173       return this.toDatalessObject(propertiesToInclude);
6174     },
6175 
6176     /**
6177      * Returns object representation of canvas
6178      * @method toObject
6179      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
6180      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
6181      */
6182     toObject: function (propertiesToInclude) {
6183       return this._toObjectMethod('toObject', propertiesToInclude);
6184     },
6185 
6186     /**
6187      * Returns dataless object representation of canvas
6188      * @method toDatalessObject
6189      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
6190      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
6191      */
6192     toDatalessObject: function (propertiesToInclude) {
6193       return this._toObjectMethod('toDatalessObject', propertiesToInclude);
6194     },
6195 
6196     /**
6197      * @private
6198      * @method _toObjectMethod
6199      */
6200     _toObjectMethod: function (methodName, propertiesToInclude) {
6201       var data = {
6202         objects: this._objects.map(function (instance) {
6203           // TODO (kangax): figure out how to clean this up
6204           var originalValue;
6205           if (!this.includeDefaultValues) {
6206             originalValue = instance.includeDefaultValues;
6207             instance.includeDefaultValues = false;
6208           }
6209           var object = instance[methodName](propertiesToInclude);
6210           if (!this.includeDefaultValues) {
6211             instance.includeDefaultValues = originalValue;
6212           }
6213           return object;
6214         }, this),
6215         background: this.backgroundColor
6216       };
6217       if (this.backgroundImage) {
6218         data.backgroundImage = this.backgroundImage.src;
6219         data.backgroundImageOpacity = this.backgroundImageOpacity;
6220         data.backgroundImageStretch = this.backgroundImageStretch;
6221       }
6222       if (this.overlayImage) {
6223         data.overlayImage = this.overlayImage.src;
6224         data.overlayImageLeft = this.overlayImageLeft;
6225         data.overlayImageTop = this.overlayImageTop;
6226       }
6227       fabric.util.populateWithProperties(this, data, propertiesToInclude);
6228       return data;
6229     },
6230 
6231     /**
6232      * Returns SVG representation of canvas
6233      * @function
6234      * @method toSVG
6235      * @return {String}
6236      */
6237     toSVG: function() {
6238       var markup = [
6239         '<?xml version="1.0" standalone="no" ?>',
6240           '<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 20010904//EN" ',
6241             '"http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-SVG-20010904/DTD/svg10.dtd">',
6242           '<svg ',
6243             'xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" ',
6244             'xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" ',
6245             'version="1.1" ',
6246             'width="', this.width, '" ',
6247             'height="', this.height, '" ',
6248             'xml:space="preserve">',
6249           '<desc>Created with Fabric.js ', fabric.version, '</desc>',
6250           fabric.createSVGFontFacesMarkup(this.getObjects())
6251       ];
6252 
6253       if (this.backgroundImage) {
6254         markup.push(
6255           '<image x="0" y="0" ',
6256             'width="', this.width,
6257             '" height="', this.height,
6258             '" preserveAspectRatio="', (this.backgroundImageStretch ? 'none' : 'defer'),
6259             '" xlink:href="', this.backgroundImage.src,
6260             '" style="opacity:', this.backgroundImageOpacity,
6261           '"></image>'
6262         );
6263       }
6264 
6265       if (this.overlayImage) {
6266         markup.push(
6267           '<image x="', this.overlayImageLeft,
6268             '" y="', this.overlayImageTop,
6269             '" width="', this.overlayImage.width,
6270             '" height="', this.overlayImage.height,
6271             '" xlink:href="', this.overlayImage.src,
6272           '"></image>'
6273         );
6274       }
6275 
6276       for (var i = 0, objects = this.getObjects(), len = objects.length; i < len; i++) {
6277         markup.push(objects[i].toSVG());
6278       }
6279       markup.push('</svg>');
6280 
6281       return markup.join('');
6282     },
6283 
6284     /**
6285      * Returns true if canvas contains no objects
6286      * @method isEmpty
6287      * @return {Boolean} true if canvas is empty
6288      */
6289     isEmpty: function () {
6290       return this._objects.length === 0;
6291     },
6292 
6293     /**
6294      * Removes an object from canvas and returns it
6295      * @method remove
6296      * @param object {Object} Object to remove
6297      * @return {Object} removed object
6298      */
6299     remove: function (object) {
6300       removeFromArray(this._objects, object);
6301       if (this.getActiveObject() === object) {
6302 
6303         // removing active object should fire "selection:cleared" events
6304         this.fire('before:selection:cleared', { target: object });
6305         this.discardActiveObject();
6306         this.fire('selection:cleared');
6307       }
6308       this.renderAll();
6309       return object;
6310     },
6311 
6312     /**
6313      * Moves an object to the bottom of the stack of drawn objects
6314      * @method sendToBack
6315      * @param object {fabric.Object} Object to send to back
6316      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
6317      * @chainable
6318      */
6319     sendToBack: function (object) {
6320       removeFromArray(this._objects, object);
6321       this._objects.unshift(object);
6322       return this.renderAll();
6323     },
6324 
6325     /**
6326      * Moves an object to the top of the stack of drawn objects
6327      * @method bringToFront
6328      * @param object {fabric.Object} Object to send
6329      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
6330      * @chainable
6331      */
6332     bringToFront: function (object) {
6333       removeFromArray(this._objects, object);
6334       this._objects.push(object);
6335       return this.renderAll();
6336     },
6337 
6338     /**
6339      * Moves an object one level down in stack of drawn objects
6340      * @method sendBackwards
6341      * @param object {fabric.Object} Object to send
6342      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
6343      * @chainable
6344      */
6345     sendBackwards: function (object) {
6346       var idx = this._objects.indexOf(object),
6347           nextIntersectingIdx = idx;
6348 
6349       // if object is not on the bottom of stack
6350       if (idx !== 0) {
6351 
6352         // traverse down the stack looking for the nearest intersecting object
6353         for (var i=idx-1; i>=0; --i) {
6354 
6355           var isIntersecting = object.intersectsWithObject(this._objects[i]) ||
6356                                object.isContainedWithinObject(this._objects[i]) ||
6357                                this._objects[i].isContainedWithinObject(object);
6358 
6359           if (isIntersecting) {
6360             nextIntersectingIdx = i;
6361             break;
6362           }
6363         }
6364         removeFromArray(this._objects, object);
6365         this._objects.splice(nextIntersectingIdx, 0, object);
6366       }
6367       return this.renderAll();
6368     },
6369 
6370     /**
6371      * Moves an object one level up in stack of drawn objects
6372      * @method bringForward
6373      * @param object {fabric.Object} Object to send
6374      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
6375      * @chainable
6376      */
6377     bringForward: function (object) {
6378       var objects = this.getObjects(),
6379           idx = objects.indexOf(object),
6380           nextIntersectingIdx = idx;
6381 
6382 
6383       // if object is not on top of stack (last item in an array)
6384       if (idx !== objects.length-1) {
6385 
6386         // traverse up the stack looking for the nearest intersecting object
6387         for (var i = idx + 1, l = this._objects.length; i < l; ++i) {
6388 
6389           var isIntersecting = object.intersectsWithObject(objects[i]) ||
6390                                object.isContainedWithinObject(this._objects[i]) ||
6391                                this._objects[i].isContainedWithinObject(object);
6392 
6393           if (isIntersecting) {
6394             nextIntersectingIdx = i;
6395             break;
6396           }
6397         }
6398         removeFromArray(objects, object);
6399         objects.splice(nextIntersectingIdx, 0, object);
6400       }
6401       this.renderAll();
6402     },
6403 
6404     /**
6405      * Returns object at specified index
6406      * @method item
6407      * @param {Number} index
6408      * @return {fabric.Object}
6409      */
6410     item: function (index) {
6411       return this.getObjects()[index];
6412     },
6413 
6414     /**
6415      * Returns number representation of an instance complexity
6416      * @method complexity
6417      * @return {Number} complexity
6418      */
6419     complexity: function () {
6420       return this.getObjects().reduce(function (memo, current) {
6421         memo += current.complexity ? current.complexity() : 0;
6422         return memo;
6423       }, 0);
6424     },
6425 
6426     /**
6427      * Iterates over all objects, invoking callback for each one of them
6428      * @method forEachObject
6429      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
6430      */
6431     forEachObject: function(callback, context) {
6432       var objects = this.getObjects(),
6433           i = objects.length;
6434       while (i--) {
6435         callback.call(context, objects[i], i, objects);
6436       }
6437       return this;
6438     },
6439 
6440     /**
6441      * Clears a canvas element and removes all event handlers.
6442      * @method dispose
6443      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
6444      * @chainable
6445      */
6446     dispose: function () {
6447       this.clear();
6448       if (this.interactive) {
6449         removeListener(this.upperCanvasEl, 'mousedown', this._onMouseDown);
6450         removeListener(this.upperCanvasEl, 'mousemove', this._onMouseMove);
6451         removeListener(fabric.window, 'resize', this._onResize);
6452       }
6453       return this;
6454     },
6455 
6456     /**
6457      * @private
6458      * @method _resizeImageToFit
6459      * @param {HTMLImageElement} imgEl
6460      */
6461     _resizeImageToFit: function (imgEl) {
6462 
6463       var imageWidth = imgEl.width || imgEl.offsetWidth,
6464           widthScaleFactor = this.getWidth() / imageWidth;
6465 
6466       // scale image down so that it has original dimensions when printed in large resolution
6467       if (imageWidth) {
6468         imgEl.width = imageWidth * widthScaleFactor;
6469       }
6470     }
6471   });
6472 
6473   /**
6474    * Returns a string representation of an instance
6475    * @method toString
6476    * @return {String} string representation of an instance
6477    */
6478   fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.toString = function () { // Assign explicitly since `extend` doesn't take care of DontEnum bug yet
6479     return '#<fabric.Canvas (' + this.complexity() + '): '+
6480            '{ objects: ' + this.getObjects().length + ' }>';
6481   };
6482 
6483   extend(fabric.StaticCanvas, /** @scope fabric.StaticCanvas */ {
6484 
6485     /**
6486      * @static
6487      * @property EMPTY_JSON
6488      * @type String
6489      */
6490     EMPTY_JSON: '{"objects": [], "background": "white"}',
6491 
6492     /**
6493      * Takes <canvas> element and transforms its data in such way that it becomes grayscale
6494      * @static
6495      * @method toGrayscale
6496      * @param {HTMLCanvasElement} canvasEl
6497      */
6498     toGrayscale: function (canvasEl) {
6499        var context = canvasEl.getContext('2d'),
6500            imageData = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvasEl.width, canvasEl.height),
6501            data = imageData.data,
6502            iLen = imageData.width,
6503            jLen = imageData.height,
6504            index, average, i, j;
6505 
6506        for (i = 0; i < iLen; i++) {
6507          for (j = 0; j < jLen; j++) {
6508 
6509            index = (i * 4) * jLen + (j * 4);
6510            average = (data[index] + data[index + 1] + data[index + 2]) / 3;
6511 
6512            data[index]     = average;
6513            data[index + 1] = average;
6514            data[index + 2] = average;
6515          }
6516        }
6517 
6518        context.putImageData(imageData, 0, 0);
6519      },
6520 
6521     /**
6522      * Provides a way to check support of some of the canvas methods
6523      * (either those of HTMLCanvasElement itself, or rendering context)
6524      *
6525      * @method supports
6526      * @param methodName {String} Method to check support for;
6527      *                            Could be one of "getImageData", "toDataURL" or "toDataURLWithQuality"
6528      * @return {Boolean | null} `true` if method is supported (or at least exists),
6529      *                          `null` if canvas element or context can not be initialized
6530      */
6531     supports: function (methodName) {
6532       var el = fabric.document.createElement('canvas');
6533 
6534       if (typeof G_vmlCanvasManager !== 'undefined') {
6535         G_vmlCanvasManager.initElement(el);
6536       }
6537       if (!el || !el.getContext) {
6538         return null;
6539       }
6540 
6541       var ctx = el.getContext('2d');
6542       if (!ctx) {
6543         return null;
6544       }
6545 
6546       switch (methodName) {
6547 
6548         case 'getImageData':
6549           return typeof ctx.getImageData !== 'undefined';
6550 
6551         case 'toDataURL':
6552           return typeof el.toDataURL !== 'undefined';
6553 
6554         case 'toDataURLWithQuality':
6555           try {
6556             el.toDataURL('image/jpeg', 0);
6557             return true;
6558           }
6559           catch (e) { }
6560           return false;
6561 
6562         default:
6563           return null;
6564       }
6565     }
6566   });
6567 
6568   /**
6569    * Returs JSON representation of canvas
6570    * @function
6571    * @method toJSON
6572    * @return {String} json string
6573    */
6574   fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.toJSON = fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.toObject;
6575 
6576 })();
6577 
6578 (function(global) {
6579 
6580   "use strict";
6581 
6582   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { });
6583 
6584   var utilMin = fabric.util.array.min,
6585       utilMax = fabric.util.array.max;
6586 
6587   if (fabric.FreeDrawing) {
6588     fabric.warn('fabric.FreeDrawing is already defined');
6589     return;
6590   }
6591 
6592   /**
6593    * Free drawing class
6594    * Free Drawer handles scribbling on a fabric canvas
6595    * It converts the hand writting to a SVG Path and adds this path to the canvas
6596    *
6597    * @class FreeDrawing
6598    * @memberOf fabric
6599    */
6600   fabric.FreeDrawing = fabric.util.createClass( /** @scope fabric.FreeDrawing.prototype */ {
6601 
6602     /**
6603      * Constructor
6604      * @metod initialize
6605      * @param fabricCanvas {fabric.Canvas}
6606      * @return {fabric.FreeDrawing}
6607      */
6608     initialize: function(fabricCanvas) {
6609       this.canvas = fabricCanvas;
6610       this._points = [];
6611     },
6612 
6613     /**
6614      * @private
6615      * @method _addPoint
6616      *
6617      */
6618     _addPoint: function(point) {
6619       this._points.push(point);
6620     },
6621 
6622     /**
6623      * Clear points array and set contextTop canvas
6624      * style.
6625      *
6626      * @private
6627      * @method _reset
6628      *
6629      */
6630     _reset: function() {
6631       this._points.length = 0;
6632       var ctx = this.canvas.contextTop;
6633 
6634       // set freehanddrawing line canvas parameters
6635       ctx.strokeStyle = this.canvas.freeDrawingColor;
6636       ctx.lineWidth = this.canvas.freeDrawingLineWidth;
6637       ctx.lineCap = ctx.lineJoin = 'round';
6638     },
6639 
6640      /**
6641      * @method _prepareForDrawing
6642      */
6643      _prepareForDrawing: function(pointer) {
6644 
6645       this.canvas._isCurrentlyDrawing = true;
6646       this.canvas.discardActiveObject().renderAll();
6647 
6648       var p = new fabric.Point(pointer.x, pointer.y);
6649       this._reset();
6650       this._addPoint(p);
6651       this.canvas.contextTop.moveTo(p.x, p.y);
6652     },
6653 
6654     /**
6655      * @private
6656      * @method _captureDrawingPath
6657      *
6658      * @param point {pointer} (fabric.util.pointer) actual mouse position
6659      *   related to the canvas.
6660      */
6661     _captureDrawingPath: function(pointer) {
6662       var pointerPoint = new fabric.Point(pointer.x, pointer.y);
6663       this._addPoint(pointerPoint);
6664     },
6665 
6666     /**
6667      * Draw a smooth path on the topCanvas using
6668      * quadraticCurveTo.
6669      *
6670      * @private
6671      * @method _render
6672      *
6673      */
6674     _render: function() {
6675       var ctx  = this.canvas.contextTop;
6676       ctx.beginPath();
6677 
6678       var p1 = this._points[0];
6679       var p2 = this._points[1];
6680 
6681       ctx.moveTo(p1.x, p1.y);
6682 
6683       for (var i = 1, len = this._points.length; i < len; i++) {
6684         // we pick the point between pi+1 & pi+2 as the
6685         // end point and p1 as our control point.
6686         var midPoint = p1.midPointFrom(p2);
6687         ctx.quadraticCurveTo(p1.x, p1.y, midPoint.x, midPoint.y);
6688 
6689         p1 = this._points[i];
6690         p2 = this._points[i+1];
6691       }
6692       // Draw last line as a straight line while
6693       // we wait for the next point to be able to calculate
6694       // the bezier control point
6695       ctx.lineTo(p1.x, p1.y);
6696       ctx.stroke();
6697     },
6698 
6699     /**
6700      * Return an SVG path based on our
6701      * captured points and their boundinb box.
6702      *
6703      * @private
6704      * @method _getSVGPathData
6705      *
6706      */
6707     _getSVGPathData: function() {
6708       this.box = this.getPathBoundingBox(this._points);
6709       return this.convertPointsToSVGPath(
6710         this._points, this.box.minx, this.box.maxx, this.box.miny, this.box.maxy);
6711      },
6712 
6713      /**
6714       * Returns bounding box of a path based on given points
6715       * @method getPathBoundingBox
6716       * @param {Array} points
6717       * @return {Object} object with minx, miny, maxx, maxy
6718       */
6719      getPathBoundingBox: function(points) {
6720       var xBounds = [],
6721           yBounds = [],
6722           p1 = points[0],
6723           p2 = points[1],
6724           startPoint = p1;
6725 
6726       for (var i = 1, len = points.length; i < len; i++) {
6727         var midPoint = p1.midPointFrom(p2);
6728         // with startPoint, p1 as control point, midpoint as end point
6729         xBounds.push(startPoint.x);
6730         xBounds.push(midPoint.x);
6731         yBounds.push(startPoint.y);
6732         yBounds.push(midPoint.y);
6733 
6734         p1 = points[i];
6735         p2 = points[i+1];
6736         startPoint = midPoint;
6737      } // end for
6738 
6739      xBounds.push(p1.x);
6740      yBounds.push(p1.y);
6741 
6742      return {
6743        minx: utilMin(xBounds),
6744        miny: utilMin(yBounds),
6745        maxx: utilMax(xBounds),
6746        maxy: utilMax(yBounds)
6747      };
6748     },
6749 
6750     /**
6751      * Converts points to SVG path
6752      * @method convertPointsToSVGPath
6753      * @param {Array} points Array of points
6754      * @return {String} SVG path
6755      */
6756     convertPointsToSVGPath: function(points, minX, maxX, minY, maxY) {
6757       var path = [];
6758       var p1 = new fabric.Point(points[0].x - minX, points[0].y - minY);
6759       var p2 = new fabric.Point(points[1].x - minX, points[1].y - minY);
6760 
6761       path.push('M ', points[0].x - minX, ' ', points[0].y - minY, ' ');
6762       for (var i = 1, len = points.length; i < len; i++) {
6763         var midPoint = p1.midPointFrom(p2);
6764         // p1 is our bezier control point
6765         // midpoint is our endpoint
6766         // start point is p(i-1) value.
6767         path.push('Q ', p1.x, ' ', p1.y, ' ', midPoint.x, ' ', midPoint.y, ' ');
6768         p1 = new fabric.Point(points[i].x - minX, points[i].y - minY);
6769         if ((i+1) < points.length) {
6770           p2 = new fabric.Point(points[i+1].x - minX, points[i+1].y - minY);
6771         }
6772       }
6773       path.push('L ', p1.x, ' ', p1.y, ' ');
6774       return path;
6775     },
6776 
6777     /**
6778      * On mouseup after drawing the path on contextTop canvas
6779      * we use the points captured to create an new fabric path object
6780      * and add it to the fabric canvas.
6781      *
6782      * @method _finalizeAndAddPath
6783      */
6784     _finalizeAndAddPath: function() {
6785       this.canvas._isCurrentlyDrawing = false;
6786       var ctx = this.canvas.contextTop;
6787       ctx.closePath();
6788       var path = this._getSVGPathData();
6789       path = path.join('');
6790 
6791       if (path === "M 0 0 Q 0 0 0 0 L 0 0") {
6792         // do not create 0 width/height paths, as they are
6793         // rendered inconsistently across browsers
6794         // Firefox 4, for example, renders a dot,
6795         // whereas Chrome 10 renders nothing
6796         this.canvas.renderAll();
6797         return;
6798       }
6799 
6800       var p = new fabric.Path(path);
6801       p.fill = null;
6802       p.stroke = this.canvas.freeDrawingColor;
6803       p.strokeWidth = this.canvas.freeDrawingLineWidth;
6804       this.canvas.add(p);
6805 
6806       // set path origin coordinates based on our bounding box
6807       var originLeft = this.box.minx  + (this.box.maxx - this.box.minx) /2;
6808       var originTop = this.box.miny  + (this.box.maxy - this.box.miny) /2;
6809 
6810       this.canvas.contextTop.arc(originLeft, originTop, 3, 0, Math.PI * 2, false);
6811 
6812       p.set({ left: originLeft, top: originTop });
6813 
6814       // does not change position
6815       p.setCoords();
6816 
6817       this.canvas.renderAll();
6818 
6819       // fire event 'path' created
6820       this.canvas.fire('path:created', { path: p });
6821     }
6822   });
6823 
6824 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
6825 
6826 (function() {
6827 
6828   var extend = fabric.util.object.extend,
6829       getPointer = fabric.util.getPointer,
6830       addListener = fabric.util.addListener,
6831       removeListener = fabric.util.removeListener,
6832       degreesToRadians = fabric.util.degreesToRadians,
6833       radiansToDegrees = fabric.util.radiansToDegrees,
6834       cursorMap = {
6835         'tr': 'ne-resize',
6836         'br': 'se-resize',
6837         'bl': 'sw-resize',
6838         'tl': 'nw-resize',
6839         'ml': 'w-resize',
6840         'mt': 'n-resize',
6841         'mr': 'e-resize',
6842         'mb': 's-resize'
6843       },
6844 
6845       sqrt = Math.sqrt,
6846       atan2 = Math.atan2,
6847       abs = Math.abs,
6848       min = Math.min,
6849       max = Math.max,
6850 
6851       STROKE_OFFSET = 0.5;
6852 
6853   /**
6854    * Canvas class
6855    * @class fabric.Canvas
6856    * @constructor
6857    * @extends fabric.StaticCanvas
6858    * @param {HTMLElement | String} el <canvas> element to initialize instance on
6859    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
6860    */
6861   fabric.Canvas = function(el, options) {
6862     options || (options = { });
6863 
6864     this._initStatic(el, options);
6865     this._initInteractive();
6866     this._createCacheCanvas();
6867 
6868     fabric.Canvas.activeInstance = this;
6869   };
6870 
6871   function ProtoProxy(){ }
6872   ProtoProxy.prototype = fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype;
6873   fabric.Canvas.prototype = new ProtoProxy();
6874 
6875   var InteractiveMethods = /** @scope fabric.Canvas.prototype */ {
6876 
6877     /**
6878      * When true, objects can be transformed by one side (unproportionally)
6879      * @property
6880      * @type Boolean
6881      */
6882     uniScaleTransform:      false,
6883 
6884     /**
6885      * When true, objects use center point as the origin of transformation
6886      * @property
6887      * @type Boolean
6888      */
6889     centerTransform:        false,
6890 
6891     /**
6892      * Indicates that canvas is interactive. This property should not be changed.
6893      * @property
6894      * @type Boolean
6895      */
6896     interactive:            true,
6897 
6898     /**
6899      * Indicates whether group selection should be enabled
6900      * @property
6901      * @type Boolean
6902      */
6903     selection:              true,
6904 
6905     /**
6906      * Color of selection
6907      * @property
6908      * @type String
6909      */
6910     selectionColor:         'rgba(100, 100, 255, 0.3)', // blue
6911 
6912     /**
6913      * Default dash array pattern
6914      * If not empty the selection border is dashed
6915      * @property
6916      * @type Array
6917      */
6918     selectionDashArray:      [ ],
6919 
6920     /**
6921      * Color of the border of selection (usually slightly darker than color of selection itself)
6922      * @property
6923      * @type String
6924      */
6925     selectionBorderColor:   'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)',
6926 
6927     /**
6928      * Width of a line used in object/group selection
6929      * @property
6930      * @type Number
6931      */
6932     selectionLineWidth:     1,
6933 
6934     /**
6935      * Color of the line used in free drawing mode
6936      * @property
6937      * @type String
6938      */
6939     freeDrawingColor:       'rgb(0, 0, 0)',
6940 
6941     /**
6942      * Width of a line used in free drawing mode
6943      * @property
6944      * @type Number
6945      */
6946     freeDrawingLineWidth:   1,
6947 
6948     /**
6949      * Default cursor value used when hovering over an object on canvas
6950      * @property
6951      * @type String
6952      */
6953     hoverCursor:            'move',
6954 
6955     /**
6956      * Default cursor value used when moving an object on canvas
6957      * @property
6958      * @type String
6959      */
6960     moveCursor:             'move',
6961 
6962     /**
6963      * Default cursor value used for the entire canvas
6964      * @property
6965      * @type String
6966      */
6967     defaultCursor:          'default',
6968 
6969     /**
6970      * Cursor value used for rotation point
6971      * @property
6972      * @type String
6973      */
6974     rotationCursor:         'crosshair',
6975 
6976     /**
6977      * Default element class that's given to wrapper (div) element of canvas
6978      * @property
6979      * @type String
6980      */
6981     containerClass:        'canvas-container',
6982 
6983     /**
6984      * When true, object detection happens on per-pixel basis rather than on per-bounding-box
6985      * @property
6986      * @type Boolean
6987      */
6988     perPixelTargetFind:     false,
6989 
6990     /**
6991      * Number of pixels around target pixel to tolerate (consider active) during object detection
6992      * @property
6993      * @type Number
6994      */
6995     targetFindTolerance: 0,
6996 
6997     /**
6998      * @method _initInteractive
6999      * @private
7000      */
7001     _initInteractive: function() {
7002       this._currentTransform = null;
7003       this._groupSelector = null;
7004       this.freeDrawing = fabric.FreeDrawing && new fabric.FreeDrawing(this);
7005       this._initWrapperElement();
7006       this._createUpperCanvas();
7007       this._initEvents();
7008       this.calcOffset();
7009     },
7010 
7011     /**
7012      * Adds mouse listeners to  canvas
7013      * @method _initEvents
7014      * @private
7015      * See configuration documentation for more details.
7016      */
7017     _initEvents: function () {
7018       var _this = this;
7019 
7020       this._onMouseDown = function (e) {
7021         _this.__onMouseDown(e);
7022 
7023         addListener(fabric.document, 'mouseup', _this._onMouseUp);
7024         fabric.isTouchSupported && addListener(fabric.document, 'touchend', _this._onMouseUp);
7025 
7026         addListener(fabric.document, 'mousemove', _this._onMouseMove);
7027         fabric.isTouchSupported && addListener(fabric.document, 'touchmove', _this._onMouseMove);
7028 
7029         removeListener(_this.upperCanvasEl, 'mousemove', _this._onMouseMove);
7030         fabric.isTouchSupported && removeListener(_this.upperCanvasEl, 'touchmove', _this._onMouseMove);
7031       };
7032 
7033       this._onMouseUp = function (e) {
7034         _this.__onMouseUp(e);
7035 
7036         removeListener(fabric.document, 'mouseup', _this._onMouseUp);
7037         fabric.isTouchSupported && removeListener(fabric.document, 'touchend', _this._onMouseUp);
7038 
7039         removeListener(fabric.document, 'mousemove', _this._onMouseMove);
7040         fabric.isTouchSupported && removeListener(fabric.document, 'touchmove', _this._onMouseMove);
7041 
7042         addListener(_this.upperCanvasEl, 'mousemove', _this._onMouseMove);
7043         fabric.isTouchSupported && addListener(_this.upperCanvasEl, 'touchmove', _this._onMouseMove);
7044       };
7045 
7046       this._onMouseMove = function (e) {
7047         e.preventDefault && e.preventDefault();
7048         _this.__onMouseMove(e);
7049       };
7050 
7051       this._onResize = function () {
7052         _this.calcOffset();
7053       };
7054 
7055 
7056       addListener(fabric.window, 'resize', this._onResize);
7057 
7058       if (fabric.isTouchSupported) {
7059         addListener(this.upperCanvasEl, 'touchstart', this._onMouseDown);
7060         addListener(this.upperCanvasEl, 'touchmove', this._onMouseMove);
7061       }
7062       else {
7063         addListener(this.upperCanvasEl, 'mousedown', this._onMouseDown);
7064         addListener(this.upperCanvasEl, 'mousemove', this._onMouseMove);
7065       }
7066     },
7067 
7068     /**
7069      * Method that defines the actions when mouse is released on canvas.
7070      * The method resets the currentTransform parameters, store the image corner
7071      * position in the image object and render the canvas on top.
7072      * @method __onMouseUp
7073      * @param {Event} e Event object fired on mouseup
7074      *
7075      */
7076     __onMouseUp: function (e) {
7077 
7078       var target;
7079 
7080       if (this.isDrawingMode && this._isCurrentlyDrawing) {
7081         this.freeDrawing._finalizeAndAddPath();
7082         this.fire('mouse:up', { e: e });
7083         return;
7084       }
7085 
7086       if (this._currentTransform) {
7087 
7088         var transform = this._currentTransform;
7089 
7090         target = transform.target;
7091         if (target._scaling) {
7092           target._scaling = false;
7093         }
7094 
7095         // determine the new coords everytime the image changes its position
7096         var i = this._objects.length;
7097         while (i--) {
7098           this._objects[i].setCoords();
7099         }
7100 
7101         target.isMoving = false;
7102 
7103         // only fire :modified event if target coordinates were changed during mousedown-mouseup
7104         if (this.stateful && target.hasStateChanged()) {
7105           this.fire('object:modified', { target: target });
7106           target.fire('modified');
7107         }
7108 
7109         if (this._previousOriginX) {
7110           this._adjustPosition(this._currentTransform.target, this._previousOriginX);
7111           this._previousOriginX = null;
7112         }
7113       }
7114 
7115       this._currentTransform = null;
7116 
7117       if (this._groupSelector) {
7118         // group selection was completed, determine its bounds
7119         this._findSelectedObjects(e);
7120       }
7121       var activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup();
7122       if (activeGroup) {
7123         activeGroup.setObjectsCoords();
7124         activeGroup.set('isMoving', false);
7125         this._setCursor(this.defaultCursor);
