7126       }
7127 
7128       // clear selection
7129       this._groupSelector = null;
7130       this.renderAll();
7131 
7132       this._setCursorFromEvent(e, target);
7133 
7134       // fix for FF
7135       this._setCursor('');
7136 
7137       var _this = this;
7138       setTimeout(function () {
7139         _this._setCursorFromEvent(e, target);
7140       }, 50);
7141 
7142       this.fire('mouse:up', { target: target, e: e });
7143       target && target.fire('mouseup', { e: e });
7144     },
7145 
7146     /**
7147      * Method that defines the actions when mouse is clic ked on canvas.
7148      * The method inits the currentTransform parameters and renders all the
7149      * canvas so the current image can be placed on the top canvas and the rest
7150      * in on the container one.
7151      * @method __onMouseDown
7152      * @param e {Event} Event object fired on mousedown
7153      *
7154      */
7155     __onMouseDown: function (e) {
7156 
7157       var pointer;
7158 
7159       // accept only left clicks
7160       var isLeftClick  = 'which' in e ? e.which === 1 : e.button === 1;
7161       if (!isLeftClick && !fabric.isTouchSupported) return;
7162 
7163       if (this.isDrawingMode) {
7164         pointer = this.getPointer(e);
7165         this.freeDrawing._prepareForDrawing(pointer);
7166 
7167         // capture coordinates immediately;
7168         // this allows to draw dots (when movement never occurs)
7169         this.freeDrawing._captureDrawingPath(pointer);
7170 
7171         this.fire('mouse:down', { e: e });
7172         return;
7173       }
7174 
7175       // ignore if some object is being transformed at this moment
7176       if (this._currentTransform) return;
7177 
7178       var target = this.findTarget(e), corner;
7179       pointer = this.getPointer(e);
7180 
7181       if (this._shouldClearSelection(e)) {
7182         this._groupSelector = {
7183           ex: pointer.x,
7184           ey: pointer.y,
7185           top: 0,
7186           left: 0
7187         };
7188         this.deactivateAllWithDispatch();
7189       }
7190       else {
7191         // determine if it's a drag or rotate case
7192         this.stateful && target.saveState();
7193 
7194         if ((corner = target._findTargetCorner(e, this._offset))) {
7195           this.onBeforeScaleRotate(target);
7196         }
7197 
7198         if (this._shouldHandleGroupLogic(e, target)) {
7199           this._handleGroupLogic(e, target);
7200           target = this.getActiveGroup();
7201         }
7202         else {
7203           if (target !== this.getActiveGroup()) {
7204             this.deactivateAll();
7205           }
7206           this.setActiveObject(target, e);
7207         }
7208 
7209         this._setupCurrentTransform(e, target);
7210       }
7211       // we must renderAll so that active image is placed on the top canvas
7212       this.renderAll();
7213 
7214       this.fire('mouse:down', { target: target, e: e });
7215       target && target.fire('mousedown', { e: e });
7216 
7217       // center origin when rotating
7218       if (corner === 'mtr') {
7219         this._previousOriginX = this._currentTransform.target.originX;
7220         this._adjustPosition(this._currentTransform.target, 'center');
7221         this._currentTransform.left = this._currentTransform.target.left;
7222         this._currentTransform.top = this._currentTransform.target.top;
7223       }
7224     },
7225 
7226     /**
7227      * @method _shouldHandleGroupLogic
7228      * @param e {Event}
7229      * @param target {fabric.Object}
7230      * @return {Boolean}
7231      */
7232     _shouldHandleGroupLogic: function(e, target) {
7233       var activeObject = this.getActiveObject();
7234       return e.shiftKey &&
7235             (this.getActiveGroup() || (activeObject && activeObject !== target))
7236             && this.selection;
7237     },
7238 
7239     /**
7240       * Method that defines the actions when mouse is hovering the canvas.
7241       * The currentTransform parameter will definde whether the user is rotating/scaling/translating
7242       * an image or neither of them (only hovering). A group selection is also possible and would cancel
7243       * all any other type of action.
7244       * In case of an image transformation only the top canvas will be rendered.
7245       * @method __onMouseMove
7246       * @param e {Event} Event object fired on mousemove
7247       *
7248       */
7249     __onMouseMove: function (e) {
7250 
7251       var target, pointer;
7252 
7253       if (this.isDrawingMode) {
7254         if (this._isCurrentlyDrawing) {
7255           pointer = this.getPointer(e);
7256           this.freeDrawing._captureDrawingPath(pointer);
7257 
7258           // redraw curve
7259           // clear top canvas
7260           this.clearContext(this.contextTop);
7261           this.freeDrawing._render(this.contextTop);
7262         }
7263         this.fire('mouse:move', { e: e });
7264         return;
7265       }
7266 
7267       var groupSelector = this._groupSelector;
7268 
7269       // We initially clicked in an empty area, so we draw a box for multiple selection.
7270       if (groupSelector !== null) {
7271         pointer = getPointer(e);
7272 
7273         groupSelector.left = pointer.x - this._offset.left - groupSelector.ex;
7274         groupSelector.top = pointer.y - this._offset.top - groupSelector.ey;
7275         this.renderTop();
7276       }
7277       else if (!this._currentTransform) {
7278 
7279         // alias style to elimintate unnecessary lookup
7280         var style = this.upperCanvasEl.style;
7281 
7282         // Here we are hovering the canvas then we will determine
7283         // what part of the pictures we are hovering to change the caret symbol.
7284         // We won't do that while dragging or rotating in order to improve the
7285         // performance.
7286         target = this.findTarget(e);
7287 
7288         if (!target) {
7289           // image/text was hovered-out from, we remove its borders
7290           for (var i = this._objects.length; i--; ) {
7291             if (this._objects[i] && !this._objects[i].active) {
7292               this._objects[i].setActive(false);
7293             }
7294           }
7295           style.cursor = this.defaultCursor;
7296         }
7297         else {
7298           // set proper cursor
7299           this._setCursorFromEvent(e, target);
7300         }
7301       }
7302       else {
7303         // object is being transformed (scaled/rotated/moved/etc.)
7304         pointer = getPointer(e);
7305 
7306         var x = pointer.x,
7307             y = pointer.y;
7308 
7309         this._currentTransform.target.isMoving = true;
7310 
7311         var t = this._currentTransform, reset = false;
7312         if (
7313             (t.action === 'scale' || t.action === 'scaleX' || t.action === 'scaleY')
7314             &&
7315             (
7316               // Switch from a normal resize to center-based
7317               (e.altKey && (t.originX !== 'center' || t.originY !== 'center'))
7318               ||
7319               // Switch from center-based resize to normal one
7320               (!e.altKey && t.originX === 'center' && t.originY === 'center')
7321             )
7322            ) {
7323           this._resetCurrentTransform(e);
7324           reset = true;
7325         }
7326 
7327         if (this._currentTransform.action === 'rotate') {
7328           this._rotateObject(x, y);
7329 
7330           this.fire('object:rotating', {
7331             target: this._currentTransform.target
7332           });
7333           this._currentTransform.target.fire('rotating');
7334         }
7335         else if (this._currentTransform.action === 'scale') {
7336           // rotate object only if shift key is not pressed
7337           // and if it is not a group we are transforming
7338 
7339           // TODO
7340           /*if (!e.shiftKey) {
7341             this._rotateObject(x, y);
7342 
7343             this.fire('object:rotating', {
7344               target: this._currentTransform.target,
7345               e: e
7346             });
7347             this._currentTransform.target.fire('rotating');
7348           }*/
7349 
7350           // if (!this._currentTransform.target.hasRotatingPoint) {
7351           //   this._scaleObject(x, y);
7352           //   this.fire('object:scaling', {
7353           //     target: this._currentTransform.target
7354           //   });
7355           //   this._currentTransform.target.fire('scaling');
7356           // }
7357 
7358           if (e.shiftKey || this.uniScaleTransform) {
7359             this._currentTransform.currentAction = 'scale';
7360             this._scaleObject(x, y);
7361           }
7362           else {
7363             if (!reset && t.currentAction === 'scale') {
7364               // Switch from a normal resize to proportional
7365               this._resetCurrentTransform(e);
7366             }
7367 
7368             this._currentTransform.currentAction = 'scaleEqually';
7369             this._scaleObject(x, y, 'equally');
7370           }
7371 
7372           this.fire('object:scaling', {
7373             target: this._currentTransform.target,
7374             e: e
7375           });
7376         }
7377         // else if (this._currentTransform.action === 'scale') {
7378         //   this._scaleObject(x, y);
7379         //   this.fire('object:scaling', {
7380         //     target: this._currentTransform.target
7381         //   });
7382         //   this._currentTransform.target.fire('scaling');
7383         // }
7384         else if (this._currentTransform.action === 'scaleX') {
7385           this._scaleObject(x, y, 'x');
7386 
7387           this.fire('object:scaling', {
7388             target: this._currentTransform.target,
7389             e: e
7390           });
7391           this._currentTransform.target.fire('scaling', { e: e });
7392         }
7393         else if (this._currentTransform.action === 'scaleY') {
7394           this._scaleObject(x, y, 'y');
7395 
7396           this.fire('object:scaling', {
7397             target: this._currentTransform.target,
7398             e: e
7399           });
7400           this._currentTransform.target.fire('scaling', { e: e });
7401         }
7402         else {
7403           this._translateObject(x, y);
7404 
7405           this.fire('object:moving', {
7406             target: this._currentTransform.target,
7407             e: e
7408           });
7409 
7410           this._setCursor(this.moveCursor);
7411 
7412           this._currentTransform.target.fire('moving', { e: e });
7413         }
7414         // only commit here. when we are actually moving the pictures
7415         this.renderAll();
7416       }
7417       this.fire('mouse:move', { target: target, e: e });
7418       target && target.fire('mousemove', { e: e });
7419     },
7420 
7421     /**
7422      * Resets the current transform to its original values and chooses the type of resizing based on the event
7423      * @method _resetCurrentTransform
7424      * @param e {Event} Event object fired on mousemove
7425      */
7426     _resetCurrentTransform: function(e) {
7427       var t = this._currentTransform;
7428       t.target.set('scaleX', t.original.scaleX);
7429       t.target.set('scaleY', t.original.scaleY);
7430       t.target.set('left', t.original.left);
7431       t.target.set('top', t.original.top);
7432 
7433       if (e.altKey || this.centerTransform) {
7434         if (t.originX !== 'center') {
7435           if (t.originX === 'right') {
7436             t.mouseXSign = -1;
7437           }
7438           else {
7439             t.mouseXSign = 1;
7440           }
7441         }
7442         if (t.originY !== 'center') {
7443           if (t.originY === 'bottom') {
7444             t.mouseYSign = -1;
7445           }
7446           else {
7447             t.mouseYSign = 1;
7448           }
7449         }
7450 
7451         t.originX = 'center';
7452         t.originY = 'center';
7453       }
7454       else {
7455         t.originX = t.original.originX;
7456         t.originY = t.original.originY;
7457       }
7458     },
7459 
7460     /**
7461      * Applies one implementation of 'point inside polygon' algorithm
7462      * @method containsPoint
7463      * @param e { Event } event object
7464      * @param target { fabric.Object } object to test against
7465      * @return {Boolean} true if point contains within area of given object
7466      */
7467     containsPoint: function (e, target) {
7468       var pointer = this.getPointer(e),
7469           xy = this._normalizePointer(target, pointer),
7470           x = xy.x,
7471           y = xy.y;
7472 
7473       // http://www.geog.ubc.ca/courses/klink/gis.notes/ncgia/u32.html
7474       // http://idav.ucdavis.edu/~okreylos/TAship/Spring2000/PointInPolygon.html
7475 
7476       // we iterate through each object. If target found, return it.
7477       var iLines = target._getImageLines(target.oCoords),
7478           xpoints = target._findCrossPoints(x, y, iLines);
7479 
7480       // if xcount is odd then we clicked inside the object
7481       // For the specific case of square images xcount === 1 in all true cases
7482       if ((xpoints && xpoints % 2 === 1) || target._findTargetCorner(e, this._offset)) {
7483         return true;
7484       }
7485       return false;
7486     },
7487 
7488     /**
7489      * @private
7490      * @method _normalizePointer
7491      */
7492     _normalizePointer: function (object, pointer) {
7493 
7494       var activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup(),
7495           x = pointer.x,
7496           y = pointer.y;
7497 
7498       var isObjectInGroup = (
7499         activeGroup &&
7500         object.type !== 'group' &&
7501         activeGroup.contains(object)
7502       );
7503 
7504       if (isObjectInGroup) {
7505         x -= activeGroup.left;
7506         y -= activeGroup.top;
7507       }
7508       return { x: x, y: y };
7509     },
7510 
7511     /**
7512      * @private
7513      * @method _isTargetTransparent
7514      */
7515     _isTargetTransparent: function (target, x, y) {
7516       var cacheContext = this.contextCache;
7517 
7518       var hasBorders = target.hasBorders, transparentCorners = target.transparentCorners;
7519       target.hasBorders = target.transparentCorners = false;
7520 
7521       this._draw(cacheContext, target);
7522 
7523       target.hasBorders = hasBorders;
7524       target.transparentCorners = transparentCorners;
7525 
7526       // If tolerance is > 0 adjust start coords to take into account. If moves off Canvas fix to 0
7527       if (this.targetFindTolerance > 0) {
7528         if (x > this.targetFindTolerance) {
7529           x -= this.targetFindTolerance;
7530         }
7531         else {
7532           x = 0;
7533         }
7534         if (y > this.targetFindTolerance) {
7535           y -= this.targetFindTolerance;
7536         }
7537         else {
7538           y = 0;
7539         }
7540       }
7541 
7542       var isTransparent = true;
7543       var imageData = cacheContext.getImageData(
7544         x, y, (this.targetFindTolerance * 2) || 1, (this.targetFindTolerance * 2) || 1);
7545 
7546       // Split image data - for tolerance > 1, pixelDataSize = 4;
7547       for (var i = 3; i < imageData.data.length; i += 4) {
7548           var temp = imageData.data[i];
7549           isTransparent = temp <= 0;
7550           if (isTransparent === false) break; //Stop if colour found
7551       }
7552 
7553       imageData = null;
7554       this.clearContext(cacheContext);
7555       return isTransparent;
7556     },
7557 
7558     /**
7559      * @private
7560      * @method _shouldClearSelection
7561      */
7562     _shouldClearSelection: function (e) {
7563       var target = this.findTarget(e),
7564           activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup();
7565       return (
7566         !target || (
7567           target &&
7568           activeGroup &&
7569           !activeGroup.contains(target) &&
7570           activeGroup !== target &&
7571           !e.shiftKey
7572         )
7573       );
7574     },
7575 
7576     /**
7577      * @private
7578      * @method _setupCurrentTransform
7579      */
7580     _setupCurrentTransform: function (e, target) {
7581       var action = 'drag',
7582           corner,
7583           pointer = getPointer(e);
7584 
7585       corner = target._findTargetCorner(e, this._offset);
7586       if (corner) {
7587         action = (corner === 'ml' || corner === 'mr')
7588           ? 'scaleX'
7589           : (corner === 'mt' || corner === 'mb')
7590             ? 'scaleY'
7591             : corner === 'mtr'
7592               ? 'rotate'
7593               : 'scale';
7594       }
7595 
7596       var originX = "center", originY = "center";
7597 
7598       if (corner === 'ml' || corner === 'tl' || corner === 'bl') {
7599         originX = "right";
7600       }
7601       else if (corner === 'mr' || corner === 'tr' || corner === 'br') {
7602         originX = "left";
7603       }
7604 
7605       if (corner === 'tl' || corner === 'mt' || corner === 'tr') {
7606         originY = "bottom";
7607       }
7608       else if (corner === 'bl' || corner === 'mb' || corner === 'br') {
7609         originY = "top";
7610       }
7611 
7612       if (corner === 'mtr') {
7613         originX = 'center';
7614         originY = 'center';
7615       }
7616 
7617       // var center = target.getCenterPoint();
7618       this._currentTransform = {
7619         target: target,
7620         action: action,
7621         scaleX: target.scaleX,
7622         scaleY: target.scaleY,
7623         offsetX: pointer.x - target.left,
7624         offsetY: pointer.y - target.top,
7625         originX: originX,
7626         originY: originY,
7627         ex: pointer.x,
7628         ey: pointer.y,
7629         left: target.left,
7630         top: target.top,
7631         theta: degreesToRadians(target.angle),
7632         width: target.width * target.scaleX,
7633         mouseXSign: 1,
7634         mouseYSign: 1
7635       };
7636 
7637       this._currentTransform.original = {
7638         left: target.left,
7639         top: target.top,
7640         scaleX: target.scaleX,
7641         scaleY: target.scaleY,
7642         originX: originX,
7643         originY: originY
7644       };
7645 
7646       this._resetCurrentTransform(e);
7647     },
7648 
7649     /**
7650      * @private
7651      * @method _handleGroupLogic
7652      */
7653     _handleGroupLogic: function (e, target) {
7654       if (target === this.getActiveGroup()) {
7655         // if it's a group, find target again, this time skipping group
7656         target = this.findTarget(e, true);
7657         // if even object is not found, bail out
7658         if (!target || target.isType('group')) {
7659           return;
7660         }
7661       }
7662       var activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup();
7663       if (activeGroup) {
7664         if (activeGroup.contains(target)) {
7665           activeGroup.removeWithUpdate(target);
7666           this._resetObjectTransform(activeGroup);
7667           target.setActive(false);
7668           if (activeGroup.size() === 1) {
7669             // remove group alltogether if after removal it only contains 1 object
7670             this.discardActiveGroup();
7671           }
7672         }
7673         else {
7674           activeGroup.addWithUpdate(target);
7675           this._resetObjectTransform(activeGroup);
7676         }
7677         this.fire('selection:created', { target: activeGroup, e: e });
7678         activeGroup.setActive(true);
7679       }
7680       else {
7681         // group does not exist
7682         if (this._activeObject) {
7683           // only if there's an active object
7684           if (target !== this._activeObject) {
7685             // and that object is not the actual target
7686             var group = new fabric.Group([ this._activeObject, target ]);
7687             this.setActiveGroup(group);
7688             activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup();
7689           }
7690         }
7691         // activate target object in any case
7692         target.setActive(true);
7693       }
7694 
7695       if (activeGroup) {
7696         activeGroup.saveCoords();
7697       }
7698     },
7699 
7700     /**
7701      * Translates object by "setting" its left/top
7702      * @method _translateObject
7703      * @param x {Number} pointer's x coordinate
7704      * @param y {Number} pointer's y coordinate
7705      */
7706     _translateObject: function (x, y) {
7707       var target = this._currentTransform.target;
7708 
7709       if (!target.get('lockMovementX')) {
7710         target.set('left', x - this._currentTransform.offsetX);
7711       }
7712       if (!target.get('lockMovementY')) {
7713         target.set('top', y - this._currentTransform.offsetY);
7714       }
7715     },
7716 
7717     /**
7718      * Scales object by invoking its scaleX/scaleY methods
7719      * @method _scaleObject
7720      * @param x {Number} pointer's x coordinate
7721      * @param y {Number} pointer's y coordinate
7722      * @param by {String} Either 'x' or 'y' - specifies dimension constraint by which to scale an object.
7723      *                    When not provided, an object is scaled by both dimensions equally
7724      */
7725     _scaleObject: function (x, y, by) {
7726       var t = this._currentTransform,
7727           offset = this._offset,
7728           target = t.target;
7729 
7730       var lockScalingX = target.get('lockScalingX'),
7731           lockScalingY = target.get('lockScalingY');
7732 
7733       if (lockScalingX && lockScalingY) return;
7734 
7735       // Get the constraint point
7736       var constraintPosition = target.translateToOriginPoint(target.getCenterPoint(), t.originX, t.originY);
7737       var localMouse = target.toLocalPoint(new fabric.Point(x - offset.left, y - offset.top), t.originX, t.originY);
7738 
7739       if (t.originX === 'right') {
7740         localMouse.x *= -1;
7741       }
7742       else if (t.originX === 'center') {
7743         localMouse.x *= t.mouseXSign * 2;
7744 
7745         if (localMouse.x < 0) {
7746           t.mouseXSign = -t.mouseXSign;
7747         }
7748       }
7749 
7750       if (t.originY === 'bottom') {
7751         localMouse.y *= -1;
7752       }
7753       else if (t.originY === 'center') {
7754         localMouse.y *= t.mouseYSign * 2;
7755 
7756         if (localMouse.y < 0) {
7757           t.mouseYSign = -t.mouseYSign;
7758         }
7759       }
7760 
7761       // Actually scale the object
7762       var newScaleX = target.scaleX, newScaleY = target.scaleY;
7763       if (by === 'equally' && !lockScalingX && !lockScalingY) {
7764         var dist = localMouse.y + localMouse.x;
7765         var lastDist = (target.height) * t.original.scaleY +
7766                        (target.width) * t.original.scaleX +
7767                        (target.padding * 2) -
7768                        (target.strokeWidth * 2) + 1 /* additional offset needed probably due to subpixel rendering, and avoids jerk when scaling an object */;
7769 
7770         // We use t.scaleX/Y instead of target.scaleX/Y because the object may have a min scale and we'll loose the proportions
7771         newScaleX = t.original.scaleX * dist/lastDist;
7772         newScaleY = t.original.scaleY * dist/lastDist;
7773 
7774         target.set('scaleX', newScaleX);
7775         target.set('scaleY', newScaleY);
7776       }
7777       else if (!by) {
7778         newScaleX = localMouse.x/(target.width+target.padding);
7779         newScaleY = localMouse.y/(target.height+target.padding);
7780 
7781         lockScalingX || target.set('scaleX', newScaleX);
7782         lockScalingY || target.set('scaleY', newScaleY);
7783       }
7784       else if (by === 'x' && !target.get('lockUniScaling')) {
7785         newScaleX = localMouse.x/(target.width+target.padding);
7786         lockScalingX || target.set('scaleX', newScaleX);
7787       }
7788       else if (by === 'y' && !target.get('lockUniScaling')) {
7789         newScaleY = localMouse.y/(target.height+target.padding);
7790         lockScalingY || target.set('scaleY', newScaleY);
7791       }
7792 
7793       // Check if we flipped
7794       if (newScaleX < 0)
7795       {
7796         if (t.originX === 'left')
7797           t.originX = 'right';
7798         else if (t.originX === 'right')
7799           t.originX = 'left';
7800       }
7801 
7802       if (newScaleY < 0)
7803       {
7804         if (t.originY === 'top')
7805           t.originY = 'bottom';
7806         else if (t.originY === 'bottom')
7807           t.originY = 'top';
7808       }
7809 
7810       // Make sure the constraints apply
7811       target.setPositionByOrigin(constraintPosition, t.originX, t.originY);
7812     },
7813 
7814     /**
7815      * Rotates object by invoking its rotate method
7816      * @method _rotateObject
7817      * @param x {Number} pointer's x coordinate
7818      * @param y {Number} pointer's y coordinate
7819      */
7820     _rotateObject: function (x, y) {
7821 
7822       var t = this._currentTransform,
7823           o = this._offset;
7824 
7825       if (t.target.get('lockRotation')) return;
7826 
7827       var lastAngle = atan2(t.ey - t.top - o.top, t.ex - t.left - o.left),
7828           curAngle = atan2(y - t.top - o.top, x - t.left - o.left);
7829 
7830       t.target.angle = radiansToDegrees(curAngle - lastAngle + t.theta);
7831     },
7832 
7833     /**
7834      * @method _setCursor
7835      */
7836     _setCursor: function (value) {
7837       this.upperCanvasEl.style.cursor = value;
7838     },
7839 
7840     /**
7841     * @private
7842     * @method _resetObjectTransform:
7843     */
7844     _resetObjectTransform: function (target) {
7845       target.scaleX = 1;
7846       target.scaleY = 1;
7847       target.setAngle(0);
7848     },
7849 
7850     /**
7851      * Sets the cursor depending on where the canvas is being hovered.
7852      * Note: very buggy in Opera
7853      * @method _setCursorFromEvent
7854      * @param e {Event} Event object
7855      * @param target {Object} Object that the mouse is hovering, if so.
7856      */
7857     _setCursorFromEvent: function (e, target) {
7858       var s = this.upperCanvasEl.style;
7859       if (!target) {
7860         s.cursor = this.defaultCursor;
7861         return false;
7862       }
7863       else {
7864         var activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup();
7865         // only show proper corner when group selection is not active
7866         var corner = !!target._findTargetCorner
7867                       && (!activeGroup || !activeGroup.contains(target))
7868                       && target._findTargetCorner(e, this._offset);
7869 
7870         if (!corner) {
7871           s.cursor = this.hoverCursor;
7872         }
7873         else {
7874           if (corner in cursorMap) {
7875             s.cursor = cursorMap[corner];
7876           } else if (corner === 'mtr' && target.hasRotatingPoint) {
7877             s.cursor = this.rotationCursor;
7878           } else {
7879             s.cursor = this.defaultCursor;
7880             return false;
7881           }
7882         }
7883       }
7884       return true;
7885     },
7886 
7887     /**
7888      * @method _drawSelection
7889      * @private
7890      */
7891     _drawSelection: function () {
7892       var ctx = this.contextTop,
7893           groupSelector = this._groupSelector,
7894           left = groupSelector.left,
7895           top = groupSelector.top,
7896           aleft = abs(left),
7897           atop = abs(top);
7898 
7899       ctx.fillStyle = this.selectionColor;
7900 
7901       ctx.fillRect(
7902         groupSelector.ex - ((left > 0) ? 0 : -left),
7903         groupSelector.ey - ((top > 0) ? 0 : -top),
7904         aleft,
7905         atop
7906       );
7907 
7908       ctx.lineWidth = this.selectionLineWidth;
7909       ctx.strokeStyle = this.selectionBorderColor;
7910 
7911       // selection border
7912       if (this.selectionDashArray.length > 1) {
7913         var px = groupSelector.ex + STROKE_OFFSET - ((left > 0) ? 0: aleft);
7914         var py = groupSelector.ey + STROKE_OFFSET - ((top > 0) ? 0: atop);
7915         ctx.beginPath();
7916         this.drawDashedLine(ctx, px, py, px+aleft, py, this.selectionDashArray);
7917         this.drawDashedLine(ctx, px, py+atop-1, px+aleft, py+atop-1, this.selectionDashArray);
7918         this.drawDashedLine(ctx, px, py, px, py+atop, this.selectionDashArray);
7919         this.drawDashedLine(ctx, px+aleft-1, py, px+aleft-1, py+atop, this.selectionDashArray);
7920         ctx.closePath();
7921         ctx.stroke();
7922       }
7923       else {
7924         ctx.strokeRect(
7925           groupSelector.ex + STROKE_OFFSET - ((left > 0) ? 0 : aleft),
7926           groupSelector.ey + STROKE_OFFSET - ((top > 0) ? 0 : atop),
7927           aleft,
7928           atop
7929         );
7930       }
7931     },
7932 
7933     /**
7934      * Draws a dashed line between two points
7935      *
7936      * This method is used to draw dashed line around selection area.
7937      * See <a href="http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4576724/dotted-stroke-in-canvas">dotted stroke in canvas</a>
7938      *
7939      * @method drawDashedLine
7940      * @param ctx {Canvas} context
7941      * @param x {Number} start x coordinate
7942      * @param y {Number} start y coordinate
7943      * @param x2 {Number} end x coordinate
7944      * @param y2 {Number} end y coordinate
7945      * @param da {Array} dash array pattern
7946      */
7947     drawDashedLine: function(ctx, x, y, x2, y2, da) {
7948       var dx = x2 - x,
7949           dy = y2 - y,
7950           len = sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy),
7951           rot = atan2(dy, dx),
7952           dc = da.length,
7953           di = 0,
7954           draw = true;
7955 
7956       ctx.save();
7957       ctx.translate(x, y);
7958       ctx.moveTo(0, 0);
7959       ctx.rotate(rot);
7960 
7961       x = 0;
7962       while (len > x) {
7963         x += da[di++ % dc];
7964         if (x > len) {
7965           x = len;
7966         }
7967         ctx[draw ? 'lineTo' : 'moveTo'](x, 0);
7968         draw = !draw;
7969       }
7970 
7971       ctx.restore();
7972     },
7973 
7974     /**
7975      * @private
7976      * @method _findSelectedObjects
7977      */
7978     _findSelectedObjects: function (e) {
7979       var group = [ ],
7980           x1 = this._groupSelector.ex,
7981           y1 = this._groupSelector.ey,
7982           x2 = x1 + this._groupSelector.left,
7983           y2 = y1 + this._groupSelector.top,
7984           currentObject,
7985           selectionX1Y1 = new fabric.Point(min(x1, x2), min(y1, y2)),
7986           selectionX2Y2 = new fabric.Point(max(x1, x2), max(y1, y2));
7987 
7988       for (var i = 0, len = this._objects.length; i < len; ++i) {
7989         currentObject = this._objects[i];
7990 
7991         if (!currentObject) continue;
7992 
7993         if (currentObject.intersectsWithRect(selectionX1Y1, selectionX2Y2) ||
7994             currentObject.isContainedWithinRect(selectionX1Y1, selectionX2Y2)) {
7995 
7996           if (this.selection && currentObject.selectable) {
7997             currentObject.setActive(true);
7998             group.push(currentObject);
7999           }
8000         }
8001       }
8002 
8003       // do not create group for 1 element only
8004       if (group.length === 1) {
8005         this.setActiveObject(group[0], e);
8006       }
8007       else if (group.length > 1) {
8008         group = new fabric.Group(group);
8009         this.setActiveGroup(group);
8010         group.saveCoords();
8011         this.fire('selection:created', { target: group });
8012       }
8013 
8014       this.renderAll();
8015     },
8016 
8017     /**
8018      * Method that determines what object we are clicking on
8019      * @method findTarget
8020      * @param {Event} e mouse event
8021      * @param {Boolean} skipGroup when true, group is skipped and only objects are traversed through
8022      */
8023     findTarget: function (e, skipGroup) {
8024 
8025       var target,
8026           pointer = this.getPointer(e);
8027 
8028       if (this.controlsAboveOverlay &&
8029           this.lastRenderedObjectWithControlsAboveOverlay &&
8030           this.containsPoint(e, this.lastRenderedObjectWithControlsAboveOverlay)) {
8031         target = this.lastRenderedObjectWithControlsAboveOverlay;
8032         return target;
8033       }
8034 
8035       // first check current group (if one exists)
8036       var activeGroup = this.getActiveGroup();
8037       if (activeGroup && !skipGroup && this.containsPoint(e, activeGroup)) {
8038         target = activeGroup;
8039         return target;
8040       }
8041 
8042       // then check all of the objects on canvas
8043       // Cache all targets where their bounding box contains point.
8044       var possibleTargets = [];
8045       for (var i = this._objects.length; i--; ) {
8046         if (this._objects[i] && this.containsPoint(e, this._objects[i])) {
8047           if (this.perPixelTargetFind || this._objects[i].perPixelTargetFind) {
8048             possibleTargets[possibleTargets.length] = this._objects[i];
8049           }
8050           else {
8051             target = this._objects[i];
8052             this.relatedTarget = target;
8053             break;
8054           }
8055         }
8056       }
8057       for (var j = 0, len = possibleTargets.length; j < len; j++) {
8058         pointer = this.getPointer(e);
8059         var isTransparent = this._isTargetTransparent(possibleTargets[j], pointer.x, pointer.y);
8060         if (!isTransparent) {
8061           target = possibleTargets[j];
8062           this.relatedTarget = target;
8063           break;
8064         }
8065       }
8066       if (target && target.selectable) {
8067         return target;
8068       }
8069     },
8070 
8071     /**
8072      * Returns pointer coordinates relative to canvas.
8073      * @method getPointer
8074      * @param {Event} e
8075      * @return {Object} object with "x" and "y" number values
8076      */
8077     getPointer: function (e) {
8078       var pointer = getPointer(e);
8079       return {
8080         x: pointer.x - this._offset.left,
8081         y: pointer.y - this._offset.top
8082       };
8083     },
8084 
8085     /**
8086      * @private
8087      * @method _createUpperCanvas
8088      * @param {HTMLElement|String} canvasEl Canvas element
8089      * @throws {CANVAS_INIT_ERROR} If canvas can not be initialized
8090      */
8091     _createUpperCanvas: function () {
8092       this.upperCanvasEl = this._createCanvasElement();
8093       this.upperCanvasEl.className = 'upper-canvas';
8094 
8095       this.wrapperEl.appendChild(this.upperCanvasEl);
8096 
8097       this._applyCanvasStyle(this.upperCanvasEl);
8098       this.contextTop = this.upperCanvasEl.getContext('2d');
8099     },
8100 
8101     /**
8102      * @private
8103      * @method _createCacheCanvas
8104      */
8105     _createCacheCanvas: function () {
8106       this.cacheCanvasEl = this._createCanvasElement();
8107       this.cacheCanvasEl.setAttribute('width', this.width);
8108       this.cacheCanvasEl.setAttribute('height', this.height);
8109       this.contextCache = this.cacheCanvasEl.getContext('2d');
8110     },
8111 
8112     /**
8113      * @private
8114      * @method _initWrapperElement
8115      * @param {Number} width
8116      * @param {Number} height
8117      */
8118     _initWrapperElement: function () {
8119       this.wrapperEl = fabric.util.wrapElement(this.lowerCanvasEl, 'div', {
8120         'class': this.containerClass
8121       });
8122       fabric.util.setStyle(this.wrapperEl, {
8123         width: this.getWidth() + 'px',
8124         height: this.getHeight() + 'px',
8125         position: 'relative'
8126       });
8127       fabric.util.makeElementUnselectable(this.wrapperEl);
8128     },
8129 
8130     /**
8131      * @private
8132      * @method _applyCanvasStyle
8133      * @param {Element} element
8134      */
8135     _applyCanvasStyle: function (element) {
8136       var width = this.getWidth() || element.width,
8137           height = this.getHeight() || element.height;
8138 
8139       fabric.util.setStyle(element, {
8140         position: 'absolute',
8141         width: width + 'px',
8142         height: height + 'px',
8143         left: 0,
8144         top: 0
8145       });
8146       element.width = width;
8147       element.height = height;
8148       fabric.util.makeElementUnselectable(element);
8149     },
8150 
8151     /**
8152      * Returns context of canvas where object selection is drawn
8153      * @method getSelectionContext
8154      * @return {CanvasRenderingContext2D}
8155      */
8156     getSelectionContext: function() {
8157       return this.contextTop;
8158     },
8159 
8160     /**
8161      * Returns <canvas> element on which object selection is drawn
8162      * @method getSelectionElement
8163      * @return {HTMLCanvasElement}
8164      */
8165     getSelectionElement: function () {
8166       return this.upperCanvasEl;
8167     },
8168 
8169     /**
8170      * Sets given object as active
8171      * @method setActiveObject
8172      * @param object {fabric.Object} Object to set as an active one
8173      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
8174      * @chainable
8175      */
8176     setActiveObject: function (object, e) {
8177       if (this._activeObject) {
8178         this._activeObject.setActive(false);
8179       }
8180       this._activeObject = object;
8181       object.setActive(true);
8182 
8183       this.renderAll();
8184 
8185       this.fire('object:selected', { target: object, e: e });
8186       object.fire('selected', { e: e });
8187       return this;
8188     },
8189 
8190     /**
8191      * Returns currently active object
8192      * @method getActiveObject
8193      * @return {fabric.Object} active object
8194      */
8195     getActiveObject: function () {
8196       return this._activeObject;
8197     },
8198 
8199     /**
8200      * Discards currently active object
8201      * @method discardActiveObject
8202      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
8203      * @chainable
8204      */
8205     discardActiveObject: function () {
8206       if (this._activeObject) {
8207         this._activeObject.setActive(false);
8208       }
8209       this._activeObject = null;
8210       return this;
8211     },
8212 
8213     /**
8214      * Sets active group to a speicified one
8215      * @method setActiveGroup
8216      * @param {fabric.Group} group Group to set as a current one
8217      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
8218      * @chainable
8219      */
8220     setActiveGroup: function (group) {
8221       this._activeGroup = group;
8222       if (group) {
8223         group.canvas = this;
8224         group.setActive(true);
8225       }
8226       return this;
8227     },
8228 
8229     /**
8230      * Returns currently active group
8231      * @method getActiveGroup
8232      * @return {fabric.Group} Current group
8233      */
8234     getActiveGroup: function () {
8235       return this._activeGroup;
8236     },
8237 
8238     /**
8239      * Removes currently active group
8240      * @method discardActiveGroup
8241      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
8242      */
8243     discardActiveGroup: function () {
8244       var g = this.getActiveGroup();
8245       if (g) {
8246         g.destroy();
8247       }
8248       return this.setActiveGroup(null);
8249     },
8250 
8251     /**
8252      * Deactivates all objects by calling their setActive(false)
8253      * @method deactivateAll
8254      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
8255      */
8256     deactivateAll: function () {
8257       var allObjects = this.getObjects(),
8258           i = 0,
8259           len = allObjects.length;
8260       for ( ; i < len; i++) {
8261         allObjects[i].setActive(false);
8262       }
8263       this.discardActiveGroup();
8264       this.discardActiveObject();
8265       return this;
8266     },
8267 
8268     /**
8269      * Deactivates all objects and dispatches appropriate events
8270      * @method deactivateAllWithDispatch
8271      * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
8272      */
8273     deactivateAllWithDispatch: function () {
8274       var activeObject = this.getActiveGroup() || this.getActiveObject();
8275       if (activeObject) {
8276         this.fire('before:selection:cleared', { target: activeObject });
8277       }
8278       this.deactivateAll();
8279       if (activeObject) {
8280         this.fire('selection:cleared');
8281       }
8282       return this;
8283     },
8284 
8285     /**
8286      * @private
8287      * @method _adjustPosition
8288      * @param obj
8289      * @param {String} to One of left, center, right
8290      */
8291     _adjustPosition: function(obj, to) {
8292 
8293       var angle = fabric.util.degreesToRadians(obj.angle);
8294 
8295       var hypotHalf = obj.getWidth() / 2;
8296       var xHalf = Math.cos(angle) * hypotHalf;
8297       var yHalf = Math.sin(angle) * hypotHalf;
8298 
8299       var hypotFull = obj.getWidth();
8300       var xFull = Math.cos(angle) * hypotFull;
8301       var yFull = Math.sin(angle) * hypotFull;
8302 
8303       if (obj.originX === 'center' && to === 'left' ||
8304           obj.originX === 'right' && to === 'center') {
8305         // move half left
8306         obj.left -= xHalf;
8307         obj.top -= yHalf;
8308       }
8309       else if (obj.originX === 'left' && to === 'center' ||
8310                obj.originX === 'center' && to === 'right') {
8311         // move half right
8312         obj.left += xHalf;
8313         obj.top += yHalf;
8314       }
8315       else if (obj.originX === 'left' && to === 'right') {
8316         // move full right
8317         obj.left += xFull;
8318         obj.top += yFull;
8319       }
8320       else if (obj.originX === 'right' && to === 'left') {
8321         // move full left
8322         obj.left -= xFull;
8323         obj.top -= yFull;
8324       }
8325 
8326       obj.setCoords();
8327       obj.originX = to;
8328     }
8329   };
8330 
8331   fabric.Canvas.prototype.toString = fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.toString;
8332   extend(fabric.Canvas.prototype, InteractiveMethods);
8333 
8334   // iterating manually to workaround Opera's bug
8335   // where "prototype" property is enumerable and overrides existing prototype
8336   for (var prop in fabric.StaticCanvas) {
8337     if (prop !== 'prototype') {
8338       fabric.Canvas[prop] = fabric.StaticCanvas[prop];
8339     }
8340   }
8341 
8342   if (fabric.isTouchSupported) {
8343     fabric.Canvas.prototype._setCursorFromEvent = function() { };
8344   }
8345 
8346   /**
8347    * @class fabric.Element
8348    * @alias fabric.Canvas
8349    * @deprecated Use {@link fabric.Canvas} instead.
8350    * @constructor
8351    */
8352   fabric.Element = fabric.Canvas;
8353 })();
8354 fabric.util.object.extend(fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype, {
8355 
8356   /**
8357    * Animation duration (in ms) for fx* methods
8358    * @type Number
8359    */
8360   FX_DURATION: 500,
8361 
8362   /**
8363    * Centers object horizontally with animation.
8364    * @method fxCenterObjectH
8365    * @param {fabric.Object} object Object to center
8366    * @param {Object} [callbacks] Callbacks object with optional "onComplete" and/or "onChange" properties
8367    * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
8368    * @chainable
8369    */
8370   fxCenterObjectH: function (object, callbacks) {
8371     callbacks = callbacks || { };
8372 
8373     var empty = function() { },
8374         onComplete = callbacks.onComplete || empty,
8375         onChange = callbacks.onChange || empty,
8376         _this = this;
8377 
8378     fabric.util.animate({
8379       startValue: object.get('left'),
8380       endValue: this.getCenter().left,
8381       duration: this.FX_DURATION,
8382       onChange: function(value) {
8383         object.set('left', value);
8384         _this.renderAll();
8385         onChange();
8386       },
8387       onComplete: function() {
8388         object.setCoords();
8389         onComplete();
8390       }
8391     });
8392 
8393     return this;
8394   },
8395 
8396   /**
8397    * Centers object vertically with animation.
8398    * @method fxCenterObjectV
8399    * @param {fabric.Object} object Object to center
8400    * @param {Object} [callbacks] Callbacks object with optional "onComplete" and/or "onChange" properties
8401    * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
8402    * @chainable
8403    */
8404   fxCenterObjectV: function (object, callbacks) {
8405     callbacks = callbacks || { };
8406 
8407     var empty = function() { },
8408         onComplete = callbacks.onComplete || empty,
8409         onChange = callbacks.onChange || empty,
8410         _this = this;
8411 
8412     fabric.util.animate({
8413       startValue: object.get('top'),
8414       endValue: this.getCenter().top,
8415       duration: this.FX_DURATION,
8416       onChange: function(value) {
8417         object.set('top', value);
8418         _this.renderAll();
8419         onChange();
8420       },
8421       onComplete: function() {
8422         object.setCoords();
8423         onComplete();
8424       }
8425     });
8426 
8427     return this;
8428   },
8429 
8430   /**
8431    * Same as `fabric.Canvas#remove` but animated
8432    * @method fxRemove
8433    * @param {fabric.Object} object Object to remove
8434    * @param {Function} callback Callback, invoked on effect completion
8435    * @return {fabric.Canvas} thisArg
8436    * @chainable
8437    */
8438   fxRemove: function (object, callbacks) {
8439     callbacks = callbacks || { };
8440 
8441     var empty = function() { },
8442         onComplete = callbacks.onComplete || empty,
8443         onChange = callbacks.onChange || empty,
8444         _this = this;
8445 
8446     fabric.util.animate({
8447       startValue: object.get('opacity'),
8448       endValue: 0,
8449       duration: this.FX_DURATION,
8450       onStart: function() {
8451         object.setActive(false);
8452       },
8453       onChange: function(value) {
8454         object.set('opacity', value);
8455         _this.renderAll();
8456         onChange();
8457       },
8458       onComplete: function () {
8459         _this.remove(object);
8460         onComplete();
8461       }
8462     });
8463 
8464     return this;
8465   }
8466 });
8467 fabric.util.object.extend(fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype, {
8468 
8469   /**
8470    * Populates canvas with data from the specified dataless JSON
8471    * JSON format must conform to the one of `fabric.Canvas#toDatalessJSON`
8472    * @method loadFromDatalessJSON
8473    * @param {String|Object} json JSON string or object
8474    * @param {Function} callback Callback, invoked when json is parsed
8475    *                            and corresponding objects (e.g: fabric.Image)
8476    *                            are initialized
8477    * @return {fabric.Canvas} instance
8478    * @chainable
8479    */
8480   loadFromDatalessJSON: function (json, callback) {
8481 
8482     if (!json) {
8483       return;
8484     }
8485 
8486     // serialize if it wasn't already
8487     var serialized = (typeof json === 'string')
8488       ? JSON.parse(json)
8489       : json;
8490 
8491     if (!serialized || (serialized && !serialized.objects)) return;
8492 
8493     this.clear();
8494 
8495     // TODO: test this
8496     this.backgroundColor = serialized.background;
8497     this._enlivenDatalessObjects(serialized.objects, callback);
8498   },
8499 
8500   /**
8501    * @method _enlivenDatalessObjects
8502    * @param {Array} objects
8503    * @param {Function} callback
8504    */
8505   _enlivenDatalessObjects: function (objects, callback) {
8506 
8507     /** @ignore */
8508     function onObjectLoaded(object, index) {
8509       _this.insertAt(object, index, true);
8510       object.setCoords();
8511       if (++numLoadedObjects === numTotalObjects) {
8512         callback && callback();
8513       }
8514     }
8515 
8516     /** @ignore */
8517     function loadObject(obj, index) {
8518 
8519       var pathProp = obj.paths ? 'paths' : 'path';
8520       var path = obj[pathProp];
8521 
8522       delete obj[pathProp];
8523 
8524       if (typeof path !== 'string') {
8525         if (obj.type === 'image' || obj.type === 'group') {
8526           fabric[fabric.util.string.capitalize(obj.type)].fromObject(obj, function (o) {
8527             onObjectLoaded(o, index);
8528           });
8529         }
8530         else {
8531           var klass = fabric[fabric.util.string.camelize(fabric.util.string.capitalize(obj.type))];
8532           if (!klass || !klass.fromObject) return;
8533 
8534           // restore path
8535           if (path) {
8536             obj[pathProp] = path;
8537           }
8538           onObjectLoaded(klass.fromObject(obj), index);
8539         }
8540       }
8541       else {
8542         if (obj.type === 'image') {
8543           fabric.util.loadImage(path, function (image) {
8544             var oImg = new fabric.Image(image);
8545 
8546             oImg.setSourcePath(path);
8547 
8548             fabric.util.object.extend(oImg, obj);
8549             oImg.setAngle(obj.angle);
8550 
8551             onObjectLoaded(oImg, index);
8552           });
8553         }
8554         else if (obj.type === 'text') {
8555 
8556           if (obj.useNative) {
8557             onObjectLoaded(fabric.Text.fromObject(obj), index);
8558           }
8559           else {
8560             obj.path = path;
8561             var object = fabric.Text.fromObject(obj);
8562             /** @ignore */
8563             var onscriptload = function () {
8564               // TODO (kangax): find out why Opera refuses to work without this timeout
8565               if (Object.prototype.toString.call(fabric.window.opera) === '[object Opera]') {
8566                 setTimeout(function () {
8567                   onObjectLoaded(object, index);
8568                 }, 500);
8569               }
8570               else {
8571                 onObjectLoaded(object, index);
8572               }
8573             };
8574 
8575             fabric.util.getScript(path, onscriptload);
8576           }
8577         }
8578         else {
8579           fabric.loadSVGFromURL(path, function (elements) {
8580             var object = fabric.util.groupSVGElements(elements, obj, path);
8581 
8582             // copy parameters from serialied json to object (left, top, scaleX, scaleY, etc.)
8583             // skip this step if an object is a PathGroup, since we already passed it options object before
8584             if (!(object instanceof fabric.PathGroup)) {
8585               fabric.util.object.extend(object, obj);
8586               if (typeof obj.angle !== 'undefined') {
8587                 object.setAngle(obj.angle);
8588               }
8589             }
8590 
8591             onObjectLoaded(object, index);
8592           });
8593         }
8594       }
8595     }
8596 
8597     var _this = this,
8598         numLoadedObjects = 0,
8599         numTotalObjects = objects.length;
8600 
8601     if (numTotalObjects === 0 && callback) {
8602       callback();
8603     }
8604 
8605     try {
8606       objects.forEach(loadObject, this);
8607     }
8608     catch(e) {
8609       fabric.log(e.message);
8610     }
8611   },
8612 
8613   /**
8614    * Populates canvas with data from the specified JSON
8615    * JSON format must conform to the one of `fabric.Canvas#toJSON`
8616    * @method loadFromJSON
8617    * @param {String|Object} json JSON string or object
8618    * @param {Function} callback Callback, invoked when json is parsed
8619    *                            and corresponding objects (e.g: fabric.Image)
8620    *                            are initialized
8621    * @return {fabric.Canvas} instance
8622    * @chainable
8623    */
8624   loadFromJSON: function (json, callback) {
8625     if (!json) return;
8626 
8627     // serialize if it wasn't already
8628     var serialized = (typeof json === 'string')
8629       ? JSON.parse(json)
8630       : json;
8631 
8632     if (!serialized || (serialized && !serialized.objects)) return;
8633 
8634     this.clear();
8635     var _this = this;
8636     this._enlivenObjects(serialized.objects, function () {
8637       _this.backgroundColor = serialized.background;
8638 
8639       if (serialized.backgroundImage) {
8640         _this.setBackgroundImage(serialized.backgroundImage, function() {
8641 
8642           _this.backgroundImageOpacity = serialized.backgroundImageOpacity;
8643           _this.backgroundImageStretch = serialized.backgroundImageStretch;
8644 
8645           _this.renderAll();
8646 
8647           callback && callback();
8648         });
8649         return;
8650       }
8651       if (serialized.overlayImage) {
8652         _this.setOverlayImage(serialized.overlayImage, function() {
8653 
8654           _this.overlayImageLeft = serialized.overlayImageLeft || 0;
8655           _this.overlayImageTop = serialized.overlayImageTop || 0;
8656 
8657           _this.renderAll();
8658 
8659           callback && callback();
8660         });
8661         return;
8662       }
8663       callback && callback();
8664     });
8665 
8666     return this;
8667   },
8668 
8669   /**
8670    * @method _enlivenObjects
8671    * @param {Array} objects
8672    * @param {Function} callback
8673    */
8674   _enlivenObjects: function (objects, callback) {
8675     var _this = this;
8676     fabric.util.enlivenObjects(objects, function(enlivenedObjects) {
8677       enlivenedObjects.forEach(function(obj, index) {
8678         _this.insertAt(obj, index, true);
8679       });
8680       callback && callback();
8681     });
8682   },
8683 
8684   /**
8685    * @private
8686    * @method _toDataURL
8687    * @param {String} format
8688    * @param {Function} callback
8689    */
8690   _toDataURL: function (format, callback) {
8691     this.clone(function (clone) {
8692       callback(clone.toDataURL(format));
8693     });
8694   },
8695 
8696   /**
8697    * @private
8698    * @method _toDataURLWithMultiplier
8699    * @param {String} format
8700    * @param {Number} multiplier
8701    * @param {Function} callback
8702    */
8703   _toDataURLWithMultiplier: function (format, multiplier, callback) {
8704     this.clone(function (clone) {
8705       callback(clone.toDataURLWithMultiplier(format, multiplier));
8706     });
8707   },
8708 
8709   /**
8710    * Clones canvas instance
8711    * @method clone
8712    * @param {Object} [callback] Receives cloned instance as a first argument
8713    */
8714   clone: function (callback) {
8715     var data = JSON.stringify(this);
8716     this.cloneWithoutData(function(clone) {
8717       clone.loadFromJSON(data, function() {
8718         callback && callback(clone);
8719       });
8720     });
8721   },
8722 
8723   /**
8724    * Clones canvas instance without cloning existing data.
8725    * This essentially copies canvas dimensions, clipping properties, etc.
8726    * but leaves data empty (so that you can populate it with your own)
8727    * @method cloneWithoutData
8728    * @param {Object} [callback] Receives cloned instance as a first argument
8729    */
8730   cloneWithoutData: function(callback) {
8731     var el = fabric.document.createElement('canvas');
8732 
8733     el.width = this.getWidth();
8734     el.height = this.getHeight();
8735 
8736     var clone = new fabric.Canvas(el);
8737     clone.clipTo = this.clipTo;
8738     if (this.backgroundImage) {
8739       clone.setBackgroundImage(this.backgroundImage.src, function() {
8740         clone.renderAll();
8741         callback && callback(clone);
8742       });
8743       clone.backgroundImageOpacity = this.backgroundImageOpacity;
8744       clone.backgroundImageStretch = this.backgroundImageStretch;
8745     }
8746     else {
8747       callback && callback(clone);
8748     }
8749   }
8750 });
8751 (function(global) {
8752 
8753   "use strict";
8754 
8755   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { }),
8756       extend = fabric.util.object.extend,
8757       toFixed = fabric.util.toFixed,
8758       capitalize = fabric.util.string.capitalize,
8759       getPointer = fabric.util.getPointer,
8760       degreesToRadians = fabric.util.degreesToRadians;
8761 
8762   if (fabric.Object) {
8763     return;
8764   }
8765 
8766   var Image = global.Image;
8767   try {
8768     var NodeImage = (typeof require !== 'undefined') && require('canvas').Image;
8769     if (NodeImage) {
8770       Image = NodeImage;
8771     }
8772   }
8773   catch(err) {
8774     fabric.log(err);
8775   }
8776 
8777   /**
8778    * Root object class from which all 2d shape classes inherit from
8779    * @class Object
8780    * @memberOf fabric
8781    */
8782   fabric.Object = fabric.util.createClass(/** @scope fabric.Object.prototype */ {
8783 
8784     /**
8785      * Type of an object (rect, circle, path, etc)
8786      * @property
8787      * @type String
8788      */
8789     type:                       'object',
8790 
8791     /**
8792      * Horizontal origin of transformation of an object (one of "left", "right", "center")
8793      * @property
8794      * @type String
8795      */
8796     originX:                  'center',
8797 
8798     /**
8799      * Vertical origin of transformation of an object (one of "top", "bottom", "center")
8800      * @property
8801      * @type String
8802      */
8803     originY:                  'center',
8804 
8805     /**
8806      * Top position of an object
8807      * @property
8808      * @type Number
8809      */
8810     top:                      0,
8811 
8812     /**
8813      * Left position of an object
8814      * @property
8815      * @type Number
8816      */
8817     left:                     0,
8818 
8819     /**
8820      * Object width
8821      * @property
8822      * @type Number
8823      */
8824     width:                    0,
8825 
8826     /**
8827      * Object height
8828      * @property
8829      * @type Number
8830      */
8831     height:                   0,
8832 
8833     /**
8834      * Object scale factor (horizontal)
8835      * @property
8836      * @type Number
8837      */
8838     scaleX:                   1,
8839 
8840     /**
8841      * Object scale factor (vertical)
8842      * @property
8843      * @type Number
8844      */
8845     scaleY:                   1,
8846 
8847     /**
8848      * When true, an object is rendered as flipped horizontally
8849      * @property
8850      * @type Boolean
8851      */
8852     flipX:                    false,
8853 
8854     /**
8855      * When true, an object is rendered as flipped vertically
8856      * @property
8857      * @type Boolean
8858      */
8859     flipY:                    false,
8860 
8861     /**
8862      * Opacity of an object
8863      * @property
8864      * @type Number
8865      */
8866     opacity:                  1,
8867 
8868     /**
8869      * Angle of rotation of an object (in degrees)
8870      * @property
8871      * @type Number
8872      */
8873     angle:                    0,
8874 
8875     /**
8876      * Size of object's corners (in pixels)
8877      * @property
8878      * @type Number
8879      */
8880     cornerSize:               12,
8881 
8882     /**
8883      * When true, object's corners are rendered as transparent inside (i.e. stroke instead of fill)
8884      * @property
8885      * @type Boolean
8886      */
8887     transparentCorners:       true,
8888 
8889     /**
8890      * Padding between object and its borders (in pixels)
8891      * @property
8892      * @type Number
8893      */
8894     padding:                  0,
8895 
8896     /**
8897      * Border color of an object (when it's active)
8898      * @property
8899      * @type String
8900      */
8901     borderColor:              'rgba(102,153,255,0.75)',
8902 
8903     /**
8904      * Corner color of an object (when it's active)
8905      * @property
8906      * @type String
8907      */
8908     cornerColor:              'rgba(102,153,255,0.5)',
8909 
8910     /**
8911      * Color of object's fill
8912      * @property
8913      * @type String
8914      */
8915     fill:                     'rgb(0,0,0)',
8916 
8917     /**
8918      * Fill rule used to fill an object
8919      * @property
8920      * @type String
8921      */
8922     fillRule:                 'source-over',
8923 
8924     /**
8925      * Overlay fill (takes precedence over fill value)
8926      * @property
8927      * @type String
8928      */
8929     overlayFill:              null,
8930 
8931     /**
8932      * When `true`, an object is rendered via stroke and this property specifies its color
8933      * @property
8934      * @type String
8935      */
8936     stroke:                   null,
8937 
8938     /**
8939      * Width of a stroke used to render this object
8940      * @property
8941      * @type Number
8942      */
8943     strokeWidth:              1,
8944 
8945     /**
8946      * Array specifying dash pattern of an object's stroke
8947      * @property
8948      * @type Array
8949      */
8950     strokeDashArray:          null,
8951 
8952     /**
8953      * Border opacity when object is active and moving
8954      * @property
8955      * @type Number
8956      */
8957     borderOpacityWhenMoving:  0.4,
8958 
8959     /**
8960      * Border scale factor
8961      * @property
8962      * @type Number
8963      */
8964     borderScaleFactor:        1,
8965 
8966     /**
8967      * Transform matrix (similar to SVG's transform matrix)
8968      * @property
8969      * @type Array
8970      */
8971     transformMatrix:          null,
8972 
8973     /**
8974      * Minimum allowed scale value of an object
8975      * @property
8976      * @type Number
8977      */
8978     minScaleLimit:            0.01,
8979 
8980     /**
8981      * When set to `false`, an object can not be selected for modification (using either point-click-based or group-based selection)
8982      * @property
8983      * @type Boolean
8984      */
8985     selectable:               true,
8986 
8987     /**
8988      * When set to `false`, object's controls are not displayed and can not be used to manipulate object
8989      * @property
8990      * @type Boolean
8991      */
8992     hasControls:              true,
8993 
8994     /**
8995      * When set to `false`, object's borders are not rendered
8996      * @property
8997      * @type Boolean
8998      */
8999     hasBorders:               true,
9000 
9001     /**
9002      * When set to `false`, object's rotating point will not be visible or selectable
9003      * @property
9004      * @type Boolean
9005      */
9006     hasRotatingPoint:         true,
9007 
9008     /**
9009      * Offset for object's rotating point (when enabled via `hasRotatingPoint`)
9010      * @property
9011      * @type Number
9012      */
9013     rotatingPointOffset:      40,
9014 
9015     /**
9016      * When set to `true`, objects are "found" on canvas on per-pixel basis rather than according to bounding box
9017      * @property
9018      * @type Boolean
9019      */
9020     perPixelTargetFind:       false,
9021 
9022     /**
9023      * When `false`, default object's values are not included in its serialization
9024      * @property
9025      * @type Boolean
9026      */
9027     includeDefaultValues:     true,
9028 
9029     /**
9030      * List of properties to consider when checking if state of an object is changed (fabric.Object#hasStateChanged);
9031      * as well as for history (undo/redo) purposes
9032      * @property
9033      * @type Array
9034      */
9035     stateProperties:  (
9036       'top left width height scaleX scaleY flipX flipY ' +
9037       'angle opacity cornerSize fill overlayFill originX originY ' +
9038       'stroke strokeWidth strokeDashArray fillRule ' +
9039       'borderScaleFactor transformMatrix selectable'
9040     ).split(' '),
9041 
9042     /**
9043      * Constructor
9044      * @method initialize
9045      * @param {Object} [options] Options object
9046      */
9047     initialize: function(options) {
9048       if (options) {
9049         this.setOptions(options);
9050       }
9051     },
9052 
9053     /**
9054      * @private
9055      * @method _initGradient
9056      */
9057     _initGradient: function(options) {
9058       if (options.fill && typeof options.fill === 'object' && !(options.fill instanceof fabric.Gradient)) {
9059         this.set('fill', new fabric.Gradient(options.fill));
9060       }
9061     },
9062 
9063     /**
9064      * Sets object's properties from options
9065      * @method setOptions
9066      * @param {Object} [options]
9067      */
9068     setOptions: function(options) {
9069       for (var prop in options) {
9070         this.set(prop, options[prop]);
9071       }
9072       this._initGradient(options);
9073     },
9074 
9075     /**
9076      * Transforms context when rendering an object
9077      * @method transform
9078      * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D} ctx Context
9079      */
9080     transform: function(ctx) {
9081       ctx.globalAlpha = this.opacity;
9082 
9083       var center = this.getCenterPoint();
9084       ctx.translate(center.x, center.y);
9085       ctx.rotate(degreesToRadians(this.angle));
9086       ctx.scale(
9087         this.scaleX * (this.flipX ? -1 : 1),
9088         this.scaleY * (this.flipY ? -1 : 1)
9089       );
9090     },
9091 
9092     /**
9093      * Returns an object representation of an instance
9094      * @method toObject
9095      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
9096      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
9097      */
9098     toObject: function(propertiesToInclude) {
9099 
9100       var NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS = fabric.Object.NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS;
9101 
9102       var object = {
9103         type:             this.type,
9104         originX:          this.originX,
9105         originY:          this.originY,
9106         left:             toFixed(this.left, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS),
9107         top:              toFixed(this.top, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS),
9108         width:            toFixed(this.width, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS),
9109         height:           toFixed(this.height, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS),
9110         fill:             (this.fill && this.fill.toObject) ? this.fill.toObject() : this.fill,
9111         overlayFill:      this.overlayFill,
9112         stroke:           this.stroke,
9113         strokeWidth:      this.strokeWidth,
9114         strokeDashArray:  this.strokeDashArray,
9115         scaleX:           toFixed(this.scaleX, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS),
9116         scaleY:           toFixed(this.scaleY, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS),
9117         angle:            toFixed(this.getAngle(), NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS),
9118         flipX:            this.flipX,
9119         flipY:            this.flipY,
9120         opacity:          toFixed(this.opacity, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS),
9121         selectable:       this.selectable,
9122         hasControls:      this.hasControls,
9123         hasBorders:       this.hasBorders,
9124         hasRotatingPoint: this.hasRotatingPoint,
9125         transparentCorners: this.transparentCorners,
9126         perPixelTargetFind: this.perPixelTargetFind
9127       };
9128 
9129       if (!this.includeDefaultValues) {
9130         object = this._removeDefaultValues(object);
9131       }
9132       fabric.util.populateWithProperties(this, object, propertiesToInclude);
9133 
9134       return object;
9135     },
9136 
9137     /**
9138      * Returns (dataless) object representation of an instance
9139      * @method toDatalessObject
9140      * @param {Array} [propertiesToInclude]
9141      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
9142      */
9143     toDatalessObject: function(propertiesToInclude) {
9144       // will be overwritten by subclasses
9145       return this.toObject(propertiesToInclude);
9146     },
9147 
9148     /**
9149      * Returns styles-string for svg-export
9150      * @method getSvgStyles
9151      * @return {String}
9152      */
9153     getSvgStyles: function() {
9154       return [
9155         "stroke: ", (this.stroke ? this.stroke : 'none'), "; ",
9156         "stroke-width: ", (this.strokeWidth ? this.strokeWidth : '0'), "; ",
9157         "stroke-dasharray: ", (this.strokeDashArray ? this.strokeDashArray.join(' ') : "; "),
9158         "fill: ", (this.fill ? this.fill : 'none'), "; ",
9159         "opacity: ", (this.opacity ? this.opacity : '1'), ";"
9160       ].join("");
9161     },
9162 
9163     /**
9164      * Returns transform-string for svg-export
9165      * @method getSvgTransform
9166      * @return {String}
9167      */
9168     getSvgTransform: function() {
9169       var angle = this.getAngle();
9170       var center = this.getCenterPoint();
9171 
9172       var NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS = fabric.Object.NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS;
9173 
9174       var translatePart = "translate(" +
9175                             toFixed(center.x, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS) +
9176                             " " +
9177                             toFixed(center.y, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS) +
9178                           ")";
9179 
9180       var anglePart = angle !== 0
9181         ? (" rotate(" + toFixed(angle, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS) + ")")
9182         : '';
9183 
9184       var scalePart = (this.scaleX === 1 && this.scaleY === 1)
9185         ? '' :
9186         (" scale(" +
9187           toFixed(this.scaleX, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS) +
9188           " " +
9189           toFixed(this.scaleY, NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS) +
9190         ")");
9191 
9192       var flipXPart = this.flipX ? "matrix(-1 0 0 1 0 0) " : "";
9193       var flipYPart = this.flipY ? "matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)" : "";
9194 
9195       return [ translatePart, anglePart, scalePart, flipXPart, flipYPart ].join('');
9196     },
9197 
9198     /**
9199      * @private
9200      * @method _removeDefaultValues
9201      */
9202     _removeDefaultValues: function(object) {
9203       var defaultOptions = fabric.Object.prototype.options;
9204       if (defaultOptions) {
9205         this.stateProperties.forEach(function(prop) {
9206           if (object[prop] === defaultOptions[prop]) {
9207             delete object[prop];
9208           }
9209         });
9210       }
9211       return object;
9212     },
9213 
9214     /**
9215      * Returns true if an object is in its active state
9216      * @return {Boolean} true if an object is in its active state
9217      */
9218     isActive: function() {
9219       return !!this.active;
9220     },
9221 
9222     /**
9223      * Sets state of an object - `true` makes it active, `false` - inactive
9224      * @param {Boolean} active
9225      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9226      * @chainable
9227      */
9228     setActive: function(active) {
9229       this.active = !!active;
9230       return this;
9231     },
9232 
9233     /**
9234      * Returns a string representation of an instance
9235      * @return {String}
9236      */
9237     toString: function() {
9238       return "#<fabric." + capitalize(this.type) + ">";
9239     },
9240 
9241     /**
9242      * Makes sure the scale is valid and modifies it if necessary
9243      * @private
9244      * @method _constrainScale
9245      * @param {Number} value
9246      * @return {Number}
9247      */
9248     _constrainScale: function(value) {
9249       if (Math.abs(value) < this.minScaleLimit) {
9250         if (value < 0)
9251           return -this.minScaleLimit;
9252         else
9253           return this.minScaleLimit;
9254       }
9255 
9256       return value;
9257     },
9258 
9259     /**
9260      * Sets property to a given value
9261      * @method set
9262      * @param {String} name
9263      * @param {Object|Function} value
9264      * @return {fabric.Group} thisArg
9265      * @chainable
9266      */
9267     set: function(key, value) {
9268       if (typeof key === 'object') {
9269         for (var prop in key) {
9270           this._set(prop, key[prop]);
9271         }
9272       }
9273       else {
9274         if (typeof value === 'function') {
9275           this._set(key, value(this.get(key)));
9276         }
9277         else {
9278           this._set(key, value);
9279         }
9280       }
9281       return this;
9282     },
9283 
9284     /**
9285      * @private
9286      * @method _set
9287      * @param key
9288      * @param value
9289      */
9290     _set: function(key, value) {
9291       var shouldConstrainValue = (key === 'scaleX' || key === 'scaleY');
9292 
9293       if (shouldConstrainValue) {
9294         value = this._constrainScale(value);
9295       }
9296       if (key === 'scaleX' && value < 0) {
9297         this.flipX = !this.flipX;
9298         value *= -1;
9299       }
9300       else if (key === 'scaleY' && value < 0) {
9301         this.flipY = !this.flipY;
9302         value *= -1;
9303       }
9304       else if (key === 'width' || key === 'height') {
9305         this.minScaleLimit = toFixed(Math.min(0.1, 1/Math.max(this.width, this.height)), 2);
9306       }
9307 
9308       this[key] = value;
9309 
9310       return this;
9311     },
9312 
9313     /**
9314      * Toggles specified property from `true` to `false` or from `false` to `true`
9315      * @method toggle
9316      * @param {String} property property to toggle
9317      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9318      * @chainable
9319      */
9320     toggle: function(property) {
9321       var value = this.get(property);
9322       if (typeof value === 'boolean') {
9323         this.set(property, !value);
9324       }
9325       return this;
9326     },
9327 
9328     /**
9329      * Sets sourcePath of an object
9330      * @method setSourcePath
9331      * @param {String} value
9332      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9333      * @chainable
9334      */
9335     setSourcePath: function(value) {
9336       this.sourcePath = value;
9337       return this;
9338     },
9339 
9340     /**
9341      * Basic getter
9342      * @method get
9343      * @param {String} property
9344      * @return {Any} value of a property
9345      */
9346     get: function(property) {
9347       return this[property];
9348     },
9349 
9350     /**
9351      * Renders an object on a specified context
9352      * @method render
9353      * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D} ctx context to render on
9354      * @param {Boolean} noTransform
9355      */
9356     render: function(ctx, noTransform) {
9357 
9358       // do not render if width or height are zeros
9359       if (this.width === 0 || this.height === 0) return;
9360 
9361       ctx.save();
9362 
9363       var m = this.transformMatrix;
9364       if (m && !this.group) {
9365         ctx.setTransform(m[0], m[1], m[2], m[3], m[4], m[5]);
9366       }
9367 
9368       if (!noTransform) {
9369         this.transform(ctx);
9370       }
9371 
9372       if (this.stroke || this.strokeDashArray) {
9373         ctx.lineWidth = this.strokeWidth;
9374         ctx.strokeStyle = this.stroke;
9375       }
9376 
9377       if (this.overlayFill) {
9378         ctx.fillStyle = this.overlayFill;
9379       }
9380       else if (this.fill) {
9381         ctx.fillStyle = this.fill.toLiveGradient
9382           ? this.fill.toLiveGradient(ctx)
9383           : this.fill;
9384       }
9385 
9386       if (m && this.group) {
9387         ctx.translate(-this.group.width/2, -this.group.height/2);
9388         ctx.transform(m[0], m[1], m[2], m[3], m[4], m[5]);
9389       }
9390 
9391       this._render(ctx, noTransform);
9392 
9393       if (this.active && !noTransform) {
9394         this.drawBorders(ctx);
9395         this.drawCorners(ctx);
9396       }
9397       ctx.restore();
9398     },
9399 
9400     /**
9401      * Returns width of an object
9402      * @method getWidth
9403      * @return {Number} width value
9404      */
9405     getWidth: function() {
9406       return this.width * this.scaleX;
9407     },
9408 
9409     /**
9410      * Returns height of an object
9411      * @method getHeight
9412      * @return {Number} height value
9413      */
9414     getHeight: function() {
9415       return this.height * this.scaleY;
9416     },
9417 
9418     /**
9419      * Translates the coordinates from origin to center coordinates (based on the object's dimensions)
9420      * @method translateToCenterPoint
9421      * @param {fabric.Point} point The point which corresponds to the originX and originY params
9422      * @param {string} enum('left', 'center', 'right') Horizontal origin
9423      * @param {string} enum('top', 'center', 'bottom') Vertical origin
9424      * @return {fabric.Point}
9425      */
9426     translateToCenterPoint: function(point, originX, originY) {
9427       var cx = point.x, cy = point.y;
9428 
9429       if ( originX === "left" ) {
9430         cx = point.x + this.getWidth() / 2;
9431       }
9432       else if ( originX === "right" ) {
9433         cx = point.x - this.getWidth() / 2;
9434       }
9435 
9436       if ( originY === "top" ) {
9437         cy = point.y + this.getHeight() / 2;
9438       }
9439       else if ( originY === "bottom" ) {
9440         cy = point.y - this.getHeight() / 2;
9441       }
9442 
9443       // Apply the reverse rotation to the point (it's already scaled properly)
9444       return fabric.util.rotatePoint(new fabric.Point(cx, cy), point, degreesToRadians(this.angle));
9445     },
9446 
9447     /**
9448      * Translates the coordinates from center to origin coordinates (based on the object's dimensions)
9449      * @method translateToOriginPoint
9450      * @param {fabric.Point} point The point which corresponds to center of the object
9451      * @param {string} enum('left', 'center', 'right') Horizontal origin
9452      * @param {string} enum('top', 'center', 'bottom') Vertical origin
9453      * @return {fabric.Point}
9454      */
9455     translateToOriginPoint: function(center, originX, originY) {
9456       var x = center.x, y = center.y;
9457 
9458       // Get the point coordinates
9459       if ( originX === "left" ) {
9460         x = center.x - this.getWidth() / 2;
9461       }
9462       else if ( originX === "right" ) {
9463         x = center.x + this.getWidth() / 2;
9464       }
9465       if ( originY === "top" ) {
9466         y = center.y - this.getHeight() / 2;
9467       }
9468       else if ( originY === "bottom" ) {
9469         y = center.y + this.getHeight() / 2;
9470       }
9471 
9472       // Apply the rotation to the point (it's already scaled properly)
9473       return fabric.util.rotatePoint(new fabric.Point(x, y), center, degreesToRadians(this.angle));
9474     },
9475 
9476     /**
9477      * Returns the real center coordinates of the object
9478      * @method getCenterPoint
9479      * @return {fabric.Point}
9480      */
9481     getCenterPoint: function() {
9482       return this.translateToCenterPoint(
9483         new fabric.Point(this.left, this.top), this.originX, this.originY);
9484     },
9485 
9486     /**
9487      * Returns the coordinates of the object based on center coordinates
9488      * @method getOriginPoint
9489      * @param {fabric.Point} point The point which corresponds to the originX and originY params
9490      * @return {fabric.Point}
9491      */
9492     getOriginPoint: function(center) {
9493       return this.translateToOriginPoint(center, this.originX, this.originY);
9494     },
9495 
9496     /**
9497      * Returns the coordinates of the object as if it has a different origin
