9498      * @method getPointByOrigin
9499      * @param {string} enum('left', 'center', 'right') Horizontal origin
9500      * @param {string} enum('top', 'center', 'bottom') Vertical origin
9501      * @return {fabric.Point}
9502      */
9503     getPointByOrigin: function(originX, originY) {
9504       var center = this.getCenterPoint();
9505 
9506       return this.translateToOriginPoint(center, originX, originY);
9507     },
9508 
9509     /**
9510      * Returns the point in local coordinates
9511      * @method toLocalPoint
9512      * @param {fabric.Point} The point relative to the global coordinate system
9513      * @return {fabric.Point}
9514      */
9515     toLocalPoint: function(point, originX, originY) {
9516       var center = this.getCenterPoint();
9517 
9518       var x, y;
9519       if (originX !== undefined && originY !== undefined) {
9520         if ( originX === "left" ) {
9521           x = center.x - this.getWidth() / 2;
9522         }
9523         else if ( originX === "right" ) {
9524           x = center.x + this.getWidth() / 2;
9525         }
9526         else {
9527           x = center.x;
9528         }
9529 
9530         if ( originY === "top" ) {
9531           y = center.y - this.getHeight() / 2;
9532         }
9533         else if ( originY === "bottom" ) {
9534           y = center.y + this.getHeight() / 2;
9535         }
9536         else {
9537           y = center.y;
9538         }
9539       }
9540       else {
9541         x = this.left;
9542         y = this.top;
9543       }
9544 
9545       return fabric.util.rotatePoint(new fabric.Point(point.x, point.y), center, -degreesToRadians(this.angle)).subtractEquals(new fabric.Point(x, y));
9546     },
9547 
9548     /**
9549      * Returns the point in global coordinates
9550      * @method toGlobalPoint
9551      * @param {fabric.Point} The point relative to the local coordinate system
9552      * @return {fabric.Point}
9553      */
9554     toGlobalPoint: function(point) {
9555       return fabric.util.rotatePoint(point, this.getCenterPoint(), degreesToRadians(this.angle)).addEquals(new fabric.Point(this.left, this.top));
9556     },
9557 
9558     /**
9559      * Sets the position of the object taking into consideration the object's origin
9560      * @method setPositionByOrigin
9561      * @param {fabric.Point} point The new position of the object
9562      * @param {string} enum('left', 'center', 'right') Horizontal origin
9563      * @param {string} enum('top', 'center', 'bottom') Vertical origin
9564      * @return {void}
9565      */
9566     setPositionByOrigin: function(pos, originX, originY) {
9567       var center = this.translateToCenterPoint(pos, originX, originY);
9568       var position = this.translateToOriginPoint(center, this.originX, this.originY);
9569 
9570       this.set('left', position.x);
9571       this.set('top', position.y);
9572     },
9573 
9574     /**
9575      * Scales an object (equally by x and y)
9576      * @method scale
9577      * @param value {Number} scale factor
9578      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9579      * @chainable
9580      */
9581     scale: function(value) {
9582       value = this._constrainScale(value);
9583 
9584       if (value < 0) {
9585         this.flipX = !this.flipX;
9586         this.flipY = !this.flipY;
9587         value *= -1;
9588       }
9589 
9590       this.scaleX = value;
9591       this.scaleY = value;
9592       this.setCoords();
9593       return this;
9594     },
9595 
9596     /**
9597      * Scales an object to a given width, with respect to bounding box (scaling by x/y equally)
9598      * @method scaleToWidth
9599      * @param value {Number} new width value
9600      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9601      * @chainable
9602      */
9603     scaleToWidth: function(value) {
9604       // adjust to bounding rect factor so that rotated shapes would fit as well
9605       var boundingRectFactor = this.getBoundingRectWidth() / this.getWidth();
9606       return this.scale(value / this.width / boundingRectFactor);
9607     },
9608 
9609     /**
9610      * Scales an object to a given height, with respect to bounding box (scaling by x/y equally)
9611      * @method scaleToHeight
9612      * @param value {Number} new height value
9613      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9614      * @chainable
9615      */
9616     scaleToHeight: function(value) {
9617       // adjust to bounding rect factor so that rotated shapes would fit as well
9618       var boundingRectFactor = this.getBoundingRectHeight() / this.getHeight();
9619       return this.scale(value / this.height / boundingRectFactor);
9620     },
9621 
9622     /**
9623      * Sets corner position coordinates based on current angle, width and height
9624      * @method setCoords
9625      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9626      * @chainable
9627      */
9628     setCoords: function() {
9629 
9630       var strokeWidth = this.strokeWidth > 1 ? this.strokeWidth : 0,
9631           padding = this.padding,
9632           theta = degreesToRadians(this.angle);
9633 
9634       this.currentWidth = (this.width + strokeWidth) * this.scaleX + padding * 2;
9635       this.currentHeight = (this.height + strokeWidth) * this.scaleY + padding * 2;
9636 
9637       //If width is negative, make postive. Fixes path selection issue
9638       if(this.currentWidth < 0){
9639          this.currentWidth = Math.abs(this.currentWidth);
9640       }
9641 
9642       var _hypotenuse = Math.sqrt(
9643         Math.pow(this.currentWidth / 2, 2) +
9644         Math.pow(this.currentHeight / 2, 2));
9645 
9646       var _angle = Math.atan(this.currentHeight / this.currentWidth);
9647 
9648       // offset added for rotate and scale actions
9649       var offsetX = Math.cos(_angle + theta) * _hypotenuse,
9650           offsetY = Math.sin(_angle + theta) * _hypotenuse,
9651           sinTh = Math.sin(theta),
9652           cosTh = Math.cos(theta);
9653 
9654       var coords = this.getCenterPoint();
9655       var tl = {
9656         x: coords.x - offsetX,
9657         y: coords.y - offsetY
9658       };
9659       var tr = {
9660         x: tl.x + (this.currentWidth * cosTh),
9661         y: tl.y + (this.currentWidth * sinTh)
9662       };
9663       var br = {
9664         x: tr.x - (this.currentHeight * sinTh),
9665         y: tr.y + (this.currentHeight * cosTh)
9666       };
9667       var bl = {
9668         x: tl.x - (this.currentHeight * sinTh),
9669         y: tl.y + (this.currentHeight * cosTh)
9670       };
9671       var ml = {
9672         x: tl.x - (this.currentHeight/2 * sinTh),
9673         y: tl.y + (this.currentHeight/2 * cosTh)
9674       };
9675       var mt = {
9676         x: tl.x + (this.currentWidth/2 * cosTh),
9677         y: tl.y + (this.currentWidth/2 * sinTh)
9678       };
9679       var mr = {
9680         x: tr.x - (this.currentHeight/2 * sinTh),
9681         y: tr.y + (this.currentHeight/2 * cosTh)
9682       };
9683       var mb = {
9684         x: bl.x + (this.currentWidth/2 * cosTh),
9685         y: bl.y + (this.currentWidth/2 * sinTh)
9686       };
9687       var mtr = {
9688         x: tl.x + (this.currentWidth/2 * cosTh),
9689         y: tl.y + (this.currentWidth/2 * sinTh)
9690       };
9691 
9692       // debugging
9693 
9694       // setTimeout(function() {
9695       //   canvas.contextTop.fillStyle = 'green';
9696       //   canvas.contextTop.fillRect(mb.x, mb.y, 3, 3);
9697       //   canvas.contextTop.fillRect(bl.x, bl.y, 3, 3);
9698       //   canvas.contextTop.fillRect(br.x, br.y, 3, 3);
9699       //   canvas.contextTop.fillRect(tl.x, tl.y, 3, 3);
9700       //   canvas.contextTop.fillRect(tr.x, tr.y, 3, 3);
9701       //   canvas.contextTop.fillRect(ml.x, ml.y, 3, 3);
9702       //   canvas.contextTop.fillRect(mr.x, mr.y, 3, 3);
9703       //   canvas.contextTop.fillRect(mt.x, mt.y, 3, 3);
9704       // }, 50);
9705 
9706       // clockwise
9707       this.oCoords = { tl: tl, tr: tr, br: br, bl: bl, ml: ml, mt: mt, mr: mr, mb: mb, mtr: mtr };
9708 
9709       // set coordinates of the draggable boxes in the corners used to scale/rotate the image
9710       this._setCornerCoords();
9711 
9712       return this;
9713     },
9714 
9715      /**
9716      * Returns width of an object's bounding rectangle
9717      * @method getBoundingRectWidth
9718      * @return {Number} width value
9719      */
9720     getBoundingRectWidth: function() {
9721       this.oCoords || this.setCoords();
9722       var xCoords = [this.oCoords.tl.x, this.oCoords.tr.x, this.oCoords.br.x, this.oCoords.bl.x];
9723       var minX = fabric.util.array.min(xCoords);
9724       var maxX = fabric.util.array.max(xCoords);
9725       return Math.abs(minX - maxX);
9726     },
9727 
9728     /**
9729      * Returns height of an object's bounding rectangle
9730      * @method getBoundingRectHeight
9731      * @return {Number} height value
9732      */
9733     getBoundingRectHeight: function() {
9734       this.oCoords || this.setCoords();
9735       var yCoords = [this.oCoords.tl.y, this.oCoords.tr.y, this.oCoords.br.y, this.oCoords.bl.y];
9736       var minY = fabric.util.array.min(yCoords);
9737       var maxY = fabric.util.array.max(yCoords);
9738       return Math.abs(minY - maxY);
9739     },
9740 
9741     /**
9742      * Draws borders of an object's bounding box.
9743      * Requires public properties: width, height
9744      * Requires public options: padding, borderColor
9745      * @method drawBorders
9746      * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D} ctx Context to draw on
9747      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9748      * @chainable
9749      */
9750     drawBorders: function(ctx) {
9751       if (!this.hasBorders) return;
9752 
9753       var padding = this.padding,
9754           padding2 = padding * 2,
9755           strokeWidth = this.strokeWidth > 1 ? this.strokeWidth : 0;
9756 
9757       ctx.save();
9758 
9759       ctx.globalAlpha = this.isMoving ? this.borderOpacityWhenMoving : 1;
9760       ctx.strokeStyle = this.borderColor;
9761 
9762       var scaleX = 1 / this._constrainScale(this.scaleX),
9763           scaleY = 1 / this._constrainScale(this.scaleY);
9764 
9765       ctx.lineWidth = 1 / this.borderScaleFactor;
9766 
9767       ctx.scale(scaleX, scaleY);
9768 
9769       var w = this.getWidth(),
9770           h = this.getHeight();
9771 
9772       ctx.strokeRect(
9773         ~~(-(w / 2) - padding - strokeWidth / 2 * this.scaleX) + 0.5, // offset needed to make lines look sharper
9774         ~~(-(h / 2) - padding - strokeWidth / 2 * this.scaleY) + 0.5,
9775         ~~(w + padding2 + strokeWidth * this.scaleX),
9776         ~~(h + padding2 + strokeWidth * this.scaleY)
9777       );
9778 
9779       if (this.hasRotatingPoint && !this.get('lockRotation') && this.hasControls) {
9780 
9781         var rotateHeight = (
9782           this.flipY
9783             ? h + (strokeWidth * this.scaleY) + (padding * 2)
9784             : -h - (strokeWidth * this.scaleY) - (padding * 2)
9785         ) / 2;
9786 
9787         ctx.beginPath();
9788         ctx.moveTo(0, rotateHeight);
9789         ctx.lineTo(0, rotateHeight + (this.flipY ? this.rotatingPointOffset : -this.rotatingPointOffset));
9790         ctx.closePath();
9791         ctx.stroke();
9792       }
9793 
9794       ctx.restore();
9795       return this;
9796     },
9797 
9798     /**
9799      * @private
9800      * @method _renderDashedStroke
9801      */
9802     _renderDashedStroke: function(ctx) {
9803 
9804       if (1 & this.strokeDashArray.length /* if odd number of items */) {
9805         /* duplicate items */
9806         this.strokeDashArray.push.apply(this.strokeDashArray, this.strokeDashArray);
9807       }
9808 
9809       var i = 0,
9810           x = -this.width/2, y = -this.height/2,
9811           _this = this,
9812           padding = this.padding,
9813           dashedArrayLength = this.strokeDashArray.length;
9814 
9815       ctx.save();
9816       ctx.beginPath();
9817 
9818       /** @ignore */
9819       function renderSide(xMultiplier, yMultiplier) {
9820 
9821         var lineLength = 0,
9822             lengthDiff = 0,
9823             sideLength = (yMultiplier ? _this.height : _this.width) + padding * 2;
9824 
9825         while (lineLength < sideLength) {
9826 
9827           var lengthOfSubPath = _this.strokeDashArray[i++];
9828           lineLength += lengthOfSubPath;
9829 
9830           if (lineLength > sideLength) {
9831             lengthDiff = lineLength - sideLength;
9832           }
9833 
9834           // track coords
9835           if (xMultiplier) {
9836             x += (lengthOfSubPath * xMultiplier) - (lengthDiff * xMultiplier || 0);
9837           }
9838           else {
9839             y += (lengthOfSubPath * yMultiplier) - (lengthDiff * yMultiplier || 0);
9840           }
9841 
9842           ctx[1 & i /* odd */ ? 'moveTo' : 'lineTo'](x, y);
9843           if (i >= dashedArrayLength) {
9844             i = 0;
9845           }
9846         }
9847       }
9848 
9849       renderSide(1, 0);
9850       renderSide(0, 1);
9851       renderSide(-1, 0);
9852       renderSide(0, -1);
9853 
9854       ctx.stroke();
9855       ctx.closePath();
9856       ctx.restore();
9857     },
9858 
9859     /**
9860      * Draws corners of an object's bounding box.
9861      * Requires public properties: width, height, scaleX, scaleY
9862      * Requires public options: cornerSize, padding
9863      * @method drawCorners
9864      * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D} ctx Context to draw on
9865      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9866      * @chainable
9867      */
9868     drawCorners: function(ctx) {
9869       if (!this.hasControls) return;
9870 
9871       var size = this.cornerSize,
9872           size2 = size / 2,
9873           strokeWidth2 = this.strokeWidth / 2,
9874           left = -(this.width / 2),
9875           top = -(this.height / 2),
9876           _left,
9877           _top,
9878           sizeX = size / this.scaleX,
9879           sizeY = size / this.scaleY,
9880           paddingX = this.padding / this.scaleX,
9881           paddingY = this.padding / this.scaleY,
9882           scaleOffsetY = size2 / this.scaleY,
9883           scaleOffsetX = size2 / this.scaleX,
9884           scaleOffsetSizeX = (size2 - size) / this.scaleX,
9885           scaleOffsetSizeY = (size2 - size) / this.scaleY,
9886           height = this.height,
9887           width = this.width,
9888           methodName = this.transparentCorners ? 'strokeRect' : 'fillRect';
9889 
9890       ctx.save();
9891 
9892       ctx.lineWidth = 1 / Math.max(this.scaleX, this.scaleY);
9893 
9894       ctx.globalAlpha = this.isMoving ? this.borderOpacityWhenMoving : 1;
9895       ctx.strokeStyle = ctx.fillStyle = this.cornerColor;
9896 
9897       // top-left
9898       _left = left - scaleOffsetX - strokeWidth2 - paddingX;
9899       _top = top - scaleOffsetY - strokeWidth2 - paddingY;
9900 
9901       ctx.clearRect(_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9902       ctx[methodName](_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9903 
9904       // top-right
9905       _left = left + width - scaleOffsetX + strokeWidth2 + paddingX;
9906       _top = top - scaleOffsetY - strokeWidth2 - paddingY;
9907 
9908       ctx.clearRect(_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9909       ctx[methodName](_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9910 
9911       // bottom-left
9912       _left = left - scaleOffsetX - strokeWidth2 - paddingX;
9913       _top = top + height + scaleOffsetSizeY + strokeWidth2 + paddingY;
9914 
9915       ctx.clearRect(_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9916       ctx[methodName](_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9917 
9918       // bottom-right
9919       _left = left + width + scaleOffsetSizeX + strokeWidth2 + paddingX;
9920       _top = top + height + scaleOffsetSizeY + strokeWidth2 + paddingY;
9921 
9922       ctx.clearRect(_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9923       ctx[methodName](_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9924 
9925       if (!this.get('lockUniScaling')) {
9926         // middle-top
9927         _left = left + width/2 - scaleOffsetX;
9928         _top = top - scaleOffsetY - strokeWidth2 - paddingY;
9929 
9930         ctx.clearRect(_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9931         ctx[methodName](_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9932 
9933         // middle-bottom
9934         _left = left + width/2 - scaleOffsetX;
9935         _top = top + height + scaleOffsetSizeY + strokeWidth2 + paddingY;
9936 
9937         ctx.clearRect(_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9938         ctx[methodName](_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9939 
9940         // middle-right
9941         _left = left + width + scaleOffsetSizeX + strokeWidth2 + paddingX;
9942         _top = top + height/2 - scaleOffsetY;
9943 
9944         ctx.clearRect(_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9945         ctx[methodName](_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9946 
9947         // middle-left
9948         _left = left - scaleOffsetX - strokeWidth2 - paddingX;
9949         _top = top + height/2 - scaleOffsetY;
9950 
9951         ctx.clearRect(_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9952         ctx[methodName](_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9953       }
9954 
9955       // middle-top-rotate
9956       if (this.hasRotatingPoint) {
9957 
9958         _left = left + width/2 - scaleOffsetX;
9959 
9960         _top = this.flipY ?
9961           (top + height + (this.rotatingPointOffset / this.scaleY) - sizeY/2 + strokeWidth2 + paddingY)
9962           : (top - (this.rotatingPointOffset / this.scaleY) - sizeY/2 - strokeWidth2 - paddingY);
9963 
9964         ctx.clearRect(_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9965         ctx[methodName](_left, _top, sizeX, sizeY);
9966       }
9967 
9968       ctx.restore();
9969 
9970       return this;
9971     },
9972 
9973     /**
9974      * Clones an instance
9975      * @method clone
9976      * @param {Function} callback Callback is invoked with a clone as a first argument
9977      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
9978      * @return {fabric.Object} clone of an instance
9979      */
9980     clone: function(callback, propertiesToInclude) {
9981       if (this.constructor.fromObject) {
9982         return this.constructor.fromObject(this.toObject(propertiesToInclude), callback);
9983       }
9984       return new fabric.Object(this.toObject(propertiesToInclude));
9985     },
9986 
9987     /**
9988      * Creates an instance of fabric.Image out of an object
9989      * @method cloneAsImage
9990      * @param callback {Function} callback, invoked with an instance as a first argument
9991      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
9992      * @chainable
9993      */
9994     cloneAsImage: function(callback) {
9995       if (fabric.Image) {
9996         var i = new Image();
9997 
9998         /** @ignore */
9999         i.onload = function() {
10000           if (callback) {
10001             callback(new fabric.Image(i), orig);
10002           }
10003           i = i.onload = null;
10004         };
10005 
10006         var orig = {
10007           angle: this.get('angle'),
10008           flipX: this.get('flipX'),
10009           flipY: this.get('flipY')
10010         };
10011 
10012         // normalize angle
10013         this.set('angle', 0).set('flipX', false).set('flipY', false);
10014         this.toDataURL(function(dataURL) {
10015           i.src = dataURL;
10016         });
10017       }
10018       return this;
10019     },
10020 
10021     /**
10022      * Converts an object into a data-url-like string
10023      * @method toDataURL
10024      * @return {String} string of data
10025      */
10026     toDataURL: function(callback) {
10027       var el = fabric.document.createElement('canvas');
10028       if (!el.getContext && typeof G_vmlCanvasManager !== 'undefined') {
10029         G_vmlCanvasManager.initElement(el);
10030       }
10031 
10032       el.width = this.getBoundingRectWidth();
10033       el.height = this.getBoundingRectHeight();
10034 
10035       fabric.util.wrapElement(el, 'div');
10036 
10037       var canvas = new fabric.Canvas(el);
10038       canvas.backgroundColor = 'transparent';
10039       canvas.renderAll();
10040 
10041       if (this.constructor.async) {
10042         this.clone(proceed);
10043       }
10044       else {
10045         proceed(this.clone());
10046       }
10047 
10048       function proceed(clone) {
10049         clone.left = el.width / 2;
10050         clone.top = el.height / 2;
10051 
10052         clone.setActive(false);
10053 
10054         canvas.add(clone);
10055         var data = canvas.toDataURL('png');
10056 
10057         canvas.dispose();
10058         canvas = clone = null;
10059 
10060         callback && callback(data);
10061       }
10062     },
10063 
10064     /**
10065      * Returns true if object state (one of its state properties) was changed
10066      * @method hasStateChanged
10067      * @return {Boolean} true if instance' state has changed
10068      */
10069     hasStateChanged: function() {
10070       return this.stateProperties.some(function(prop) {
10071         return this[prop] !== this.originalState[prop];
10072       }, this);
10073     },
10074 
10075     /**
10076      * Saves state of an object
10077      * @method saveState
10078      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10079      * @chainable
10080      */
10081     saveState: function() {
10082       this.stateProperties.forEach(function(prop) {
10083         this.originalState[prop] = this.get(prop);
10084       }, this);
10085       return this;
10086     },
10087 
10088     /**
10089      * Setups state of an object
10090      * @method setupState
10091      */
10092     setupState: function() {
10093       this.originalState = { };
10094       this.saveState();
10095     },
10096 
10097     /**
10098      * Returns true if object intersects with an area formed by 2 points
10099      * @method intersectsWithRect
10100      * @param {Object} selectionTL
10101      * @param {Object} selectionBR
10102      * @return {Boolean}
10103      */
10104     intersectsWithRect: function(selectionTL, selectionBR) {
10105       var oCoords = this.oCoords,
10106           tl = new fabric.Point(oCoords.tl.x, oCoords.tl.y),
10107           tr = new fabric.Point(oCoords.tr.x, oCoords.tr.y),
10108           bl = new fabric.Point(oCoords.bl.x, oCoords.bl.y),
10109           br = new fabric.Point(oCoords.br.x, oCoords.br.y);
10110 
10111       var intersection = fabric.Intersection.intersectPolygonRectangle(
10112         [tl, tr, br, bl],
10113         selectionTL,
10114         selectionBR
10115       );
10116       return (intersection.status === 'Intersection');
10117     },
10118 
10119     /**
10120      * Returns true if object intersects with another object
10121      * @method intersectsWithObject
10122      * @param {Object} other Object to test
10123      * @return {Boolean}
10124      */
10125     intersectsWithObject: function(other) {
10126       // extracts coords
10127       function getCoords(oCoords) {
10128         return {
10129           tl: new fabric.Point(oCoords.tl.x, oCoords.tl.y),
10130           tr: new fabric.Point(oCoords.tr.x, oCoords.tr.y),
10131           bl: new fabric.Point(oCoords.bl.x, oCoords.bl.y),
10132           br: new fabric.Point(oCoords.br.x, oCoords.br.y)
10133         };
10134       }
10135       var thisCoords = getCoords(this.oCoords),
10136           otherCoords = getCoords(other.oCoords);
10137 
10138       var intersection = fabric.Intersection.intersectPolygonPolygon(
10139         [thisCoords.tl, thisCoords.tr, thisCoords.br, thisCoords.bl],
10140         [otherCoords.tl, otherCoords.tr, otherCoords.br, otherCoords.bl]
10141       );
10142 
10143       return (intersection.status === 'Intersection');
10144     },
10145 
10146     /**
10147      * Returns true if object is fully contained within area of another object
10148      * @method isContainedWithinObject
10149      * @param {Object} other Object to test
10150      * @return {Boolean}
10151      */
10152     isContainedWithinObject: function(other) {
10153       return this.isContainedWithinRect(other.oCoords.tl, other.oCoords.br);
10154     },
10155 
10156     /**
10157      * Returns true if object is fully contained within area formed by 2 points
10158      * @method isContainedWithinRect
10159      * @param {Object} selectionTL
10160      * @param {Object} selectionBR
10161      * @return {Boolean}
10162      */
10163     isContainedWithinRect: function(selectionTL, selectionBR) {
10164       var oCoords = this.oCoords,
10165           tl = new fabric.Point(oCoords.tl.x, oCoords.tl.y),
10166           tr = new fabric.Point(oCoords.tr.x, oCoords.tr.y),
10167           bl = new fabric.Point(oCoords.bl.x, oCoords.bl.y);
10168 
10169       return tl.x > selectionTL.x
10170         && tr.x < selectionBR.x
10171         && tl.y > selectionTL.y
10172         && bl.y < selectionBR.y;
10173     },
10174 
10175     /**
10176      * Returns true if specified type is identical to the type of an instance
10177      * @method isType
10178      * @param type {String} type to check against
10179      * @return {Boolean}
10180      */
10181     isType: function(type) {
10182       return this.type === type;
10183     },
10184 
10185     /**
10186      * Determines which one of the four corners has been clicked
10187      * @method _findTargetCorner
10188      * @private
10189      * @param e {Event} event object
10190      * @param offset {Object} canvas offset
10191      * @return {String|Boolean} corner code (tl, tr, bl, br, etc.), or false if nothing is found
10192      */
10193     _findTargetCorner: function(e, offset) {
10194       if (!this.hasControls || !this.active) return false;
10195 
10196       var pointer = getPointer(e),
10197           ex = pointer.x - offset.left,
10198           ey = pointer.y - offset.top,
10199           xpoints,
10200           lines;
10201 
10202       for (var i in this.oCoords) {
10203 
10204         if (i === 'mtr' && !this.hasRotatingPoint) {
10205           continue;
10206         }
10207 
10208         if (this.get('lockUniScaling') && (i === 'mt' || i === 'mr' || i === 'mb' || i === 'ml')) {
10209           continue;
10210         }
10211 
10212         lines = this._getImageLines(this.oCoords[i].corner, i);
10213 
10214         // debugging
10215 
10216         // canvas.contextTop.fillRect(lines.bottomline.d.x, lines.bottomline.d.y, 2, 2);
10217         // canvas.contextTop.fillRect(lines.bottomline.o.x, lines.bottomline.o.y, 2, 2);
10218 
10219         // canvas.contextTop.fillRect(lines.leftline.d.x, lines.leftline.d.y, 2, 2);
10220         // canvas.contextTop.fillRect(lines.leftline.o.x, lines.leftline.o.y, 2, 2);
10221 
10222         // canvas.contextTop.fillRect(lines.topline.d.x, lines.topline.d.y, 2, 2);
10223         // canvas.contextTop.fillRect(lines.topline.o.x, lines.topline.o.y, 2, 2);
10224 
10225         // canvas.contextTop.fillRect(lines.rightline.d.x, lines.rightline.d.y, 2, 2);
10226         // canvas.contextTop.fillRect(lines.rightline.o.x, lines.rightline.o.y, 2, 2);
10227 
10228         xpoints = this._findCrossPoints(ex, ey, lines);
10229         if (xpoints % 2 === 1 && xpoints !== 0) {
10230           this.__corner = i;
10231           return i;
10232         }
10233       }
10234       return false;
10235     },
10236 
10237     /**
10238      * Helper method to determine how many cross points are between the 4 image edges
10239      * and the horizontal line determined by the position of our mouse when clicked on canvas
10240      * @method _findCrossPoints
10241      * @private
10242      * @param ex {Number} x coordinate of the mouse
10243      * @param ey {Number} y coordinate of the mouse
10244      * @param oCoords {Object} Coordinates of the image being evaluated
10245      */
10246     _findCrossPoints: function(ex, ey, oCoords) {
10247       var b1, b2, a1, a2, xi, yi,
10248           xcount = 0,
10249           iLine;
10250 
10251       for (var lineKey in oCoords) {
10252         iLine = oCoords[lineKey];
10253         // optimisation 1: line below dot. no cross
10254         if ((iLine.o.y < ey) && (iLine.d.y < ey)) {
10255           continue;
10256         }
10257         // optimisation 2: line above dot. no cross
10258         if ((iLine.o.y >= ey) && (iLine.d.y >= ey)) {
10259           continue;
10260         }
10261         // optimisation 3: vertical line case
10262         if ((iLine.o.x === iLine.d.x) && (iLine.o.x >= ex)) {
10263           xi = iLine.o.x;
10264           yi = ey;
10265         }
10266         // calculate the intersection point
10267         else {
10268           b1 = 0;
10269           b2 = (iLine.d.y-iLine.o.y)/(iLine.d.x-iLine.o.x);
10270           a1 = ey-b1*ex;
10271           a2 = iLine.o.y-b2*iLine.o.x;
10272 
10273           xi = - (a1-a2)/(b1-b2);
10274           yi = a1+b1*xi;
10275         }
10276         // dont count xi < ex cases
10277         if (xi >= ex) {
10278           xcount += 1;
10279         }
10280         // optimisation 4: specific for square images
10281         if (xcount === 2) {
10282           break;
10283         }
10284       }
10285       return xcount;
10286     },
10287 
10288     /**
10289      * Method that returns an object with the image lines in it given the coordinates of the corners
10290      * @method _getImageLines
10291      * @private
10292      * @param oCoords {Object} coordinates of the image corners
10293      */
10294     _getImageLines: function(oCoords) {
10295       return {
10296         topline: {
10297           o: oCoords.tl,
10298           d: oCoords.tr
10299         },
10300         rightline: {
10301           o: oCoords.tr,
10302           d: oCoords.br
10303         },
10304         bottomline: {
10305           o: oCoords.br,
10306           d: oCoords.bl
10307         },
10308         leftline: {
10309           o: oCoords.bl,
10310           d: oCoords.tl
10311         }
10312       };
10313     },
10314 
10315     /**
10316      * Sets the coordinates of the draggable boxes in the corners of
10317      * the image used to scale/rotate it.
10318      * @method _setCornerCoords
10319      * @private
10320      */
10321     _setCornerCoords: function() {
10322       var coords = this.oCoords,
10323           theta = degreesToRadians(this.angle),
10324           newTheta = degreesToRadians(45 - this.angle),
10325           cornerHypotenuse = Math.sqrt(2 * Math.pow(this.cornerSize, 2)) / 2,
10326           cosHalfOffset = cornerHypotenuse * Math.cos(newTheta),
10327           sinHalfOffset = cornerHypotenuse * Math.sin(newTheta),
10328           sinTh = Math.sin(theta),
10329           cosTh = Math.cos(theta);
10330 
10331       coords.tl.corner = {
10332         tl: {
10333           x: coords.tl.x - sinHalfOffset,
10334           y: coords.tl.y - cosHalfOffset
10335         },
10336         tr: {
10337           x: coords.tl.x + cosHalfOffset,
10338           y: coords.tl.y - sinHalfOffset
10339         },
10340         bl: {
10341           x: coords.tl.x - cosHalfOffset,
10342           y: coords.tl.y + sinHalfOffset
10343         },
10344         br: {
10345           x: coords.tl.x + sinHalfOffset,
10346           y: coords.tl.y + cosHalfOffset
10347         }
10348       };
10349 
10350       coords.tr.corner = {
10351         tl: {
10352           x: coords.tr.x - sinHalfOffset,
10353           y: coords.tr.y - cosHalfOffset
10354         },
10355         tr: {
10356           x: coords.tr.x + cosHalfOffset,
10357           y: coords.tr.y - sinHalfOffset
10358         },
10359         br: {
10360           x: coords.tr.x + sinHalfOffset,
10361           y: coords.tr.y + cosHalfOffset
10362         },
10363         bl: {
10364           x: coords.tr.x - cosHalfOffset,
10365           y: coords.tr.y + sinHalfOffset
10366         }
10367       };
10368 
10369       coords.bl.corner = {
10370         tl: {
10371           x: coords.bl.x - sinHalfOffset,
10372           y: coords.bl.y - cosHalfOffset
10373         },
10374         bl: {
10375           x: coords.bl.x - cosHalfOffset,
10376           y: coords.bl.y + sinHalfOffset
10377         },
10378         br: {
10379           x: coords.bl.x + sinHalfOffset,
10380           y: coords.bl.y + cosHalfOffset
10381         },
10382         tr: {
10383           x: coords.bl.x + cosHalfOffset,
10384           y: coords.bl.y - sinHalfOffset
10385         }
10386       };
10387 
10388       coords.br.corner = {
10389         tr: {
10390           x: coords.br.x + cosHalfOffset,
10391           y: coords.br.y - sinHalfOffset
10392         },
10393         bl: {
10394           x: coords.br.x - cosHalfOffset,
10395           y: coords.br.y + sinHalfOffset
10396         },
10397         br: {
10398           x: coords.br.x + sinHalfOffset,
10399           y: coords.br.y + cosHalfOffset
10400         },
10401         tl: {
10402           x: coords.br.x - sinHalfOffset,
10403           y: coords.br.y - cosHalfOffset
10404         }
10405       };
10406 
10407       coords.ml.corner = {
10408         tl: {
10409           x: coords.ml.x - sinHalfOffset,
10410           y: coords.ml.y - cosHalfOffset
10411         },
10412         tr: {
10413           x: coords.ml.x + cosHalfOffset,
10414           y: coords.ml.y - sinHalfOffset
10415         },
10416         bl: {
10417           x: coords.ml.x - cosHalfOffset,
10418           y: coords.ml.y + sinHalfOffset
10419         },
10420         br: {
10421           x: coords.ml.x + sinHalfOffset,
10422           y: coords.ml.y + cosHalfOffset
10423         }
10424       };
10425 
10426       coords.mt.corner = {
10427         tl: {
10428           x: coords.mt.x - sinHalfOffset,
10429           y: coords.mt.y - cosHalfOffset
10430         },
10431         tr: {
10432           x: coords.mt.x + cosHalfOffset,
10433           y: coords.mt.y - sinHalfOffset
10434         },
10435         bl: {
10436           x: coords.mt.x - cosHalfOffset,
10437           y: coords.mt.y + sinHalfOffset
10438         },
10439         br: {
10440           x: coords.mt.x + sinHalfOffset,
10441           y: coords.mt.y + cosHalfOffset
10442         }
10443       };
10444 
10445       coords.mr.corner = {
10446         tl: {
10447           x: coords.mr.x - sinHalfOffset,
10448           y: coords.mr.y - cosHalfOffset
10449         },
10450         tr: {
10451           x: coords.mr.x + cosHalfOffset,
10452           y: coords.mr.y - sinHalfOffset
10453         },
10454         bl: {
10455           x: coords.mr.x - cosHalfOffset,
10456           y: coords.mr.y + sinHalfOffset
10457         },
10458         br: {
10459           x: coords.mr.x + sinHalfOffset,
10460           y: coords.mr.y + cosHalfOffset
10461         }
10462       };
10463 
10464       coords.mb.corner = {
10465         tl: {
10466           x: coords.mb.x - sinHalfOffset,
10467           y: coords.mb.y - cosHalfOffset
10468         },
10469         tr: {
10470           x: coords.mb.x + cosHalfOffset,
10471           y: coords.mb.y - sinHalfOffset
10472         },
10473         bl: {
10474           x: coords.mb.x - cosHalfOffset,
10475           y: coords.mb.y + sinHalfOffset
10476         },
10477         br: {
10478           x: coords.mb.x + sinHalfOffset,
10479           y: coords.mb.y + cosHalfOffset
10480         }
10481       };
10482 
10483       coords.mtr.corner = {
10484         tl: {
10485           x: coords.mtr.x - sinHalfOffset + (sinTh * this.rotatingPointOffset),
10486           y: coords.mtr.y - cosHalfOffset - (cosTh * this.rotatingPointOffset)
10487         },
10488         tr: {
10489           x: coords.mtr.x + cosHalfOffset + (sinTh * this.rotatingPointOffset),
10490           y: coords.mtr.y - sinHalfOffset - (cosTh * this.rotatingPointOffset)
10491         },
10492         bl: {
10493           x: coords.mtr.x - cosHalfOffset + (sinTh * this.rotatingPointOffset),
10494           y: coords.mtr.y + sinHalfOffset - (cosTh * this.rotatingPointOffset)
10495         },
10496         br: {
10497           x: coords.mtr.x + sinHalfOffset + (sinTh * this.rotatingPointOffset),
10498           y: coords.mtr.y + cosHalfOffset - (cosTh * this.rotatingPointOffset)
10499         }
10500       };
10501     },
10502 
10503     /**
10504      * Makes object's color grayscale
10505      * @method toGrayscale
10506      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10507      */
10508     toGrayscale: function() {
10509       var fillValue = this.get('fill');
10510       if (fillValue) {
10511         this.set('overlayFill', new fabric.Color(fillValue).toGrayscale().toRgb());
10512       }
10513       return this;
10514     },
10515 
10516     /**
10517      * Returns complexity of an instance
10518      * @method complexity
10519      * @return {Number} complexity
10520      */
10521     complexity: function() {
10522       return 0;
10523     },
10524 
10525     /**
10526      * Returns a JSON representation of an instance
10527      * @method toJSON
10528      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
10529      * @return {String} json
10530      */
10531     toJSON: function(propertiesToInclude) {
10532       // delegate, not alias
10533       return this.toObject(propertiesToInclude);
10534     },
10535 
10536     /**
10537      * Sets gradient fill of an object
10538      * @method setGradientFill
10539      */
10540     setGradientFill: function(options) {
10541       this.set('fill', fabric.Gradient.forObject(this, options));
10542     },
10543 
10544     /**
10545      * Animates object's properties
10546      * @method animate
10547      *
10548      * As object  multiple properties
10549      *
10550      * object.animate({ left: ..., top: ... });
10551      * object.animate({ left: ..., top: ... }, { duration: ... });
10552      *
10553      * As string  one property
10554      *
10555      * object.animate('left', ...);
10556      * object.animate('left', { duration: ... });
10557      *
10558      */
10559     animate: function() {
10560       if (arguments[0] && typeof arguments[0] === 'object') {
10561         for (var prop in arguments[0]) {
10562           this._animate(prop, arguments[0][prop], arguments[1]);
10563         }
10564       }
10565       else {
10566         this._animate.apply(this, arguments);
10567       }
10568       return this;
10569     },
10570 
10571     /**
10572      * @private
10573      * @method _animate
10574      */
10575     _animate: function(property, to, options) {
10576       var obj = this;
10577 
10578       to = to.toString();
10579       options || (options = { });
10580 
10581       if (!('from' in options)) {
10582         options.from = this.get(property);
10583       }
10584 
10585       if (~to.indexOf('=')) {
10586         to = this.get(property) + parseFloat(to.replace('=', ''));
10587       }
10588       else {
10589         to = parseFloat(to);
10590       }
10591 
10592       fabric.util.animate({
10593         startValue: options.from,
10594         endValue: to,
10595         byValue: options.by,
10596         easing: options.easing,
10597         duration: options.duration,
10598         onChange: function(value) {
10599           obj.set(property, value);
10600           options.onChange && options.onChange();
10601         },
10602         onComplete: function() {
10603           obj.setCoords();
10604           options.onComplete && options.onComplete();
10605         }
10606       });
10607     },
10608 
10609     /**
10610      * Centers object horizontally on canvas to which it was added last
10611      * @method centerH
10612      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10613      */
10614     centerH: function () {
10615       this.canvas.centerObjectH(this);
10616       return this;
10617     },
10618 
10619     /**
10620      * Centers object vertically on canvas to which it was added last
10621      * @method centerV
10622      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10623      * @chainable
10624      */
10625     centerV: function () {
10626       this.canvas.centerObjectV(this);
10627       return this;
10628     },
10629 
10630     /**
10631      * Centers object vertically and horizontally on canvas to which is was added last
10632      * @method center
10633      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10634      * @chainable
10635      */
10636     center: function () {
10637       return this.centerH().centerV();
10638     },
10639 
10640     /**
10641      * Removes object from canvas to which it was added last
10642      * @method remove
10643      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10644      * @chainable
10645      */
10646     remove: function() {
10647       return this.canvas.remove(this);
10648     },
10649 
10650     /**
10651      * Moves an object to the bottom of the stack of drawn objects
10652      * @method sendToBack
10653      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10654      * @chainable
10655      */
10656     sendToBack: function() {
10657       this.canvas.sendToBack(this);
10658       return this;
10659     },
10660 
10661     /**
10662      * Moves an object to the top of the stack of drawn objects
10663      * @method bringToFront
10664      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10665      * @chainable
10666      */
10667     bringToFront: function() {
10668       this.canvas.bringToFront(this);
10669       return this;
10670     },
10671 
10672     /**
10673      * Moves an object one level down in stack of drawn objects
10674      * @method sendBackwards
10675      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10676      * @chainable
10677      */
10678     sendBackwards: function() {
10679       this.canvas.sendBackwards(this);
10680       return this;
10681     },
10682 
10683     /**
10684      * Moves an object one level up in stack of drawn objects
10685      * @method bringForward
10686      * @return {fabric.Object} thisArg
10687      * @chainable
10688      */
10689     bringForward: function() {
10690       this.canvas.bringForward(this);
10691       return this;
10692     }
10693   });
10694 
10695   var proto = fabric.Object.prototype;
10696   for (var i = proto.stateProperties.length; i--; ) {
10697 
10698     var propName = proto.stateProperties[i],
10699         capitalizedPropName = propName.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + propName.slice(1),
10700         setterName = 'set' + capitalizedPropName,
10701         getterName = 'get' + capitalizedPropName;
10702 
10703     // using `new Function` for better introspection
10704     if (!proto[getterName]) {
10705       proto[getterName] = (function(property) {
10706         return new Function('return this.get("' + property + '")');
10707       })(propName);
10708     }
10709     if (!proto[setterName]) {
10710       proto[setterName] = (function(property) {
10711         return new Function('value', 'return this.set("' + property + '", value)');
10712       })(propName);
10713     }
10714   }
10715 
10716   /**
10717    * Alias for {@link fabric.Object.prototype.setAngle}
10718    * @alias rotate -> setAngle
10719    */
10720   fabric.Object.prototype.rotate = fabric.Object.prototype.setAngle;
10721 
10722   extend(fabric.Object.prototype, fabric.Observable);
10723 
10724   extend(fabric.Object, {
10725 
10726     /**
10727      * @static
10728      * @constant
10729      * @type Number
10730      */
10731     NUM_FRACTION_DIGITS:        2
10732   });
10733 
10734 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
10735 
10736 (function(global) {
10737 
10738   "use strict";
10739 
10740   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { }),
10741       extend = fabric.util.object.extend,
10742       coordProps = { 'x1': 1, 'x2': 1, 'y1': 1, 'y2': 1 };
10743 
10744   if (fabric.Line) {
10745     fabric.warn('fabric.Line is already defined');
10746     return;
10747   }
10748 
10749   /**
10750    * Line class
10751    * @class Line
10752    * @extends fabric.Object
10753    */
10754   fabric.Line = fabric.util.createClass(fabric.Object, /** @scope fabric.Line.prototype */ {
10755 
10756     /**
10757      * Type of an object
10758      * @property
10759      * @type String
10760      */
10761     type: 'line',
10762 
10763     /**
10764      * Constructor
10765      * @method initialize
10766      * @param {Array} [points] Array of points
10767      * @param {Object} [options] Options object
10768      * @return {fabric.Line} thisArg
10769      */
10770     initialize: function(points, options) {
10771       options = options || { };
10772 
10773       if (!points) {
10774         points = [0, 0, 0, 0];
10775       }
10776 
10777       this.callSuper('initialize', options);
10778 
10779       this.set('x1', points[0]);
10780       this.set('y1', points[1]);
10781       this.set('x2', points[2]);
10782       this.set('y2', points[3]);
10783 
10784       this._setWidthHeight(options);
10785     },
10786 
10787     /**
10788      * @private
10789      * @method _setWidthHeight
10790      * @param {Object} [options] Options
10791      */
10792     _setWidthHeight: function(options) {
10793       options || (options = { });
10794 
10795       this.set('width', (this.x2 - this.x1) || 1);
10796       this.set('height', (this.y2 - this.y1) || 1);
10797 
10798       this.set('left', 'left' in options ? options.left : (this.x1 + this.width / 2));
10799       this.set('top', 'top' in options ? options.top : (this.y1 + this.height / 2));
10800     },
10801 
10802     /**
10803      * @private
10804      * @method _set
10805      * @param {String} key
10806      * @param {Any} value
10807      */
10808     _set: function(key, value) {
10809       this[key] = value;
10810       if (key in coordProps) {
10811         this._setWidthHeight();
10812       }
10813       return this;
10814     },
10815 
10816     /**
10817      * @private
10818      * @method _render
10819      * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D} ctx Context to render on
10820      */
10821     _render: function(ctx) {
10822       ctx.beginPath();
10823 
10824       if (this.group) {
10825         ctx.translate(-this.group.width/2 + this.left, -this.group.height / 2 + this.top);
10826       }
10827 
10828       // move from center (of virtual box) to its left/top corner
10829       ctx.moveTo(this.width === 1 ? 0 : (-this.width / 2), this.height === 1 ? 0 : (-this.height / 2));
10830       ctx.lineTo(this.width === 1 ? 0 : (this.width / 2), this.height === 1 ? 0 : (this.height / 2));
10831 
10832       ctx.lineWidth = this.strokeWidth;
10833 
10834       // TODO: test this
10835       // make sure setting "fill" changes color of a line
10836       // (by copying fillStyle to strokeStyle, since line is stroked, not filled)
10837       var origStrokeStyle = ctx.strokeStyle;
10838       ctx.strokeStyle = ctx.fillStyle;
10839       ctx.stroke();
10840       ctx.strokeStyle = origStrokeStyle;
10841     },
10842 
10843     /**
10844      * Returns complexity of an instance
10845      * @method complexity
10846      * @return {Number} complexity
10847      */
10848     complexity: function() {
10849       return 1;
10850     },
10851 
10852     /**
10853      * Returns object representation of an instance
10854      * @methd toObject
10855      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
10856      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
10857      */
10858     toObject: function(propertiesToInclude) {
10859       return extend(this.callSuper('toObject', propertiesToInclude), {
10860         x1: this.get('x1'),
10861         y1: this.get('y1'),
10862         x2: this.get('x2'),
10863         y2: this.get('y2')
10864       });
10865     },
10866 
10867     /**
10868      * Returns SVG representation of an instance
10869      * @method toSVG
10870      * @return {String} svg representation of an instance
10871      */
10872     toSVG: function() {
10873       return [
10874         '<line ',
10875           'x1="', this.get('x1'), '" ',
10876           'y1="', this.get('y1'), '" ',
10877           'x2="', this.get('x2'), '" ',
10878           'y2="', this.get('y2'), '" ',
10879           'style="', this.getSvgStyles(), '" ',
10880         '/>'
10881       ].join('');
10882     }
10883   });
10884 
10885   /**
10886    * List of attribute names to account for when parsing SVG element (used by {@link fabric.Line.fromElement})
10887    * @static
10888    * @see http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/shapes.html#LineElement
10889    */
10890   fabric.Line.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES = 'x1 y1 x2 y2 stroke stroke-width transform'.split(' ');
10891 
10892   /**
10893    * Returns fabric.Line instance from an SVG element
10894    * @static
10895    * @method fabric.Line.fromElement
10896    * @param {SVGElement} element Element to parse
10897    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
10898    * @return {fabric.Line} instance of fabric.Line
10899    */
10900   fabric.Line.fromElement = function(element, options) {
10901     var parsedAttributes = fabric.parseAttributes(element, fabric.Line.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES);
10902     var points = [
10903       parsedAttributes.x1 || 0,
10904       parsedAttributes.y1 || 0,
10905       parsedAttributes.x2 || 0,
10906       parsedAttributes.y2 || 0
10907     ];
10908     return new fabric.Line(points, extend(parsedAttributes, options));
10909   };
10910 
10911   /**
10912    * Returns fabric.Line instance from an object representation
10913    * @static
10914    * @method fabric.Line.fromObject
10915    * @param {Object} object Object to create an instance from
10916    * @return {fabric.Line} instance of fabric.Line
10917    */
10918   fabric.Line.fromObject = function(object) {
10919     var points = [object.x1, object.y1, object.x2, object.y2];
10920     return new fabric.Line(points, object);
10921   };
10922 
10923 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
10924 (function(global) {
10925 
10926   "use strict";
10927 
10928   var fabric  = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { }),
10929       piBy2   = Math.PI * 2,
10930       extend = fabric.util.object.extend;
10931 
10932   if (fabric.Circle) {
10933     fabric.warn('fabric.Circle is already defined.');
10934     return;
10935   }
10936 
10937   /**
10938    * Circle class
10939    * @class Circle
10940    * @extends fabric.Object
10941    */
10942   fabric.Circle = fabric.util.createClass(fabric.Object, /** @scope fabric.Circle.prototype */ {
10943 
10944     /**
10945      * Type of an object
10946      * @property
10947      * @type String
10948      */
10949     type: 'circle',
10950 
10951     /**
10952      * Constructor
10953      * @method initialize
10954      * @param {Object} [options] Options object
10955      * @return {fabric.Circle} thisArg
10956      */
10957     initialize: function(options) {
10958       options = options || { };
10959 
10960       this.set('radius', options.radius || 0);
10961       this.callSuper('initialize', options);
10962 
10963       var diameter = this.get('radius') * 2;
10964       this.set('width', diameter).set('height', diameter);
10965     },
10966 
10967     /**
10968      * Returns object representation of an instance
10969      * @method toObject
10970      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
10971      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
10972      */
10973     toObject: function(propertiesToInclude) {
10974       return extend(this.callSuper('toObject', propertiesToInclude), {
10975         radius: this.get('radius')
10976       });
10977     },
10978 
10979     /**
10980      * Returns svg representation of an instance
10981      * @method toSVG
10982      * @return {String} svg representation of an instance
10983      */
10984     toSVG: function() {
10985       return ('<circle ' +
10986         'cx="0" cy="0" ' +
10987         'r="' + this.radius + '" ' +
10988         'style="' + this.getSvgStyles() + '" ' +
10989         'transform="' + this.getSvgTransform() + '" ' +
10990         '/>');
10991     },
10992 
10993     /**
10994      * @private
10995      * @method _render
10996      * @param ctx {CanvasRenderingContext2D} context to render on
10997      */
10998     _render: function(ctx, noTransform) {
10999       ctx.beginPath();
11000       // multiply by currently set alpha (the one that was set by path group where this object is contained, for example)
11001       ctx.globalAlpha = this.group ? (ctx.globalAlpha * this.opacity) : this.opacity;
11002       ctx.arc(noTransform ? this.left : 0, noTransform ? this.top : 0, this.radius, 0, piBy2, false);
11003       ctx.closePath();
11004       if (this.fill) {
11005         ctx.fill();
11006       }
11007       if (this.stroke) {
11008         ctx.stroke();
11009       }
11010     },
11011 
11012     /**
11013      * Returns horizontal radius of an object (according to how an object is scaled)
11014      * @method getRadiusX
11015      * @return {Number}
11016      */
11017     getRadiusX: function() {
11018       return this.get('radius') * this.get('scaleX');
11019     },
11020 
11021     /**
11022      * Returns vertical radius of an object (according to how an object is scaled)
11023      * @method getRadiusY
11024      * @return {Number}
11025      */
11026     getRadiusY: function() {
11027       return this.get('radius') * this.get('scaleY');
11028     },
11029 
11030     /**
11031      * Sets radius of an object (and updates width accordingly)
11032      * @method setRadius
11033      * @return {Number}
11034      */
11035     setRadius: function(value) {
11036       this.radius = value;
11037       this.set('width', value * 2).set('height', value * 2);
11038     },
11039 
11040     /**
11041      * Returns complexity of an instance
11042      * @method complexity
11043      * @return {Number} complexity of this instance
11044      */
11045     complexity: function() {
11046       return 1;
11047     }
11048   });
11049 
11050   /**
11051    * List of attribute names to account for when parsing SVG element (used by {@link fabric.Circle.fromElement})
11052    * @static
11053    * @see: http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/shapes.html#CircleElement
11054    */
11055   fabric.Circle.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES = 'cx cy r fill fill-opacity opacity stroke stroke-width transform'.split(' ');
11056 
11057   /**
11058    * Returns {@link fabric.Circle} instance from an SVG element
11059    * @static
11060    * @method fabric.Circle.fromElement
11061    * @param {SVGElement} element Element to parse
11062    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
11063    * @throws {Error} If value of `r` attribute is missing or invalid
11064    * @return {Object} Instance of fabric.Circle
11065    */
11066   fabric.Circle.fromElement = function(element, options) {
11067     options || (options = { });
11068     var parsedAttributes = fabric.parseAttributes(element, fabric.Circle.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES);
11069     if (!isValidRadius(parsedAttributes)) {
11070       throw new Error('value of `r` attribute is required and can not be negative');
11071     }
11072     if ('left' in parsedAttributes) {
11073       parsedAttributes.left -= (options.width / 2) || 0;
11074     }
11075     if ('top' in parsedAttributes) {
11076       parsedAttributes.top -= (options.height / 2) || 0;
11077     }
11078     var obj = new fabric.Circle(extend(parsedAttributes, options));
11079 
11080     obj.cx = parseFloat(element.getAttribute('cx')) || 0;
11081     obj.cy = parseFloat(element.getAttribute('cy')) || 0;
11082 
11083     return obj;
11084   };
11085 
11086   /**
11087    * @private
11088    */
11089   function isValidRadius(attributes) {
11090     return (('radius' in attributes) && (attributes.radius > 0));
11091   }
11092 
11093   /**
11094    * Returns {@link fabric.Circle} instance from an object representation
11095    * @static
11096    * @method fabric.Circle.fromObject
11097    * @param {Object} object Object to create an instance from
11098    * @return {Object} Instance of fabric.Circle
11099    */
11100   fabric.Circle.fromObject = function(object) {
11101     return new fabric.Circle(object);
11102   };
11103 
11104 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
11105 (function(global) {
11106 
11107   "use strict";
11108 
11109   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { });
11110 
11111   if (fabric.Triangle) {
11112     fabric.warn('fabric.Triangle is already defined');
11113     return;
11114   }
11115 
11116   /**
11117    * Triangle class
11118    * @class Triangle
11119    * @extends fabric.Object
11120    */
11121   fabric.Triangle = fabric.util.createClass(fabric.Object, /** @scope fabric.Triangle.prototype */ {
11122 
11123     /**
11124      * Type of an object
11125      * @property
11126      * @type String
11127      */
11128     type: 'triangle',
11129 
11130     /**
11131      * Constructor
11132      * @method initialize
11133      * @param {Object} [options] Options object
11134      * @return {Object} thisArg
11135      */
11136     initialize: function(options) {
11137       options = options || { };
11138 
11139       this.callSuper('initialize', options);
11140 
11141       this.set('width', options.width || 100)
11142           .set('height', options.height || 100);
11143     },
11144 
11145     /**
11146      * @private
11147      * @method _render
11148      * @param ctx {CanvasRenderingContext2D} Context to render on
11149      */
11150     _render: function(ctx) {
11151       var widthBy2 = this.width / 2,
11152           heightBy2 = this.height / 2;
11153 
11154       ctx.beginPath();
11155       ctx.moveTo(-widthBy2, heightBy2);
11156       ctx.lineTo(0, -heightBy2);
11157       ctx.lineTo(widthBy2, heightBy2);
11158       ctx.closePath();
11159 
11160       if (this.fill) {
11161         ctx.fill();
11162       }
11163       if (this.stroke) {
11164         ctx.stroke();
11165       }
11166     },
11167 
11168     /**
11169      * Returns complexity of an instance
11170      * @method complexity
11171      * @return {Number} complexity of this instance
11172      */
11173     complexity: function() {
11174       return 1;
11175     },
11176 
11177     /**
11178      * Returns SVG representation of an instance
11179      * @method toSVG
11180      * @return {String} svg representation of an instance
11181      */
11182     toSVG: function() {
11183 
11184       var widthBy2 = this.width / 2,
11185           heightBy2 = this.height / 2;
11186 
11187       var points = [
11188         -widthBy2 + " " + heightBy2,
11189         "0 " + -heightBy2,
11190         widthBy2 + " " + heightBy2
11191       ].join(",");
11192 
11193       return '<polygon ' +
11194               'points="' + points + '" ' +
11195               'style="' + this.getSvgStyles() + '" ' +
11196               'transform="' + this.getSvgTransform() + '" ' +
11197               '/>';
11198     }
11199   });
11200 
11201   /**
11202    * Returns fabric.Triangle instance from an object representation
11203    * @static
11204    * @method Canvas.Trangle.fromObject
11205    * @param object {Object} object to create an instance from
11206    * @return {Object} instance of Canvas.Triangle
11207    */
11208   fabric.Triangle.fromObject = function(object) {
11209     return new fabric.Triangle(object);
11210   };
11211 
11212 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
11213 (function(global){
11214 
11215   "use strict";
11216 
11217   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { }),
11218       piBy2   = Math.PI * 2,
11219       extend = fabric.util.object.extend;
11220 
11221   if (fabric.Ellipse) {
11222     fabric.warn('fabric.Ellipse is already defined.');
11223     return;
11224   }
11225 
11226   /**
11227    * Ellipse class
11228    * @class Ellipse
11229    * @extends fabric.Object
11230    */
11231   fabric.Ellipse = fabric.util.createClass(fabric.Object, /** @scope fabric.Ellipse.prototype */ {
11232 
11233     /**
11234      * Type of an object
11235      * @property
11236      * @type String
11237      */
11238     type: 'ellipse',
11239 
11240     /**
11241      * Constructor
11242      * @method initialize
11243      * @param {Object} [options] Options object
11244      * @return {fabric.Ellipse} thisArg
11245      */
11246     initialize: function(options) {
11247       options = options || { };
11248 
11249       this.callSuper('initialize', options);
11250 
11251       this.set('rx', options.rx || 0);
11252       this.set('ry', options.ry || 0);
11253 
11254       this.set('width', this.get('rx') * 2);
11255       this.set('height', this.get('ry') * 2);
11256     },
11257 
11258     /**
11259      * Returns object representation of an instance
11260      * @method toObject
11261      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
11262      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
11263      */
11264     toObject: function(propertiesToInclude) {
11265       return extend(this.callSuper('toObject', propertiesToInclude), {
11266         rx: this.get('rx'),
11267         ry: this.get('ry')
11268       });
11269     },
11270 
11271     /**
11272      * Returns svg representation of an instance
11273      * @method toSVG
11274      * @return {String} svg representation of an instance
11275      */
11276     toSVG: function() {
11277       return [
11278         '<ellipse ',
11279           'rx="', this.get('rx'), '" ',
11280           'ry="', this.get('ry'), '" ',
11281           'style="', this.getSvgStyles(), '" ',
11282           'transform="', this.getSvgTransform(), '" ',
11283         '/>'
11284       ].join('');
11285     },
11286 
11287     /**
11288      * Renders this instance on a given context
11289      * @method render
11290      * @param ctx {CanvasRenderingContext2D} context to render on
11291      * @param noTransform {Boolean} context is not transformed when set to true
11292      */
11293     render: function(ctx, noTransform) {
11294       // do not use `get` for perf. reasons
11295       if (this.rx === 0 || this.ry === 0) return;
11296       return this.callSuper('render', ctx, noTransform);
11297     },
11298 
11299     /**
11300      * @private
11301      * @method _render
11302      * @param ctx {CanvasRenderingContext2D} context to render on
11303      */
11304     _render: function(ctx, noTransform) {
11305       ctx.beginPath();
11306       ctx.save();
11307       ctx.globalAlpha = this.group ? (ctx.globalAlpha * this.opacity) : this.opacity;
11308       if (this.transformMatrix && this.group) {
11309         ctx.translate(this.cx, this.cy);
11310       }
11311       ctx.transform(1, 0, 0, this.ry/this.rx, 0, 0);
11312       ctx.arc(noTransform ? this.left : 0, noTransform ? this.top : 0, this.rx, 0, piBy2, false);
11313       if (this.stroke) {
11314         ctx.stroke();
11315       }
11316       if (this.fill) {
11317         ctx.fill();
11318       }
11319       ctx.restore();
11320     },
11321 
11322     /**
11323      * Returns complexity of an instance
11324      * @method complexity
11325      * @return {Number} complexity
11326      */
11327     complexity: function() {
11328       return 1;
11329     }
11330   });
11331 
11332   /**
11333    * List of attribute names to account for when parsing SVG element (used by {@link fabric.Ellipse.fromElement})
11334    * @static
11335    * @see http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/shapes.html#EllipseElement
11336    */
11337   fabric.Ellipse.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES = 'cx cy rx ry fill fill-opacity opacity stroke stroke-width transform'.split(' ');
11338 
11339   /**
11340    * Returns {@link fabric.Ellipse} instance from an SVG element
11341    * @static
11342    * @method fabric.Ellipse.fromElement
11343    * @param {SVGElement} element Element to parse
11344    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
11345    * @return {fabric.Ellipse}
11346    */
11347   fabric.Ellipse.fromElement = function(element, options) {
11348     options || (options = { });
11349 
11350     var parsedAttributes = fabric.parseAttributes(element, fabric.Ellipse.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES);
11351     var cx = parsedAttributes.left;
11352     var cy = parsedAttributes.top;
11353 
11354     if ('left' in parsedAttributes) {
11355       parsedAttributes.left -= (options.width / 2) || 0;
11356     }
11357     if ('top' in parsedAttributes) {
11358       parsedAttributes.top -= (options.height / 2) || 0;
11359     }
11360 
11361     var ellipse = new fabric.Ellipse(extend(parsedAttributes, options));
11362 
11363     ellipse.cx = cx || 0;
11364     ellipse.cy = cy || 0;
11365 
11366     return ellipse;
11367   };
11368 
11369   /**
11370    * Returns {@link fabric.Ellipse} instance from an object representation
11371    * @static
11372    * @method fabric.Ellipse.fromObject
11373    * @param {Object} object Object to create an instance from
11374    * @return {fabric.Ellipse}
11375    */
11376   fabric.Ellipse.fromObject = function(object) {
11377     return new fabric.Ellipse(object);
11378   };
11379 
11380 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
11381 (function(global) {
11382 
11383   "use strict";
11384 
11385   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { }),
11386       extend = fabric.util.object.extend;
11387 
11388   if (fabric.Rect) {
11389     console.warn('fabric.Rect is already defined');
11390     return;
11391   }
11392 
11393   /**
11394    * Rectangle class
11395    * @class Rect
11396    * @extends fabric.Object
11397    */
11398   fabric.Rect = fabric.util.createClass(fabric.Object, /** @scope fabric.Rect.prototype */ {
11399 
11400     /**
11401      * Type of an object
11402      * @property
11403      * @type String
11404      */
11405     type: 'rect',
11406 
11407     /**
11408      * Horizontal border radius
11409      * @property
11410      * @type Number
11411      */
11412     rx: 0,
11413 
11414     /**
11415      * Vertical border radius
11416      * @property
11417      * @type Number
11418      */
11419     ry: 0,
11420 
11421     /**
11422      * Constructor
11423      * @method initialize
11424      * @param {Object} [options] Options object
11425      * @return {Object} thisArg
11426      */
11427     initialize: function(options) {
11428       options = options || { };
11429 
11430       this._initStateProperties();
11431       this.callSuper('initialize', options);
11432       this._initRxRy();
11433 
11434       this.x = 0;
11435       this.y = 0;
11436     },
11437 
11438     /**
11439      * Creates `stateProperties` list on an instance, and adds `fabric.Rect` -specific ones to it
11440      * (such as "rx", "ry", etc.)
11441      * @private
11442      * @method _initStateProperties
11443      */
11444     _initStateProperties: function() {
11445       this.stateProperties = this.stateProperties.concat(['rx', 'ry']);
11446     },
11447 
11448     /**
11449      * Initializes rx/ry attributes
11450      * @private
11451      * @method _initRxRy
11452      */
11453     _initRxRy: function() {
11454       if (this.rx && !this.ry) {
11455         this.ry = this.rx;
11456       }
11457       else if (this.ry && !this.rx) {
11458         this.rx = this.ry;
11459       }
11460     },
11461 
11462     /**
11463      * @private
11464      * @method _render
11465      * @param ctx {CanvasRenderingContext2D} context to render on
11466      */
11467     _render: function(ctx) {
11468       var rx = this.rx || 0,
11469           ry = this.ry || 0,
11470           x = -this.width / 2,
11471           y = -this.height / 2,
11472           w = this.width,
11473           h = this.height;
11474 
11475       ctx.beginPath();
11476       ctx.globalAlpha = this.group ? (ctx.globalAlpha * this.opacity) : this.opacity;
11477 
11478       if (this.transformMatrix && this.group) {
11479         ctx.translate(
11480           this.width / 2 + this.x,
11481           this.height / 2 + this.y);
11482       }
11483       if (!this.transformMatrix && this.group) {
11484         ctx.translate(
11485           -this.group.width / 2 + this.width / 2 + this.x,
11486           -this.group.height / 2 + this.height / 2 + this.y);
11487       }
11488 
11489       ctx.moveTo(x+rx, y);
11490       ctx.lineTo(x+w-rx, y);
11491       ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x+w, y, x+w, y+ry, x+w, y+ry);
11492       ctx.lineTo(x+w, y+h-ry);
11493       ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x+w,y+h,x+w-rx,y+h,x+w-rx,y+h);
11494       ctx.lineTo(x+rx,y+h);
11495       ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x,y+h,x,y+h-ry,x,y+h-ry);
11496       ctx.lineTo(x,y+ry);
11497       ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x,y,x+rx,y,x+rx,y);
11498       ctx.closePath();
11499 
11500       if (this.fill) {
11501         ctx.fill();
11502       }
11503 
11504       if (this.strokeDashArray) {
11505         this._renderDashedStroke(ctx);
11506       }
11507       else if (this.stroke) {
11508         ctx.stroke();
11509       }
11510     },
11511 
11512     /**
11513      * @method _normalizeLeftTopProperties
11514      * @private
11515      * Since coordinate system differs from that of SVG
11516      */
11517     _normalizeLeftTopProperties: function(parsedAttributes) {
11518       if (parsedAttributes.left) {
11519         this.set('left', parsedAttributes.left + this.getWidth() / 2);
11520       }
11521       this.set('x', parsedAttributes.left || 0);
11522       if (parsedAttributes.top) {
11523         this.set('top', parsedAttributes.top + this.getHeight() / 2);
11524       }
11525       this.set('y', parsedAttributes.top || 0);
11526       return this;
11527     },
11528 
11529     /**
11530      * Returns complexity of an instance
11531      * @method complexity
11532      * @return {Number} complexity
11533      */
11534     complexity: function() {
11535       return 1;
11536     },
11537 
11538     /**
11539      * Returns object representation of an instance
11540      * @method toObject
11541      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
11542      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
11543      */
11544     toObject: function(propertiesToInclude) {
11545       return extend(this.callSuper('toObject', propertiesToInclude), {
11546         rx: this.get('rx') || 0,
11547         ry: this.get('ry') || 0
11548       });
11549     },
11550 
11551     /**
11552      * Returns svg representation of an instance
11553      * @method toSVG
11554      * @return {String} svg representation of an instance
11555      */
11556     toSVG: function() {
11557       return '<rect ' +
11558               'x="' + (-1 * this.width / 2) + '" y="' + (-1 * this.height / 2) + '" ' +
11559               'rx="' + this.get('rx') + '" ry="' + this.get('ry') + '" ' +
11560               'width="' + this.width + '" height="' + this.height + '" ' +
11561               'style="' + this.getSvgStyles() + '" ' +
11562               'transform="' + this.getSvgTransform() + '" ' +
11563               '/>';
11564     }
11565   });
11566 
11567   /**
11568    * List of attribute names to account for when parsing SVG element (used by `fabric.Rect.fromElement`)
11569    * @static
11570    */
11571   fabric.Rect.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES = 'x y width height rx ry fill fill-opacity opacity stroke stroke-width transform'.split(' ');
11572 
11573   /**
11574    * @private
11575    */
11576   function _setDefaultLeftTopValues(attributes) {
11577     attributes.left = attributes.left || 0;
11578     attributes.top  = attributes.top  || 0;
11579     return attributes;
11580   }
11581 
11582   /**
11583    * Returns {@link fabric.Rect} instance from an SVG element
11584    * @static
11585    * @method fabric.Rect.fromElement
11586    * @param {SVGElement} element Element to parse
11587    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
11588    * @return {fabric.Rect} Instance of fabric.Rect
11589    */
11590   fabric.Rect.fromElement = function(element, options) {
11591     if (!element) {
11592       return null;
11593     }
11594 
11595     var parsedAttributes = fabric.parseAttributes(element, fabric.Rect.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES);
11596     parsedAttributes = _setDefaultLeftTopValues(parsedAttributes);
11597 
11598     var rect = new fabric.Rect(extend((options ? fabric.util.object.clone(options) : { }), parsedAttributes));
11599     rect._normalizeLeftTopProperties(parsedAttributes);
11600 
11601     return rect;
11602   };
11603 
11604   /**
11605    * Returns {@link fabric.Rect} instance from an object representation
11606    * @static
11607    * @method fabric.Rect.fromObject
11608    * @param object {Object} object to create an instance from
11609    * @return {Object} instance of fabric.Rect
11610    */
11611   fabric.Rect.fromObject = function(object) {
11612     return new fabric.Rect(object);
11613   };
11614 
11615 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
11616 (function(global) {
11617 
11618   "use strict";
11619 
11620   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { }),
11621       toFixed = fabric.util.toFixed;
11622 
11623   if (fabric.Polyline) {
11624     fabric.warn('fabric.Polyline is already defined');
11625     return;
11626   }
11627 
11628   /**
11629    * Polyline class
11630    * @class Polyline
11631    * @extends fabric.Object
11632    */
11633   fabric.Polyline = fabric.util.createClass(fabric.Object, /** @scope fabric.Polyline.prototype */ {
11634 
11635     /**
11636      * Type of an object
11637      * @property
11638      * @type String
11639      */
11640     type: 'polyline',
11641 
11642     /**
11643      * Constructor
11644      * @method initialize
11645      * @param {Array} points array of points
11646      * @param {Object} [options] Options object
11647      * @return {Object} thisArg
11648      */
11649     initialize: function(points, options) {
11650       options = options || { };
11651       this.set('points', points);
11652       this.callSuper('initialize', options);
11653       this._calcDimensions();
11654     },
11655 
11656     /**
11657      * @private
11658      * @method _calcDimensions
11659      */
11660     _calcDimensions: function() {
11661       return fabric.Polygon.prototype._calcDimensions.call(this);
11662     },
11663 
11664     /**
11665      * Returns object representation of an instance
11666      * @method toObject
11667      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
11668      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
11669      */
11670     toObject: function(propertiesToInclude) {
11671       return fabric.Polygon.prototype.toObject.call(this, propertiesToInclude);
11672     },
11673 
11674     /**
11675      * Returns SVG representation of an instance
11676      * @method toSVG
11677      * @return {String} svg representation of an instance
11678      */
11679     toSVG: function() {
11680       var points = [];
11681       for (var i = 0, len = this.points.length; i < len; i++) {
11682         points.push(toFixed(this.points[i].x, 2), ',', toFixed(this.points[i].y, 2), ' ');
11683       }
11684 
11685       return [
11686         '<polyline ',
11687           'points="', points.join(''), '" ',
11688           'style="', this.getSvgStyles(), '" ',
11689           'transform="', this.getSvgTransform(), '" ',
11690         '/>'
11691       ].join('');
11692     },
11693 
11694     /**
11695      * @private
11696      * @method _render
11697      * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D} ctx Context to render on
11698      */
11699     _render: function(ctx) {
11700       var point;
11701       ctx.beginPath();
11702       ctx.moveTo(this.points[0].x, this.points[0].y);
11703       for (var i = 0, len = this.points.length; i < len; i++) {
11704         point = this.points[i];
11705         ctx.lineTo(point.x, point.y);
11706       }
11707       if (this.fill) {
11708         ctx.fill();
11709       }
11710       if (this.stroke) {
11711         ctx.stroke();
11712       }
11713     },
11714 
11715     /**
11716      * Returns complexity of an instance
11717      * @method complexity
11718      * @return {Number} complexity
11719      */
11720     complexity: function() {
11721       return this.get('points').length;
11722     }
11723   });
11724 
11725   /**
11726    * List of attribute names to account for when parsing SVG element (used by {@link fabric.Polyline.fromElement})
11727    * @static
11728    * @see: http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/shapes.html#PolylineElement
11729    */
11730   fabric.Polyline.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES = 'fill fill-opacity opacity stroke stroke-width transform'.split(' ');
11731 
11732   /**
11733    * Returns fabric.Polyline instance from an SVG element
11734    * @static
11735    * @method fabric.Polyline.fromElement
11736    * @param {SVGElement} element Element to parse
11737    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
11738    * @return {Object} instance of fabric.Polyline
11739    */
11740   fabric.Polyline.fromElement = function(element, options) {
11741     if (!element) {
11742       return null;
11743     }
11744     options || (options = { });
11745 
11746     var points = fabric.parsePointsAttribute(element.getAttribute('points')),
11747         parsedAttributes = fabric.parseAttributes(element, fabric.Polyline.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES);
11748 
11749     for (var i = 0, len = points.length; i < len; i++) {
11750       // normalize coordinates, according to containing box (dimensions of which are passed via `options`)
11751       points[i].x -= (options.width / 2) || 0;
11752       points[i].y -= (options.height / 2) || 0;
11753     }
11754 
11755     return new fabric.Polyline(points, fabric.util.object.extend(parsedAttributes, options));
11756   };
11757 
11758   /**
11759    * Returns fabric.Polyline instance from an object representation
11760    * @static
11761    * @method fabric.Polyline.fromObject
11762    * @param {Object} [object] Object to create an instance from
11763    * @return {fabric.Polyline}
11764    */
11765   fabric.Polyline.fromObject = function(object) {
11766     var points = object.points;
11767     return new fabric.Polyline(points, object);
11768   };
11769 
11770 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
11771 (function(global) {
11772 
11773   "use strict";
11774 
11775   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { }),
11776       extend = fabric.util.object.extend,
11777       min = fabric.util.array.min,
11778       max = fabric.util.array.max,
11779       toFixed = fabric.util.toFixed;
11780 
11781   if (fabric.Polygon) {
11782     fabric.warn('fabric.Polygon is already defined');
11783     return;
11784   }
11785 
11786   /**
11787    * Polygon class
11788    * @class Polygon
11789    * @extends fabric.Object
11790    */
11791   fabric.Polygon = fabric.util.createClass(fabric.Object, /** @scope fabric.Polygon.prototype */ {
11792 
11793     /**
11794      * Type of an object
11795      * @property
11796      * @type String
11797      */
11798     type: 'polygon',
11799 
11800     /**
11801      * Constructor
11802      * @method initialize
11803      * @param {Array} points Array of points
11804      * @param {Object} [options] Options object
11805      * @return {fabric.Polygon} thisArg
11806      */
11807     initialize: function(points, options) {
11808       options = options || { };
11809       this.points = points;
11810       this.callSuper('initialize', options);
11811       this._calcDimensions();
11812     },
11813 
11814     /**
11815      * @private
11816      * @method _calcDimensions
11817      */
11818     _calcDimensions: function() {
11819 
11820       var points = this.points,
11821           minX = min(points, 'x'),
11822           minY = min(points, 'y'),
11823           maxX = max(points, 'x'),
11824           maxY = max(points, 'y');
11825 
11826       this.width = (maxX - minX) || 1;
11827       this.height = (maxY - minY) || 1;
11828 
11829       this.minX = minX;
11830       this.minY = minY;
11831     },
11832 
11833     /**
11834      * Returns object representation of an instance
11835      * @method toObject
11836      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
11837      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
11838      */
11839     toObject: function(propertiesToInclude) {
11840       return extend(this.callSuper('toObject', propertiesToInclude), {
11841         points: this.points.concat()
11842       });
11843     },
11844 
11845     /**
11846      * Returns svg representation of an instance
