14254    * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters.Sepia.prototype
14255    * @param {Object} canvasEl Canvas element to apply filter to
14256    */
14257   applyTo: function(canvasEl) {
14258     var context = canvasEl.getContext('2d'),
14259         imageData = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvasEl.width, canvasEl.height),
14260         data = imageData.data,
14261         iLen = data.length, i, avg;
14262 
14263      for (i = 0; i < iLen; i+=4) {
14264         avg = 0.3  * data[i] + 0.59 * data[i + 1] + 0.11 * data[i + 2];
14265         data[i] = avg + 100;
14266         data[i + 1] = avg + 50;
14267         data[i + 2] = avg + 255;
14268      }
14269 
14270      context.putImageData(imageData, 0, 0);
14271   },
14272 
14273   /**
14274    * Returns json representation of filter
14275    * @method toJSON
14276    * @return {String} json representation of filter
14277    */
14278   toJSON: function() {
14279     return { type: this.type };
14280   }
14281 });
14282 
14283 /**
14284  * Returns filter instance from an object representation
14285  * @static
14286  * @method fabric.Image.filters.Sepia.fromObject
14287  * @return {fabric.Image.filters.Sepia}
14288  */
14289 fabric.Image.filters.Sepia.fromObject = function() {
14290   return new fabric.Image.filters.Sepia();
14291 };
14292 
14293 /**
14294  * Sepia2 filter class
14295  * @class fabric.Image.filters.Sepia2
14296  * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters
14297  */
14298 fabric.Image.filters.Sepia2 = fabric.util.createClass( /** @scope fabric.Image.filters.Sepia2.prototype */ {
14299 
14300   /**
14301    * Filter type
14302    * @param {String} type
14303    */
14304   type: "Sepia2",
14305 
14306   /**
14307    * Applies filter to canvas element
14308    * @method applyTo
14309    * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters.Sepia.prototype
14310    * @param {Object} canvasEl Canvas element to apply filter to
14311    */
14312   applyTo: function(canvasEl) {
14313     var context = canvasEl.getContext('2d'),
14314         imageData = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvasEl.width, canvasEl.height),
14315         data = imageData.data,
14316         iLen = data.length, i, r, g, b;
14317 
14318      for (i = 0; i < iLen; i+=4) {
14319 
14320         r = data[i];
14321         g = data[i + 1];
14322         b = data[i + 2];
14323 
14324         data[i] = (r * 0.393 + g * 0.769 + b * 0.189 ) / 1.351;
14325         data[i + 1] = (r * 0.349 + g * 0.686 + b * 0.168 ) / 1.203;
14326         data[i + 2] = (r * 0.272 + g * 0.534 + b * 0.131 ) / 2.140;
14327      }
14328 
14329      context.putImageData(imageData, 0, 0);
14330   },
14331 
14332   /**
14333    * Returns json representation of filter
14334    * @method toJSON
14335    * @return {String} json representation of filter
14336    */
14337   toJSON: function() {
14338     return { type: this.type };
14339   }
14340 });
14341 
14342 /**
14343  * Returns filter instance from an object representation
14344  * @static
14345  * @method fabric.Image.filters.Sepia2.fromObject
14346  * @return {fabric.Image.filters.Sepia2}
14347  */
14348 fabric.Image.filters.Sepia2.fromObject = function() {
14349   return new fabric.Image.filters.Sepia2();
14350 };
14351 
14352 /**
14353  * Brightness filter class
14354  * @class fabric.Image.filters.Brightness
14355  * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters
14356  */
14357 fabric.Image.filters.Brightness = fabric.util.createClass( /** @scope fabric.Image.filters.Brightness.prototype */ {
14358 
14359   /**
14360    * Filter type
14361    * @param {String} type
14362    */
14363   type: "Brightness",
14364 
14365   /**
14366    * Constructor
14367    * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters.Brightness.prototype
14368    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
14369    */
14370   initialize: function(options) {
14371     options || (options = { });
14372     this.brightness = options.brightness || 100;
14373   },
14374 
14375   /**
14376    * Applies filter to canvas element
14377    * @method applyTo
14378    * @param {Object} canvasEl Canvas element to apply filter to
14379    */
14380   applyTo: function(canvasEl) {
14381     var context = canvasEl.getContext('2d'),
14382         imageData = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvasEl.width, canvasEl.height),
14383         data = imageData.data,
14384         brightness = this.brightness;
14385 
14386     for (var i = 0, len = data.length; i < len; i += 4) {
14387       data[i] += brightness;
14388       data[i + 1] += brightness;
14389       data[i + 2] += brightness;
14390     }
14391 
14392     context.putImageData(imageData, 0, 0);
14393   },
14394 
14395   /**
14396    * Returns json representation of filter
14397    * @method toJSON
14398    * @return {String} json representation of filter
14399    */
14400   toJSON: function() {
14401     return {
14402       type: this.type,
14403       brightness: this.brightness
14404     };
14405   }
14406 });
14407 
14408 /**
14409  * Returns filter instance from an object representation
14410  * @static
14411  * @method fabric.Image.filters.Brightness.fromObject
14412  * @return {fabric.Image.filters.Brightness}
14413  */
14414 fabric.Image.filters.Brightness.fromObject = function(object) {
14415   return new fabric.Image.filters.Brightness(object);
14416 };
14417 
14418 /**
14419  * Noise filter class
14420  * @class fabric.Image.filters.Noise
14421  * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters
14422  */
14423 fabric.Image.filters.Noise = fabric.util.createClass( /** @scope fabric.Image.filters.Noise.prototype */ {
14424 
14425   /**
14426    * Filter type
14427    * @param {String} type
14428    */
14429   type: "Noise",
14430 
14431   /**
14432    * Constructor
14433    * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters.Noise.prototype
14434    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
14435    */
14436   initialize: function(options) {
14437     options || (options = { });
14438     this.noise = options.noise || 100;
14439   },
14440 
14441   /**
14442    * Applies filter to canvas element
14443    * @method applyTo
14444    * @param {Object} canvasEl Canvas element to apply filter to
14445    */
14446   applyTo: function(canvasEl) {
14447     var context = canvasEl.getContext('2d'),
14448         imageData = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvasEl.width, canvasEl.height),
14449         data = imageData.data,
14450         noise = this.noise, rand;
14451 
14452     for (var i = 0, len = data.length; i < len; i += 4) {
14453 
14454       rand = (0.5 - Math.random()) * noise;
14455 
14456       data[i] += rand;
14457       data[i + 1] += rand;
14458       data[i + 2] += rand;
14459     }
14460 
14461     context.putImageData(imageData, 0, 0);
14462   },
14463 
14464   /**
14465    * Returns json representation of filter
14466    * @method toJSON
14467    * @return {String} json representation of filter
14468    */
14469   toJSON: function() {
14470     return {
14471       type: this.type,
14472       noise: this.noise
14473     };
14474   }
14475 });
14476 
14477 /**
14478  * Returns filter instance from an object representation
14479  * @static
14480  * @method fabric.Image.filters.Noise.fromObject
14481  * @return {fabric.Image.filters.Noise}
14482  */
14483 fabric.Image.filters.Noise.fromObject = function(object) {
14484   return new fabric.Image.filters.Noise(object);
14485 };
14486 
14487 /**
14488  * GradientTransparency filter class
14489  * @class fabric.Image.filters.GradientTransparency
14490  * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters
14491  */
14492 fabric.Image.filters.GradientTransparency = fabric.util.createClass( /** @scope fabric.Image.filters.GradientTransparency.prototype */ {
14493 
14494   /**
14495    * Filter type
14496    * @param {String} type
14497    */
14498   type: "GradientTransparency",
14499 
14500   /**
14501    * Constructor
14502    * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters.GradientTransparency
14503    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
14504    */
14505   initialize: function(options) {
14506     options || (options = { });
14507     this.threshold = options.threshold || 100;
14508   },
14509 
14510   /**
14511    * Applies filter to canvas element
14512    * @method applyTo
14513    * @param {Object} canvasEl Canvas element to apply filter to
14514    */
14515   applyTo: function(canvasEl) {
14516     var context = canvasEl.getContext('2d'),
14517         imageData = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvasEl.width, canvasEl.height),
14518         data = imageData.data,
14519         threshold = this.threshold,
14520         total = data.length;
14521 
14522     for (var i = 0, len = data.length; i < len; i += 4) {
14523       data[i + 3] = threshold + 255 * (total - i) / total;
14524     }
14525 
14526     context.putImageData(imageData, 0, 0);
14527   },
14528 
14529   /**
14530    * Returns json representation of filter
14531    * @method toJSON
14532    * @return {String} json representation of filter
14533    */
14534   toJSON: function() {
14535     return {
14536       type: this.type,
14537       threshold: this.threshold
14538     };
14539   }
14540 });
14541 
14542 /**
14543  * Returns filter instance from an object representation
14544  * @static
14545  * @method fabric.Image.filters.GradientTransparency.fromObject
14546  * @return {fabric.Image.filters.GradientTransparency}
14547  */
14548 fabric.Image.filters.GradientTransparency.fromObject = function(object) {
14549   return new fabric.Image.filters.GradientTransparency(object);
14550 };
14551 
14552 /**
14553  * Tint filter class
14554  * @class fabric.Image.filters.Tint
14555  * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters
14556  */
14557 fabric.Image.filters.Tint = fabric.util.createClass( /** @scope fabric.Image.filters.Tint.prototype */ {
14558 
14559   /**
14560    * Filter type
14561    * @param {String} type
14562    */
14563   type: "Tint",
14564 
14565   /**
14566    * Constructor
14567    * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters.Tint.prototype
14568    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
14569    */
14570   initialize: function(options) {
14571     options || (options = { });
14572     this.color = options.color || 0;
14573   },
14574 
14575   /**
14576    * Applies filter to canvas element
14577    * @method applyTo
14578    * @param {Object} canvasEl Canvas element to apply filter to
14579    */
14580   applyTo: function(canvasEl) {
14581 
14582     var context = canvasEl.getContext('2d'),
14583         imageData = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvasEl.width, canvasEl.height),
14584         data = imageData.data,
14585         iLen = data.length, i, a;
14586 
14587     var rgb = parseInt(this.color, 10).toString(16);
14588 
14589     var cr = parseInt('0x' + rgb.substr(0, 2), 16);
14590     var cg = parseInt('0x' + rgb.substr(2, 2), 16);
14591     var cb = parseInt('0x' + rgb.substr(4, 2), 16);
14592 
14593     for (i = 0; i < iLen; i+=4) {
14594 
14595       a = data[i+3];
14596 
14597       if (a > 0){
14598         data[i] = cr;
14599         data[i+1] = cg;
14600         data[i+2] = cb;
14601       }
14602     }
14603 
14604     context.putImageData(imageData, 0, 0);
14605   },
14606 
14607   /**
14608    * Returns json representation of filter
14609    * @method toJSON
14610    * @return {String} json representation of filter
14611    */
14612   toJSON: function() {
14613     return {
14614       type: this.type,
14615       color: this.color
14616     };
14617   }
14618 });
14619 
14620 /**
14621  * Returns filter instance from an object representation
14622  * @static
14623  * @method fabric.Image.filters.Tint.fromObject
14624  * @return {fabric.Image.filters.Tint}
14625  */
14626 fabric.Image.filters.Tint.fromObject = function(object) {
14627   return new fabric.Image.filters.Tint(object);
14628 };
14629 
14630 /**
14631  * Adapted from <a href="http://www.html5rocks.com/en/tutorials/canvas/imagefilters/">html5rocks article</a>
14632  * @class fabric.Image.filters.Convolute
14633  * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters
14634  */
14635 fabric.Image.filters.Convolute = fabric.util.createClass(/** @scope fabric.Image.filters.Convolute.prototype */ {
14636 
14637   /**
14638    * Filter type
14639    * @param {String} type
14640    */
14641   type: 'Convolute',
14642 
14643   /**
14644    * Constructor
14645    * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters.Convolute.prototype
14646    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
14647    */
14648   initialize: function(options) {
14649     options || (options = { });
14650 
14651     this.opaque = options.opaque;
14652     this.matrix = options.matrix || [ 0, 0, 0,
14653                                       0, 1, 0,
14654                                       0, 0, 0 ];
14655 
14656     this.tmpCtx = fabric.document.createElement('canvas').getContext('2d');
14657   },
14658 
14659   /**
14660    * @private
14661    * @method _createImageData
14662    */
14663   _createImageData: function(w, h) {
14664     return this.tmpCtx.createImageData(w, h);
14665   },
14666 
14667   /**
14668    * Applies filter to canvas element
14669    * @method applyTo
14670    * @param {Object} canvasEl Canvas element to apply filter to
14671    */
14672   applyTo: function(canvasEl) {
14673 
14674     var weights = this.matrix;
14675     var context = canvasEl.getContext('2d');
14676     var pixels = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvasEl.width, canvasEl.height);
14677 
14678     var side = Math.round(Math.sqrt(weights.length));
14679     var halfSide = Math.floor(side/2);
14680     var src = pixels.data;
14681     var sw = pixels.width;
14682     var sh = pixels.height;
14683 
14684     // pad output by the convolution matrix
14685     var w = sw;
14686     var h = sh;
14687     var output = this._createImageData(w, h);
14688 
14689     var dst = output.data;
14690 
14691     // go through the destination image pixels
14692     var alphaFac = this.opaque ? 1 : 0;
14693     for (var y=0; y<h; y++) {
14694       for (var x=0; x<w; x++) {
14695         var sy = y;
14696         var sx = x;
14697         var dstOff = (y*w+x)*4;
14698         // calculate the weighed sum of the source image pixels that
14699         // fall under the convolution matrix
14700         var r=0, g=0, b=0, a=0;
14701         for (var cy=0; cy<side; cy++) {
14702           for (var cx=0; cx<side; cx++) {
14703             var scy = sy + cy - halfSide;
14704             var scx = sx + cx - halfSide;
14705             if (scy >= 0 && scy < sh && scx >= 0 && scx < sw) {
14706               var srcOff = (scy*sw+scx)*4;
14707               var wt = weights[cy*side+cx];
14708               r += src[srcOff] * wt;
14709               g += src[srcOff+1] * wt;
14710               b += src[srcOff+2] * wt;
14711               a += src[srcOff+3] * wt;
14712             }
14713           }
14714         }
14715         dst[dstOff] = r;
14716         dst[dstOff+1] = g;
14717         dst[dstOff+2] = b;
14718         dst[dstOff+3] = a + alphaFac*(255-a);
14719       }
14720     }
14721 
14722     context.putImageData(output, 0, 0);
14723   },
14724 
14725   /**
14726    * Returns json representation of filter
14727    * @method toJSON
14728    * @return {String} json representation of filter
14729    */
14730   toJSON: function() {
14731     return {
14732       type: this.type,
14733       matrix: this.matrix
14734     };
14735   }
14736 });
14737 
14738 /**
14739  * Returns filter instance from an object representation
14740  * @static
14741  * @method fabric.Image.filters.Convolute.fromObject
14742  * @return {fabric.Image.filters.Convolute}
14743  */
14744 fabric.Image.filters.Convolute.fromObject = function(object) {
14745   return new fabric.Image.filters.Convolute(object);
14746 };
14747 
14748 /**
14749  * Pixelate filter class
14750  * @class fabric.Image.filters.Pixelate
14751  * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters
14752  */
14753 fabric.Image.filters.Pixelate = fabric.util.createClass(/** @scope fabric.Image.filters.Pixelate.prototype */ {
14754 
14755   /**
14756    * Filter type
14757    * @param {String} type
14758    */
14759   type: 'Pixelate',
14760 
14761   /**
14762    * Constructor
14763    * @memberOf fabric.Image.filters.Pixelate.prototype
14764    * @param {Object} [options] Options object
14765    */
14766   initialize: function(options) {
14767     options || (options = { });
14768     this.blocksize = options.blocksize || 4;
14769   },
14770 
14771   /**
14772    * Applies filter to canvas element
14773    * @method applyTo
14774    * @param {Object} canvasEl Canvas element to apply filter to
14775    */
14776   applyTo: function(canvasEl) {
14777 
14778     var context = canvasEl.getContext('2d'),
14779         imageData = context.getImageData(0, 0, canvasEl.width, canvasEl.height),
14780         data = imageData.data,
14781         iLen = imageData.width,
14782         jLen = imageData.height,
14783         index, i, j, r, g, b, a;
14784 
14785     for (i = 0; i < iLen; i += this.blocksize) {
14786       for (j = 0; j < jLen; j += this.blocksize) {
14787 
14788         index = (i * 4) * jLen + (j * 4);
14789 
14790         r = data[index];
14791         g = data[index+1];
14792         b = data[index+2];
14793         a = data[index+3];
14794 
14795         /*
14796           blocksize: 4
14797 
14798           [1,x,x,x,1]
14799           [x,x,x,x,1]
14800           [x,x,x,x,1]
14801           [x,x,x,x,1]
14802           [1,1,1,1,1]
14803         */
14804 
14805         for (var _i = i, _ilen = i + this.blocksize; _i < _ilen; _i++) {
14806           for (var _j = j, _jlen = j + this.blocksize; _j < _jlen; _j++) {
14807             index = (_i * 4) * jLen + (_j * 4);
14808             data[index] = r;
14809             data[index + 1] = g;
14810             data[index + 2] = b;
14811             data[index + 3] = a;
14812           }
14813         }
14814       }
14815     }
14816 
14817     context.putImageData(imageData, 0, 0);
14818   },
14819 
14820   /**
14821    * Returns json representation of filter
14822    * @method toJSON
14823    * @return {String} json representation of filter
14824    */
14825   toJSON: function() {
14826     return {
14827       type: this.type,
14828       blocksize: this.blocksize
14829     };
14830   }
14831 });
14832 
14833 /**
14834  * Returns filter instance from an object representation
14835  * @static
14836  * @method fabric.Image.filters.Pixelate.fromObject
14837  * @return {fabric.Image.filters.Pixelate}
14838  */
14839 fabric.Image.filters.Pixelate.fromObject = function(object) {
14840   return new fabric.Image.filters.Pixelate(object);
14841 };
14842 (function(global) {
14843 
14844   "use strict";
14845 
14846   var fabric = global.fabric || (global.fabric = { }),
14847       extend = fabric.util.object.extend,
14848       clone = fabric.util.object.clone,
14849       toFixed = fabric.util.toFixed;
14850 
14851   if (fabric.Text) {
14852     fabric.warn('fabric.Text is already defined');
14853     return;
14854   }
14855 
14856   /**
14857    * Text class
14858    * @class Text
14859    * @extends fabric.Object
14860    */
14861   fabric.Text = fabric.util.createClass(fabric.Object, /** @scope fabric.Text.prototype */ {
14862 
14863     /**
14864      * Font size
14865      * @property
14866      * @type Number
14867      */
14868     fontSize:             40,
14869 
14870     /**
14871      * Font weight (e.g. bold, normal, 400, 600, 800)
14872      * @property
14873      * @type Number
14874      */
14875     fontWeight:           400,
14876 
14877     /**
14878      * Font family
14879      * @property
14880      * @type String
14881      */
14882     fontFamily:           'Times New Roman',
14883 
14884     /**
14885      * Text decoration (e.g. underline, overline)
14886      * @property
14887      * @type String
14888      */
14889     textDecoration:       '',
14890 
14891     /**
14892      * Text shadow
14893      * @property
14894      * @type String | null
14895      */
14896     textShadow:           '',
14897 
14898     /**
14899      * Text alignment. Possible values: "left", "center", or "right".
14900      * @property
14901      * @type String
14902      */
14903     textAlign:            'left',
14904 
14905     /**
14906      * Font style (e.g. italic)
14907      * @property
14908      * @type String
14909      */
14910     fontStyle:            '',
14911 
14912     /**
14913      * Line height
14914      * @property
14915      * @type Number
14916      */
14917     lineHeight:           1.3,
14918 
14919     /**
14920      * Stroke style. When specified, text is rendered with stroke
14921      * @property
14922      * @type String
14923      */
14924     strokeStyle:          '',
14925 
14926     /**
14927      * Stroke width
14928      * @property
14929      * @type Number
14930      */
14931     strokeWidth:          1,
14932 
14933     /**
14934      * Background color of an entire text box
14935      * @property
14936      * @type String
14937      */
14938     backgroundColor:      '',
14939 
14940     /**
14941      * Background color of text lines
14942      * @property
14943      * @type String
14944      */
14945     textBackgroundColor:  '',
14946 
14947     /**
14948      * URL of a font file, when using Cufon
14949      * @property
14950      * @type String | null
14951      */
14952     path:                 null,
14953 
14954     /**
14955      * Type of an object
14956      * @property
14957      * @type String
14958      */
14959     type:                 'text',
14960 
14961     /**
14962      * Indicates whether canvas native text methods should be used to render text (otherwise, Cufon is used)
14963      * @property
14964      * @type Boolean
14965      */
14966      useNative:           true,
14967 
14968     /**
14969      * Constructor
14970      * @method initialize
14971      * @param {String} text
14972      * @param {Object} [options]
14973      * @return {fabric.Text} thisArg
14974      */
14975     initialize: function(text, options) {
14976       options = options || { };
14977 
14978       this._initStateProperties();
14979       this.text = text;
14980       this.setOptions(options);
14981       this._initDimensions();
14982       this.setCoords();
14983     },
14984 
14985     /**
14986      * Renders text object on offscreen canvas, so that it would get dimensions
14987      * @private
14988      * @method _initDimensions
14989      */
14990     _initDimensions: function() {
14991       var canvasEl = fabric.document.createElement('canvas');
14992 
14993       if (!canvasEl.getContext && typeof G_vmlCanvasManager !== 'undefined') {
14994         G_vmlCanvasManager.initElement(canvasEl);
14995       }
14996 
14997       this._render(canvasEl.getContext('2d'));
14998     },
14999 
15000     /**
15001      * Creates `stateProperties` list on an instance, and adds `fabric.Text` -specific ones to it
15002      * (such as "fontFamily", "fontWeight", etc.)
15003      * @private
15004      * @method _initStateProperties
15005      */
15006     _initStateProperties: function() {
15007       this.stateProperties = this.stateProperties.concat();
15008       this.stateProperties.push(
15009         'fontFamily',
15010         'fontWeight',
15011         'fontSize',
15012         'path',
15013         'text',
15014         'textDecoration',
15015         'textShadow',
15016         'textAlign',
15017         'fontStyle',
15018         'lineHeight',
15019         'strokeStyle',
15020         'strokeWidth',
15021         'backgroundColor',
15022         'textBackgroundColor',
15023         'useNative'
15024       );
15025       fabric.util.removeFromArray(this.stateProperties, 'width');
15026     },
15027 
15028     /**
15029      * Returns string representation of an instance
15030      * @method toString
15031      * @return {String} String representation of text object
15032      */
15033     toString: function() {
15034       return '#<fabric.Text (' + this.complexity() +
15035         '): { "text": "' + this.text + '", "fontFamily": "' + this.fontFamily + '" }>';
15036     },
15037 
15038     /**
15039      * @private
15040      * @method _render
15041      * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D} ctx Context to render on
15042      */
15043     _render: function(ctx) {
15044       if (typeof Cufon === 'undefined' || this.useNative === true) {
15045         this._renderViaNative(ctx);
15046       }
15047       else {
15048         this._renderViaCufon(ctx);
15049       }
15050     },
15051 
15052     /**
15053      * @private
15054      * @method _renderViaCufon
15055      */
15056     _renderViaCufon: function(ctx) {
15057       var o = Cufon.textOptions || (Cufon.textOptions = { });
15058 
15059       // export options to be used by cufon.js
15060       o.left = this.left;
15061       o.top = this.top;
15062       o.context = ctx;
15063       o.color = this.fill;
15064 
15065       var el = this._initDummyElementForCufon();
15066 
15067       // set "cursor" to top/left corner
15068       this.transform(ctx);
15069 
15070       // draw text
15071       Cufon.replaceElement(el, {
15072         engine: 'canvas',
15073         separate: 'none',
15074         fontFamily: this.fontFamily,
15075         fontWeight: this.fontWeight,
15076         textDecoration: this.textDecoration,
15077         textShadow: this.textShadow,
15078         textAlign: this.textAlign,
15079         fontStyle: this.fontStyle,
15080         lineHeight: this.lineHeight,
15081         strokeStyle: this.strokeStyle,
15082         strokeWidth: this.strokeWidth,
15083         backgroundColor: this.backgroundColor,
15084         textBackgroundColor: this.textBackgroundColor
15085       });
15086 
15087       // update width, height
15088       this.width = o.width;
15089       this.height = o.height;
15090 
15091       this._totalLineHeight = o.totalLineHeight;
15092       this._fontAscent = o.fontAscent;
15093       this._boundaries = o.boundaries;
15094       this._shadowOffsets = o.shadowOffsets;
15095       this._shadows = o.shadows || [ ];
15096 
15097       el = null;
15098 
15099       // need to set coords _after_ the width/height was retreived from Cufon
15100       this.setCoords();
15101     },
15102 
15103     /**
15104      * @private
15105      * @method _render_native
15106      * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D} ctx Context to render on
15107      */
15108     _renderViaNative: function(ctx) {
15109 
15110       this.transform(ctx);
15111       this._setTextStyles(ctx);
15112 
15113       var textLines = this.text.split(/\r?\n/);
15114 
15115       this.width = this._getTextWidth(ctx, textLines);
15116       this.height = this._getTextHeight(ctx, textLines);
15117 
15118       this._renderTextBackground(ctx, textLines);
15119 
15120       if (this.textAlign !== 'left' && this.textAlign !== 'justify') {
15121         ctx.save();
15122         ctx.translate(this.textAlign === 'center' ? (this.width / 2) : this.width, 0);
15123       }
15124 
15125       this._setTextShadow(ctx);
15126       this._renderTextFill(ctx, textLines);
15127       this.textShadow && ctx.restore();
15128 
15129       this._renderTextStroke(ctx, textLines);
15130       if (this.textAlign !== 'left' && this.textAlign !== 'justify') {
15131         ctx.restore();
15132       }
15133 
15134       this._renderTextDecoration(ctx, textLines);
15135       this._setBoundaries(ctx, textLines);
15136       this._totalLineHeight = 0;
15137 
15138       this.setCoords();
15139     },
15140 
15141     /**
15142      * @private
15143      * @method _setBoundaries
15144      */
15145     _setBoundaries: function(ctx, textLines) {
15146       this._boundaries = [ ];
15147 
15148       for (var i = 0, len = textLines.length; i < len; i++) {
15149 
15150         var lineWidth = this._getLineWidth(ctx, textLines[i]);
15151         var lineLeftOffset = this._getLineLeftOffset(lineWidth);
15152 
15153         this._boundaries.push({
15154           height: this.fontSize * this.lineHeight,
15155           width: lineWidth,
15156           left: lineLeftOffset
15157         });
15158       }
15159     },
15160 
15161     /**
15162      * @private
15163      * @method _setTextStyles
15164      */
15165     _setTextStyles: function(ctx) {
15166       ctx.fillStyle = this.fill.toLiveGradient
15167           ? this.fill.toLiveGradient(ctx)
15168           : this.fill;
15169       ctx.strokeStyle = this.strokeStyle;
15170       ctx.lineWidth = this.strokeWidth;
15171       ctx.textBaseline = 'alphabetic';
15172       ctx.textAlign = this.textAlign;
15173       ctx.font = this._getFontDeclaration();
15174     },
15175 
15176     /**
15177      * @private
15178      * @method _getTextHeight
15179      */
15180     _getTextHeight: function(ctx, textLines) {
15181       return this.fontSize * textLines.length * this.lineHeight;
15182     },
15183 
15184     /**
15185      * @private
15186      * @method _getTextWidth
15187      */
15188     _getTextWidth: function(ctx, textLines) {
15189       var maxWidth = ctx.measureText(textLines[0]).width;
15190 
15191       for (var i = 1, len = textLines.length; i < len; i++) {
15192         var currentLineWidth = ctx.measureText(textLines[i]).width;
15193         if (currentLineWidth > maxWidth) {
15194           maxWidth = currentLineWidth;
15195         }
15196       }
15197       return maxWidth;
15198     },
15199 
15200     /**
15201      * @private
15202      * @method _setTextShadow
15203      */
15204     _setTextShadow: function(ctx) {
15205       if (this.textShadow) {
15206 
15207         // "rgba(0,0,0,0.2) 2px 2px 10px"
15208         // "rgb(0, 100, 0) 0 0 5px"
15209         // "red 2px 2px 1px"
15210         // "#f55 123 345 567"
15211         var reOffsetsAndBlur = /\s+(-?\d+)(?:px)?\s+(-?\d+)(?:px)?\s+(\d+)(?:px)?\s*/;
15212 
15213         var shadowDeclaration = this.textShadow;
15214         var offsetsAndBlur = reOffsetsAndBlur.exec(this.textShadow);
15215         var shadowColor = shadowDeclaration.replace(reOffsetsAndBlur, '');
15216 
15217         ctx.save();
15218         ctx.shadowColor = shadowColor;
15219         ctx.shadowOffsetX = parseInt(offsetsAndBlur[1], 10);
15220         ctx.shadowOffsetY = parseInt(offsetsAndBlur[2], 10);
15221         ctx.shadowBlur = parseInt(offsetsAndBlur[3], 10);
15222 
15223         this._shadows = [{
15224           blur: ctx.shadowBlur,
15225           color: ctx.shadowColor,
15226           offX: ctx.shadowOffsetX,
15227           offY: ctx.shadowOffsetY
15228         }];
15229 
15230         this._shadowOffsets = [[
15231           parseInt(ctx.shadowOffsetX, 10), parseInt(ctx.shadowOffsetY, 10)
15232         ]];
15233       }
15234     },
15235 
15236     /**
15237      * @private
15238      * @method _drawTextLine
15239      * @param method
15240      * @param ctx
15241      * @param line
15242      * @param left
15243      * param top
15244      */
15245     _drawTextLine: function(method, ctx, line, left, top) {
15246 
15247       // short-circuit
15248       if (this.textAlign !== 'justify') {
15249         ctx[method](line, left, top);
15250         return;
15251       }
15252 
15253       var lineWidth = ctx.measureText(line).width;
15254       var totalWidth = this.width;
15255 
15256       if (totalWidth > lineWidth) {
15257         // stretch the line
15258 
15259         var words = line.split(/\s+/);
15260         var wordsWidth = ctx.measureText(line.replace(/\s+/g, '')).width;
15261         var widthDiff = totalWidth - wordsWidth;
15262         var numSpaces = words.length - 1;
15263         var spaceWidth = widthDiff / numSpaces;
15264 
15265         var leftOffset = 0;
15266         for (var i = 0, len = words.length; i < len; i++) {
15267           ctx[method](words[i], left + leftOffset, top);
15268           leftOffset += ctx.measureText(words[i]).width + spaceWidth;
15269         }
15270       }
15271       else {
15272         ctx[method](line, left, top);
15273       }
15274     },
15275 
15276     /**
15277      * @private
15278      * @method _renderTextFill
15279      */
15280     _renderTextFill: function(ctx, textLines) {
15281       this._boundaries = [ ];
15282       for (var i = 0, len = textLines.length; i < len; i++) {
15283         this._drawTextLine(
15284           'fillText',
15285           ctx,
15286           textLines[i],
15287           -this.width / 2,
15288           (-this.height / 2) + (i * this.fontSize * this.lineHeight) + this.fontSize
15289         );
15290       }
15291     },
15292 
15293     /**
15294      * @private
15295      * @method _renderTextStroke
15296      */
15297     _renderTextStroke: function(ctx, textLines) {
15298       if (this.strokeStyle) {
15299         ctx.beginPath();
15300         for (var i = 0, len = textLines.length; i < len; i++) {
15301           this._drawTextLine(
15302             'strokeText',
15303             ctx,
15304             textLines[i],
15305             -this.width / 2,
15306             (-this.height / 2) + (i * this.fontSize * this.lineHeight) + this.fontSize
15307           );
15308         }
15309         ctx.closePath();
15310       }
15311     },
15312 
15313     /**
15314      * @private
15315      * @method _renderTextBackground
15316      */
15317     _renderTextBackground: function(ctx, textLines) {
15318       this._renderTextBoxBackground(ctx);
15319       this._renderTextLinesBackground(ctx, textLines);
15320     },
15321 
15322     /**
15323      * @private
15324      * @method _renderTextBoxBackground
15325      */
15326     _renderTextBoxBackground: function(ctx) {
15327       if (this.backgroundColor) {
15328         ctx.save();
15329         ctx.fillStyle = this.backgroundColor;
15330 
15331         ctx.fillRect(
15332           (-this.width / 2),
15333           (-this.height / 2),
15334           this.width,
15335           this.height
15336         );
15337 
15338         ctx.restore();
15339       }
15340     },
15341 
15342     /**
15343      * @private
15344      * @method _renderTextLinesBackground
15345      */
15346     _renderTextLinesBackground: function(ctx, textLines) {
15347       if (this.textBackgroundColor) {
15348         ctx.save();
15349         ctx.fillStyle = this.textBackgroundColor;
15350 
15351         for (var i = 0, len = textLines.length; i < len; i++) {
15352 
15353           if (textLines[i] !== '') {
15354 
15355             var lineWidth = this._getLineWidth(ctx, textLines[i]);
15356             var lineLeftOffset = this._getLineLeftOffset(lineWidth);
15357 
15358             ctx.fillRect(
15359               (-this.width / 2) + lineLeftOffset,
15360               (-this.height / 2) + (i * this.fontSize * this.lineHeight),
15361               lineWidth,
15362               this.fontSize * this.lineHeight
15363             );
15364           }
15365         }
15366         ctx.restore();
15367       }
15368     },
15369 
15370     /**
15371      * @private
15372      * @method _getLineLeftOffset
15373      */
15374     _getLineLeftOffset: function(lineWidth) {
15375       if (this.textAlign === 'center') {
15376         return (this.width - lineWidth) / 2;
15377       }
15378       if (this.textAlign === 'right') {
15379         return this.width - lineWidth;
15380       }
15381       return 0;
15382     },
15383 
15384     /**
15385      * @private
15386      * @method _getLineWidth
15387      * @param ctx
15388      * @param line
15389      */
15390     _getLineWidth: function(ctx, line) {
15391       return this.textAlign === 'justify'
15392         ? this.width
15393         : ctx.measureText(line).width;
15394     },
15395 
15396     /**
15397      * @private
15398      * @method _renderTextDecoration
15399      */
15400     _renderTextDecoration: function(ctx, textLines) {
15401 
15402       var halfOfVerticalBox = this._getTextHeight(ctx, textLines) / 2;
15403       var _this = this;
15404 
15405       /** @ignore */
15406       function renderLinesAtOffset(offset) {
15407         for (var i = 0, len = textLines.length; i < len; i++) {
15408 
15409           var lineWidth = _this._getLineWidth(ctx, textLines[i]);
15410           var lineLeftOffset = _this._getLineLeftOffset(lineWidth);
15411 
15412           ctx.fillRect(
15413             (-_this.width / 2) + lineLeftOffset,
15414             (offset + (i * _this.fontSize * _this.lineHeight)) - halfOfVerticalBox,
15415             lineWidth,
15416             1);
15417         }
15418       }
15419 
15420       if (this.textDecoration.indexOf('underline') > -1) {
15421         renderLinesAtOffset(this.fontSize);
15422       }
15423       if (this.textDecoration.indexOf('line-through') > -1) {
15424         renderLinesAtOffset(this.fontSize / 2);
15425       }
15426       if (this.textDecoration.indexOf('overline') > -1) {
15427         renderLinesAtOffset(0);
15428       }
15429     },
15430 
15431     /**
15432      * @private
15433      * @method _getFontDeclaration
15434      */
15435     _getFontDeclaration: function() {
15436       return [
15437         this.fontStyle,
15438         this.fontWeight,
15439         this.fontSize + 'px',
15440         (fabric.isLikelyNode ? ('"' + this.fontFamily + '"') : this.fontFamily)
15441       ].join(' ');
15442     },
15443 
15444     /**
15445      * @private
15446      * @method _initDummyElement
15447      */
15448     _initDummyElementForCufon: function() {
15449       var el = fabric.document.createElement('pre'),
15450           container = fabric.document.createElement('div');
15451 
15452       // Cufon doesn't play nice with textDecoration=underline if element doesn't have a parent
15453       container.appendChild(el);
15454 
15455       if (typeof G_vmlCanvasManager === 'undefined') {
15456         el.innerHTML = this.text;
15457       }
15458       else {
15459         // IE 7 & 8 drop newlines and white space on text nodes
15460         // see: http://web.student.tuwien.ac.at/~e0226430/innerHtmlQuirk.html
15461         // see: http://www.w3schools.com/dom/dom_mozilla_vs_ie.asp
15462         el.innerText =  this.text.replace(/\r?\n/gi, '\r');
15463       }
15464 
15465       el.style.fontSize = this.fontSize + 'px';
15466       el.style.letterSpacing = 'normal';
15467 
15468       return el;
15469     },
15470 
15471     /**
15472      * Renders text instance on a specified context
15473      * @method render
15474      * @param ctx {CanvasRenderingContext2D} context to render on
15475      */
15476     render: function(ctx, noTransform) {
15477       ctx.save();
15478       this._render(ctx);
15479       if (!noTransform && this.active) {
15480         this.drawBorders(ctx);
15481         this.hideCorners || this.drawCorners(ctx);
15482       }
15483       ctx.restore();
15484     },
15485 
15486     /**
15487      * Returns object representation of an instance
15488      * @method toObject
15489      * @param {Array} propertiesToInclude
15490      * @return {Object} object representation of an instance
15491      */
15492     toObject: function(propertiesToInclude) {
15493       return extend(this.callSuper('toObject', propertiesToInclude), {
15494         text:                 this.text,
15495         fontSize:             this.fontSize,
15496         fontWeight:           this.fontWeight,
15497         fontFamily:           this.fontFamily,
15498         fontStyle:            this.fontStyle,
15499         lineHeight:           this.lineHeight,
15500         textDecoration:       this.textDecoration,
15501         textShadow:           this.textShadow,
15502         textAlign:            this.textAlign,
15503         path:                 this.path,
15504         strokeStyle:          this.strokeStyle,
15505         strokeWidth:          this.strokeWidth,
15506         backgroundColor:      this.backgroundColor,
15507         textBackgroundColor:  this.textBackgroundColor,
15508         useNative:            this.useNative
15509       });
15510     },
15511 
15512     /**
15513      * Returns SVG representation of an instance
15514      * @method toSVG
15515      * @return {String} svg representation of an instance
15516      */
15517     toSVG: function() {
15518 
15519       var textLines = this.text.split(/\r?\n/),
15520           lineTopOffset = this.useNative
15521             ? this.fontSize * this.lineHeight
15522             : (-this._fontAscent - ((this._fontAscent / 5) * this.lineHeight)),
15523 
15524           textLeftOffset = -(this.width/2),
15525           textTopOffset = this.useNative
15526             ? this.fontSize - 1
15527             : (this.height/2) - (textLines.length * this.fontSize) - this._totalLineHeight,
15528 
15529           textAndBg = this._getSVGTextAndBg(lineTopOffset, textLeftOffset, textLines),
15530           shadowSpans = this._getSVGShadows(lineTopOffset, textLines);
15531 
15532       // move top offset by an ascent
15533       textTopOffset += (this._fontAscent ? ((this._fontAscent / 5) * this.lineHeight) : 0);
15534 
15535       return [
15536         '<g transform="', this.getSvgTransform(), '">',
15537           textAndBg.textBgRects.join(''),
15538           '<text ',
15539             (this.fontFamily ? 'font-family="\'' + this.fontFamily + '\'" ': ''),
15540             (this.fontSize ? 'font-size="' + this.fontSize + '" ': ''),
15541             (this.fontStyle ? 'font-style="' + this.fontStyle + '" ': ''),
15542             (this.fontWeight ? 'font-weight="' + this.fontWeight + '" ': ''),
15543             (this.textDecoration ? 'text-decoration="' + this.textDecoration + '" ': ''),
15544             'style="', this.getSvgStyles(), '" ',
15545             /* svg starts from left/bottom corner so we normalize height */
15546             'transform="translate(', toFixed(textLeftOffset, 2), ' ', toFixed(textTopOffset, 2), ')">',
15547             shadowSpans.join(''),
15548             textAndBg.textSpans.join(''),
15549           '</text>',
15550         '</g>'
15551       ].join('');
15552     },
15553 
15554     /**
15555      * @private
15556      * @method _getSVGShadows
15557      */
15558     _getSVGShadows: function(lineTopOffset, textLines) {
15559       var shadowSpans = [], j, i, jlen, ilen, lineTopOffsetMultiplier = 1;
15560 
15561       if (!this._shadows || !this._boundaries) {
15562         return shadowSpans;
15563       }
15564 
15565       for (j = 0, jlen = this._shadows.length; j < jlen; j++) {
15566         for (i = 0, ilen = textLines.length; i < ilen; i++) {
15567           if (textLines[i] !== '') {
15568             var lineLeftOffset = (this._boundaries && this._boundaries[i]) ? this._boundaries[i].left : 0;
15569             shadowSpans.push(
15570               '<tspan x="',
15571               toFixed((lineLeftOffset + lineTopOffsetMultiplier) + this._shadowOffsets[j][0], 2),
15572               ((i === 0 || this.useNative) ? '" y' : '" dy'), '="',
15573               toFixed(this.useNative
15574                 ? ((lineTopOffset * i) - this.height / 2 + this._shadowOffsets[j][1])
15575                 : (lineTopOffset + (i === 0 ? this._shadowOffsets[j][1] : 0)), 2),
15576               '" ',
15577               this._getFillAttributes(this._shadows[j].color), '>',
15578               fabric.util.string.escapeXml(textLines[i]),
15579             '</tspan>');
15580             lineTopOffsetMultiplier = 1;
15581           } else {
15582             // in some environments (e.g. IE 7 & 8) empty tspans are completely ignored, using a lineTopOffsetMultiplier
15583             // prevents empty tspans
15584             lineTopOffsetMultiplier++;
15585           }
15586         }
15587       }
15588       return shadowSpans;
15589     },
15590 
15591     /**
15592      * @private
15593      * @method _getSVGTextAndBg
15594      */
15595     _getSVGTextAndBg: function(lineTopOffset, textLeftOffset, textLines) {
15596       var textSpans = [ ], textBgRects = [ ], i, lineLeftOffset, len, lineTopOffsetMultiplier = 1;
15597 
15598       // bounding-box background
15599       if (this.backgroundColor && this._boundaries) {
15600         textBgRects.push(
15601           '<rect ',
15602             this._getFillAttributes(this.backgroundColor),
15603             ' x="',
15604             toFixed(-this.width / 2, 2),
15605             '" y="',
15606             toFixed(-this.height / 2, 2),
15607             '" width="',
15608             toFixed(this.width, 2),
15609             '" height="',
15610             toFixed(this.height, 2),
15611           '"></rect>');
15612       }
15613 
15614       // text and text-background
15615       for (i = 0, len = textLines.length; i < len; i++) {
15616         if (textLines[i] !== '') {
15617           lineLeftOffset = (this._boundaries && this._boundaries[i]) ? toFixed(this._boundaries[i].left, 2) : 0;
15618           textSpans.push(
15619             '<tspan x="',
15620               lineLeftOffset, '" ',
15621               (i === 0 || this.useNative ? 'y' : 'dy'), '="',
15622               toFixed(this.useNative ? ((lineTopOffset * i) - this.height / 2) : (lineTopOffset * lineTopOffsetMultiplier), 2) , '" ',
15623               // doing this on <tspan> elements since setting opacity on containing <text> one doesn't work in Illustrator
15624               this._getFillAttributes(this.fill), '>',
15625               fabric.util.string.escapeXml(textLines[i]),
15626             '</tspan>'
15627           );
15628           lineTopOffsetMultiplier = 1;
15629         }
15630         else {
15631           // in some environments (e.g. IE 7 & 8) empty tspans are completely ignored, using a lineTopOffsetMultiplier
15632           // prevents empty tspans
15633           lineTopOffsetMultiplier++;
15634         }
15635 
15636         if (!this.textBackgroundColor || !this._boundaries) continue;
15637 
15638         textBgRects.push(
15639           '<rect ',
15640             this._getFillAttributes(this.textBackgroundColor),
15641             ' x="',
15642             toFixed(textLeftOffset + this._boundaries[i].left, 2),
15643             '" y="',
15644             /* an offset that seems to straighten things out */
15645             toFixed((lineTopOffset * i) - this.height / 2, 2),
15646             '" width="',
15647             toFixed(this._boundaries[i].width, 2),
15648             '" height="',
15649             toFixed(this._boundaries[i].height, 2),
15650           '"></rect>');
15651       }
15652       return {
15653         textSpans: textSpans,
15654         textBgRects: textBgRects
15655       };
15656     },
15657 
15658     /**
15659      * Adobe Illustrator (at least CS5) is unable to render rgba()-based fill values
15660      * we work around it by "moving" alpha channel into opacity attribute and setting fill's alpha to 1
15661      *
15662      * @private
15663      * @method _getFillAttributes
15664      */
15665     _getFillAttributes: function(value) {
15666       var fillColor = value ? new fabric.Color(value) : '';
15667       if (!fillColor || !fillColor.getSource() || fillColor.getAlpha() === 1) {
15668         return 'fill="' + value + '"';
15669       }
15670       return 'opacity="' + fillColor.getAlpha() + '" fill="' + fillColor.setAlpha(1).toRgb() + '"';
15671     },
15672 
15673     /**
15674      * Sets "color" of an instance (alias of `set('fill', …)`)
15675      * @method setColor
15676      * @param {String} value
15677      * @return {fabric.Text} thisArg
15678      * @chainable
15679      */
15680     setColor: function(value) {
15681       this.set('fill', value);
15682       return this;
15683     },
15684 
15685     /**
15686      * Sets fontSize of an instance and updates its coordinates
15687      * @method setFontsize
15688      * @param {Number} value
15689      * @return {fabric.Text} thisArg
15690      * @chainable
15691      */
15692     setFontsize: function(value) {
15693       this.set('fontSize', value);
15694       this._initDimensions();
15695       this.setCoords();
15696       return this;
15697     },
15698 
15699     /**
15700      * Returns actual text value of an instance
15701      * @method getText
15702      * @return {String}
15703      */
15704     getText: function() {
15705       return this.text;
15706     },
15707 
15708     /**
15709      * Sets text of an instance, and updates its coordinates
15710      * @method setText
15711      * @param {String} value
15712      * @return {fabric.Text} thisArg
15713      * @chainable
15714      */
15715     setText: function(value) {
15716       this.set('text', value);
15717       this._initDimensions();
15718       this.setCoords();
15719       return this;
15720     },
15721 
15722     /**
15723      * Sets specified property to a specified value
15724      * @method set
15725      * @param {String} name
15726      * @param {Any} value
15727      * @return {fabric.Text} thisArg
15728      * @chainable
15729      */
15730     _set: function(name, value) {
15731       if (name === 'fontFamily' && this.path) {
15732         this.path = this.path.replace(/(.*?)([^\/]*)(\.font\.js)/, '$1' + value + '$3');
15733       }
15734       this.callSuper('_set', name, value);
15735     }
15736   });
15737 
15738   /**
15739    * List of attribute names to account for when parsing SVG element (used by {@link fabric.Text.fromElement})
15740    * @static
15741    */
15742   fabric.Text.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES =
15743     ('x y fill fill-opacity opacity stroke stroke-width transform ' +
15744      'font-family font-style font-weight font-size text-decoration').split(' ');
15745 
15746   /**
15747    * Returns fabric.Text instance from an object representation
15748    * @static
15749    * @method fromObject
15750    * @param {Object} object to create an instance from
15751    * @return {fabric.Text} an instance
15752    */
15753   fabric.Text.fromObject = function(object) {
15754     return new fabric.Text(object.text, clone(object));
15755   };
15756 
15757   /**
15758    * Returns fabric.Text instance from an SVG element (<b>not yet implemented</b>)
15759    * @static
15760    * @method fabric.Text.fromElement
15761    * @param element
15762    * @param options
15763    * @return {fabric.Text} an instance
15764    */
15765   fabric.Text.fromElement = function(element, options) {
15766 
15767     if (!element) {
15768       return null;
15769     }
15770 
15771     var parsedAttributes = fabric.parseAttributes(element, fabric.Text.ATTRIBUTE_NAMES);
15772     options = fabric.util.object.extend((options ? fabric.util.object.clone(options) : { }), parsedAttributes);
15773 
15774     var text = new fabric.Text(element.textContent, options);
15775 
15776     /*
15777       Adjust positioning:
15778         x/y attributes in SVG correspond to the bottom-left corner of text bounding box
15779         top/left properties in Fabric correspond to center point of text bounding box
15780     */
15781 
15782     text.set({
15783       left: text.getLeft() + text.getWidth() / 2,
15784       top: text.getTop() - text.getHeight() / 2
15785     });
15786 
15787     return text;
15788   };
15789 
15790 })(typeof exports !== 'undefined' ? exports : this);
15791 (function() {
15792 
15793   if (typeof document !== 'undefined' && typeof window !== 'undefined') {
15794     return;
15795   }
15796 
15797   var DOMParser = new require('xmldom').DOMParser,
15798       URL = require('url'),
15799       HTTP = require('http'),
15800 
15801       Canvas = require('canvas'),
15802       Image = require('canvas').Image;
15803 
15804   /** @private */
15805   function request(url, encoding, callback) {
15806     var oURL = URL.parse(url),
15807         client = HTTP.createClient(oURL.port, oURL.hostname),
15808         req = client.request('GET', oURL.pathname, { 'host': oURL.hostname });
15809 
15810     client.addListener('error', function(err) {
15811       if (err.errno === process.ECONNREFUSED) {
15812         fabric.log('ECONNREFUSED: connection refused to ' + client.host + ':' + client.port);
15813       }
15814       else {
15815         fabric.log(err.message);
15816       }
15817     });
15818 
15819     req.end();
15820     req.on('response', function (response) {
15821       var body = "";
15822       if (encoding) {
15823         response.setEncoding(encoding);
15824       }
15825       response.on('end', function () {
15826         callback(body);
15827       });
15828       response.on('data', function (chunk) {
15829         if (response.statusCode === 200) {
15830           body += chunk;
15831         }
15832       });
15833     });
15834   }
15835 
15836   fabric.util.loadImage = function(url, callback) {
15837     var img = new Image();
15838     if (url && url.indexOf('data') === 0) {
15839       img.src = img._src = url;
15840       callback(img);
15841     }
15842     else if (url) {
15843       request(url, 'binary', function(body) {
15844         img.src = new Buffer(body, 'binary');
15845         // preserving original url, which seems to be lost in node-canvas
15846         img._src = url;
15847         callback(img);
15848       });
15849     }
15850   };
15851 
15852   fabric.loadSVGFromURL = function(url, callback) {
15853     url = url.replace(/^\n\s*/, '').replace(/\?.*$/, '').trim();
15854     request(url, '', function(body) {
15855       fabric.loadSVGFromString(body, callback);
15856     });
15857   };
15858 
15859   fabric.loadSVGFromString = function(string, callback) {
15860     var doc = new DOMParser().parseFromString(string);
15861     fabric.parseSVGDocument(doc.documentElement, function(results, options) {
15862       callback(results, options);
15863     });
15864   };
15865 
15866   fabric.util.getScript = function(url, callback) {
15867     request(url, '', function(body) {
15868       eval(body);
15869       callback && callback();
15870     });
15871   };
15872 
15873   fabric.Image.fromObject = function(object, callback) {
15874     fabric.util.loadImage(object.src, function(img) {
15875       var oImg = new fabric.Image(img);
15876 
15877       oImg._initConfig(object);
15878       oImg._initFilters(object);
15879       callback(oImg);
15880     });
15881   };
15882 
15883   /**
15884    * Only available when running fabric on node.js
15885    * @method createCanvasForNode
15886    * @param width Canvas width
15887    * @param height Canvas height
15888    * @return {Object} wrapped canvas instance
15889    */
15890   fabric.createCanvasForNode = function(width, height) {
15891 
15892     var canvasEl = fabric.document.createElement('canvas'),
15893         nodeCanvas = new Canvas(width || 600, height || 600);
15894 
15895     // jsdom doesn't create style on canvas element, so here be temp. workaround
15896     canvasEl.style = { };
15897 
15898     canvasEl.width = nodeCanvas.width;
15899     canvasEl.height = nodeCanvas.height;
15900 
15901     var FabricCanvas = fabric.Canvas || fabric.StaticCanvas;
15902     var fabricCanvas = new FabricCanvas(canvasEl);
15903     fabricCanvas.contextContainer = nodeCanvas.getContext('2d');
15904     fabricCanvas.nodeCanvas = nodeCanvas;
15905 
15906     return fabricCanvas;
15907   };
15908 
15909   /** @ignore */
15910   fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.createPNGStream = function() {
15911     return this.nodeCanvas.createPNGStream();
15912   };
15913 
15914   var origSetWidth = fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.setWidth;
15915   fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.setWidth = function(width) {
15916     origSetWidth.call(this);
15917     this.nodeCanvas.width = width;
15918     return this;
15919   };
15920   if (fabric.Canvas) {
15921     fabric.Canvas.prototype.setWidth = fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.setWidth;
15922   }
15923 
15924   var origSetHeight = fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.setHeight;
15925   fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.setHeight = function(height) {
15926     origSetHeight.call(this);
15927     this.nodeCanvas.height = height;
15928     return this;
15929   };
15930   if (fabric.Canvas) {
15931     fabric.Canvas.prototype.setHeight = fabric.StaticCanvas.prototype.setHeight;
15932   }
15933 
15934 })();
15935
